GE09ram_03_u:001.003c: pūjitaṃ copanṛttaṃ ca nityam apsarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:001.005a: āraṇyaiś ca mahāvṛkṣaiḥ puṇyaiḥ svāduphalair vṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:001.006a: puṣpair vanyaiḥ parikṣiptaṃ padminyā ca sapadmayā
GE09ram_03_u:001.009c: abhyagacchan mahātejā vijyaṃ kṛtvā mahad dhanuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:001.010c: abhyagacchaṃs tadā prītā vaidehīṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_03_u:001.011a: te taṃ somam ivodyantaṃ dṛṣṭvā vai dharmacāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:001.013a: vaidehīṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmaṃ netrair animiṣair iva
GE09ram_03_u:001.016a: mūlaṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ vanyam āśramaṃ ca mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:001.017c: pūjanīyaś ca mānyaś ca rājā daṇḍadharo guruḥ
GE09ram_03_u:001.018c: rājā tasmād vanān bhogān bhuṅkte lokanamaskṛtaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:001.019c: nagarastho vanastho vā tvaṃ no rājā janeśvaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:001.021a: evam uktvā phalair mūlaiḥ puṣpair vanyaiś ca rāghavam
GE09ram_03_u:002.001c: āmantrya sa munīn sarvān vanam evānvagāhata
GE09ram_03_u:002.007a: trīn siṃhāṃś caturo vyāghrān dvau vṛkau pṛṣatān daśa
GE09ram_03_u:002.007c: saviṣāṇaṃ vasādigdhaṃ gajasya ca śiro mahat
GE09ram_03_u:002.008c: sa rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva sītāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:002.009c: sa kṛtvā bhairavaṃ nādaṃ cālayann iva medinīm
GE09ram_03_u:002.011c: kathaṃ tāpasayor vāṃ ca vāsaḥ pramadayā saha
GE09ram_03_u:002.012c: ahaṃ vanam idaṃ durgaṃ virāgho nāma rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:002.013c: iyaṃ nārī varārohā mama bharyā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:002.013e: yuvayoḥ pāpayoś cāhaṃ pāsyāmi rudhiraṃ mṛdhe
GE09ram_03_u:002.015a: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ sītāṃ virādhāṅkagatāṃ śubhām
GE09ram_03_u:002.017a: yad abhipretam asmāsu priyaṃ vara vṛtaṃ ca yat
GE09ram_03_u:002.017c: kaikeyyās tu susaṃvṛttaṃ kṣipram adyaiva lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:002.018a: yā na tuṣyati rājyena putrārthe dīrghadarśinī
GE09ram_03_u:002.018e: adyedānīṃ sakāmā sā yā mātā mama madhyamā
GE09ram_03_u:002.019a: parasparśāt tu vaidehyā na duḥkhataram asti me
GE09ram_03_u:002.020c: abravīl lakṣmaṇaḥ kruddho ruddho nāga iva śvasan
GE09ram_03_u:002.021a: anātha iva bhūtānāṃ nāthas tvaṃ vāsavopamaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:002.022c: virādhasya gatāsor hi mahī pāsyati śoṇitam
GE09ram_03_u:002.023a: rājyakāme mama krodho bharate yo babhūva ha
GE09ram_03_u:002.023c: taṃ virādhe vimokṣyāmi vajrī vajram ivācale
GE09ram_03_u:002.024a: mama bhujabalavegavegitaḥ; patatu śaro 'sya mahān mahorasi
GE09ram_03_u:002.024c: vyapanayatu tanoś ca jīvitaṃ; patatu tataś ca mahīṃ vighūrṇitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:003.001a: athovāca punar vākyaṃ virādhaḥ pūrayan vanam
GE09ram_03_u:003.001c: ātmānaṃ pṛcchate brūtaṃ kau yuvāṃ kva gamiṣyathaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:003.002a: tam uvāca tato rāmo rākṣasaṃ jvalitānanam
GE09ram_03_u:003.003c: tvāṃ tu veditum icchāvaḥ kas tvaṃ carasi daṇḍakān
GE09ram_03_u:003.004a: tam uvāca virādhas tu rāmaṃ satyaparākramam
GE09ram_03_u:003.004c: hanta vakṣyāmi te rājan nibodha mama rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:003.005a: putraḥ kila jayasyāhaṃ mātā mama śatahradā
GE09ram_03_u:003.005c: virādha iti mām āhuḥ pṛthivyāṃ sarvarākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:003.006a: tapasā cāpi me prāptā brahmaṇo hi prasādajā
GE09ram_03_u:003.007c: tvaramāṇau pālayethāṃ na vāṃ jīvitam ādade
GE09ram_03_u:003.009a: kṣudra dhik tvāṃ tu hīnārthaṃ mṛtyum anveṣase dhruvam
GE09ram_03_u:003.009c: raṇe saṃprāpsyase tiṣṭha na me jīvan gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:003.010a: tataḥ sajyaṃ dhanuḥ kṛtvā rāmaḥ suniśitāñ śarān
GE09ram_03_u:003.014c: dvābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ ciccheda rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:003.015a: tasya raudrasya saumitrir bāhuṃ savyaṃ babhañja ha
GE09ram_03_u:003.015c: rāmas tu dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ tarasā tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:003.017a: kausalyā suprajās tāta rāmas tvaṃ vidito mayā
GE09ram_03_u:003.017c: vaidehī ca mahābhāgā lakṣmaṇaś ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:003.018a: abhiśāpād ahaṃ ghorāṃ praviṣṭo rākṣasīṃ tanum
GE09ram_03_u:003.018c: tumburur nāma gandharvaḥ śapto vaiśvaraṇena hi
GE09ram_03_u:003.019a: prasādyamānaś ca mayā so 'bravīn māṃ mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:003.019c: yadā dāśarathī rāmas tvāṃ vadhiṣyati saṃyuge
GE09ram_03_u:003.020a: tadā prakṛtim āpanno bhavān svargaṃ gamiṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:003.020c: iti vaiśravaṇo rājā rambhāsaktam uvāca ha
GE09ram_03_u:003.021e: bhavanaṃ svaṃ gamiṣyāmi svasti vo 'stu paraṃtapa
GE09ram_03_u:003.023a: taṃ kṣipram abhigaccha tvaṃ sa te śreyo vidhāsyati
GE09ram_03_u:003.023c: avaṭe cāpi māṃ rāma nikṣipya kuśalī vraja
GE09ram_03_u:003.024c: avaṭe ye nidhīyante teṣāṃ lokāḥ sanātanāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:003.025a: evam uktvā tu kākutsthaṃ virādhaḥ śarapīḍitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:003.027a: tatas tu tau kāñcanacitrakārmukau; nihatya rakṣaḥ parigṛhya maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:003.027c: vijahratus tau muditau mahāvane; divi sthitau candradivākarāv iva
GE09ram_03_u:004.001a: hatvā tu taṃ bhīmabalaṃ virādhaṃ rākṣasaṃ vane
GE09ram_03_u:004.001c: tataḥ sītāṃ pariṣvajya samāśvāsya ca vīryavān
GE09ram_03_u:004.002a: kaṣṭaṃ vanam idaṃ durgaṃ na ca smo vanagocarāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:004.011a: dṛṣṭvā śatakratuṃ tatra rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:004.011c: ye hayāḥ puruhūtasya purā śakrasya naḥ śrutāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:004.011e: antarikṣagatā divyās ta ime harayo dhruvam
GE09ram_03_u:004.012a: ime ca puruṣavyāghra ye tiṣṭhanty abhito ratham
GE09ram_03_u:004.014a: etad dhi kila devānāṃ vayo bhavati nityadā
GE09ram_03_u:004.015a: ihaiva saha vaidehyā muhūrtaṃ tiṣṭha lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:004.015c: yāvaj janāmy ahaṃ vyaktaṃ ka eṣa dyutimān rathe
GE09ram_03_u:004.016a: tam evam uktvā saumitrim ihaiva sthīyatām iti
GE09ram_03_u:004.018a: ihopayāty asau rāmo yāvan māṃ nābhibhāṣate
GE09ram_03_u:004.018c: niṣṭhāṃ nayata tāvat tu tato māṃ draṣṭum arhati
GE09ram_03_u:004.019a: jitavantaṃ kṛtārthaṃ ca draṣṭāham acirād imam
GE09ram_03_u:004.019c: karma hy anena kartavyaṃ mahad anyaiḥ suduṣkaram
GE09ram_03_u:004.020a: iti vajrī tam āmantrya mānayitvā ca tāpasaṃ
GE09ram_03_u:004.022a: tasya pādau ca saṃgṛhya rāmaḥ sītā ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:004.023a: tataḥ śakropayānaṃ tu paryapṛcchat sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:004.023c: śarabhaṅgaś ca tat sarvaṃ rāghavāya nyavedayat
GE09ram_03_u:004.024a: mām eṣa varado rāma brahmalokaṃ ninīṣati
GE09ram_03_u:004.025c: brahmalokaṃ na gacchāmi tvām adṛṣṭvā priyātithim
GE09ram_03_u:004.026c: akṣayā naraśārdūla jitā lokā mayā śubhāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:004.026e: brāhmyāś ca nākapṛṣṭhyāś ca pratigṛhṇīṣva māmakān
GE09ram_03_u:004.028c: āvāsaṃ tv aham icchāmi pradiṣṭam iha kānane
GE09ram_03_u:004.030a: sutīkṣṇam abhigaccha tvaṃ śucau deśe tapasvinam
GE09ram_03_u:004.030c: ramaṇīye vanoddeśe sa te vāsaṃ vidhāsyati
GE09ram_03_u:004.031a: eṣa panthā naravyāghra muhūrtaṃ paśya tāta mām
GE09ram_03_u:004.031c: yāvaj jahāmi gātrāṇi jīrṇaṃ tvacam ivoragaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:004.032a: tato 'gniṃ sa samādhāya hutvā cājyena mantravit
GE09ram_03_u:004.033a: tasya romāṇi keśāṃś ca dadāhāgnir mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:004.033c: jīrṇaṃ tvacaṃ tathāsthīni yac ca māṃsaṃ ca śoṇitam
GE09ram_03_u:004.035a: sa lokān āhitāgnīnām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
GE09ram_03_u:004.036a: sa puṇyakarmā bhuvane dvijarṣabhaḥ; pitāmahaṃ sānucaraṃ dadarśa ha
GE09ram_03_u:004.036c: pitāmahaś cāpi samīkṣya taṃ dvijaṃ; nananda susvāgatam ity uvāca ha
GE09ram_03_u:005.002c: aśmakuṭṭāś ca bahavaḥ patrāhārāś ca tāpasāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:005.006a: abhigamya ca dharmajñā rāmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam
GE09ram_03_u:005.007c: pradhānaś cāsi nāthaś ca devānāṃ maghavān iva
GE09ram_03_u:005.008a: viśrutas triṣu lokeṣu yaśasā vikrameṇa ca
GE09ram_03_u:005.008c: pitṛvratatvaṃ satyaṃ ca tvayi dharmaś ca puṣkalaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:005.009c: arthitvān nātha vakṣyāmas tac ca naḥ kṣantum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:005.010a: adhārmas tu mahāṃs tāta bhavet tasya mahīpateḥ
GE09ram_03_u:005.010c: yo hared baliṣaḍbhāgaṃ na ca rakṣati putravat
GE09ram_03_u:005.011a: yuñjānaḥ svān iva prāṇān prāṇair iṣṭān sutān iva
GE09ram_03_u:005.012a: prāpnoti śāśvatīṃ rāma kīrtiṃ sa bahuvārṣikīm
GE09ram_03_u:005.012c: brahmaṇaḥ sthānam āsādya tatra cāpi mahīyate
GE09ram_03_u:005.013a: yat karoti paraṃ dharmaṃ munir mūlaphalāśanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:005.013c: tatra rājñaś caturbhāgaḥ prajā dharmeṇa rakṣataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:005.014c: tvan nātho 'nāthavad rāma rākṣasair vadhyate bhṛśam
GE09ram_03_u:005.015c: hatānāṃ rākṣasair ghorair bahūnāṃ bahudhā vane
GE09ram_03_u:005.018a: tatas tvāṃ śaraṇārthaṃ ca śaraṇyaṃ samupasthitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:005.019a: etac chrutvā tu kākutsthas tāpasānāṃ tapasvinām
GE09ram_03_u:005.019c: idaṃ provāca dharmātmā sarvān eva tapasvinaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:005.019e: naivam arhatha māṃ vaktum ājñāpyo 'haṃ tapasvinam
GE09ram_03_u:005.020c: tasya me 'yaṃ vane vāso bhaviṣyati mahāphalaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:005.020e: tapasvināṃ raṇe śatrūn hantum icchāmi rākṣasān
GE09ram_03_u:005.021a: dattvā varaṃ cāpi tapodhanānāṃ; dharme dhṛtātmā sahalakṣmaṇena
GE09ram_03_u:005.021c: tapodhanaiś cāpi sahārya vṛttaḥ; sutīṣkṇam evābhijagāma vīraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:006.001a: rāmas tu sahito bhrātrā sītayā ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:006.002a: sa gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ nadīs tīrtva bahūdakāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:006.003a: tatas tad ikṣvākuvarau satataṃ vividhair drumaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:006.003c: kānanaṃ tau viviśatuḥ sītayā saha rāghavau
GE09ram_03_u:006.006a: rāmo 'ham asmi bhagavan bhavantaṃ draṣṭum āgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:006.007a: sa nirīkṣya tato vīraṃ rāmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam
GE09ram_03_u:006.007c: samāśliṣya ca bāhubhyām idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:006.008a: svāgataṃ khalu te vīra rāma dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE09ram_03_u:006.009c: devalokam ito vīra dehaṃ tyaktvā mahītale
GE09ram_03_u:006.010e: sarvāṃl lokāñ jitān āha mama puṇyena karmaṇā
GE09ram_03_u:006.013c: āvāsaṃ tv aham icchāmi pradiṣṭam iha kānane
GE09ram_03_u:006.015a: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa maharṣir lokaviśrutaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:006.016a: ayam evāśramo rāma guṇavān ramyatām iha
GE09ram_03_u:006.018a: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya maharṣer lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:006.018c: uvāca vacanaṃ dhīro vikṛṣya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:006.020a: bhavāṃs tatrābhiṣajyeta kiṃ syāt kṛcchrataraṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:006.020c: etasminn āśrame vāsaṃ ciraṃ tu na samarthaye
GE09ram_03_u:006.021a: tam evam uktvā varadaṃ rāmaḥ saṃdhyām upāgamat
GE09ram_03_u:006.021c: anvāsya paścimāṃ saṃdhyāṃ tatra vāsam akalpayat
GE09ram_03_u:006.022a: tataḥ śubhaṃ tāpasabhojyam annaṃ; svayaṃ sutīkṣṇaḥ puruṣarṣabhābhyām
GE09ram_03_u:006.022c: tābhyāṃ susatkṛtya dadau mahātmā; saṃdhyānivṛttau rajanīṃ samīkṣya
GE09ram_03_u:007.002a: utthāya tu yathākālaṃ rāghavaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:007.003a: atha te 'gniṃ surāṃś caiva vaidehī rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_03_u:007.005a: sukhoṣitāḥ sma bhagavaṃs tvayā pūjyena pūjitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:007.009a: tāvad icchāmahe gantum ity uktvā caraṇau muneḥ
GE09ram_03_u:007.010c: gāḍham āliṅgya sasneham idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:007.011a: ariṣṭaṃ gaccha panthānaṃ rāma saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_03_u:007.016a: gamyatāṃ vatsa saumitre bhavān api ca gacchatu
GE09ram_03_u:007.016c: āgantavyaṃ ca te dṛṣṭvā punar evāśramaṃ mama
GE09ram_03_u:007.017a: evam uktas tathety uktvā kākutsthaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:007.018c: dadau sītā tayor bhrātroḥ khaḍgau ca vimalau tataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:007.019a: ābadhya ca śubhe tūṇī cāpe cādāya sasvane
GE09ram_03_u:007.019c: niṣkrāntāv āśramād gantum ubhau tau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_03_u:008.001c: vaidehī snigdhayā vācā bhartāram idam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:008.002a: ayaṃ dharmaḥ susūkṣmeṇa vidhinā prāpyate mahān
GE09ram_03_u:008.002c: nivṛttena ca śakyo 'yaṃ vyasanāt kāmajād iha
GE09ram_03_u:008.003a: trīṇy eva vyasanāny atra kāmajāni bhavanty uta
GE09ram_03_u:008.003c: mithyā vākyaṃ paramakaṃ tasmād gurutarāv ubhau
GE09ram_03_u:008.004a: mithyāvākyaṃ na te bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:008.005a: tac ca sarvaṃ mahābāho śakyaṃ voḍhuṃ jitendriyaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:008.006c: nirvairaṃ kriyate mohāt tac ca te samupasthitam
GE09ram_03_u:008.008a: etannimittaṃ ca vanaṃ daṇḍakā iti viśrutam
GE09ram_03_u:008.009a: tatas tvāṃ prasthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā mama cintākulaṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:008.009c: tvad vṛttaṃ cintayantyā vai bhaven niḥśreyasaṃ hitam
GE09ram_03_u:008.010a: na hi me rocate vīra gamanaṃ daṇḍakān prati
GE09ram_03_u:008.010c: kāraṇaṃ tatra vakṣyāmi vadantyāḥ śrūyatāṃ mama
GE09ram_03_u:008.011a: tvaṃ hi bāṇadhanuṣpāṇir bhrātrā saha vanaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:008.011c: dṛṣṭvā vanacarān sarvān kaccit kuryāḥ śaravyayam
GE09ram_03_u:008.013a: purā kila mahābāho tapasvī satyavāk śuciḥ
GE09ram_03_u:008.013c: kasmiṃś cid abhavat puṇye vane ratamṛgadvije
GE09ram_03_u:008.014a: tasyaiva tapaso vighnaṃ kartum indraḥ śacīpatiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:008.015a: tasmiṃs tad āśramapade nihitaḥ khaḍga uttamaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:008.015c: sa nyāsavidhinā dattaḥ puṇye tapasi tiṣṭhataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:008.016c: vane tu vicaraty eva rakṣan pratyayam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:008.017a: yatra gacchaty upādātuṃ mūlāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:008.017c: na vinā yāti taṃ khaḍgaṃ nyāsarakṣaṇatatparaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:008.018a: nityaṃ śastraṃ parivahan krameṇa sa tapodhanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:008.018c: cakāra raudrīṃ svāṃ buddhiṃ tyaktvā tapasi niścayam
GE09ram_03_u:008.019c: tasya śastrasya saṃvāsāj jagāma narakaṃ muniḥ
GE09ram_03_u:008.020a: snehāc ca bahumānāc ca smāraye tvāṃ na śikṣaye
GE09ram_03_u:008.020c: na kathaṃ cana sā kāryā hṛhītadhanuṣā tvayā
GE09ram_03_u:008.021a: buddhir vairaṃ vinā hantuṃ rākṣasān daṇḍakāśritān
GE09ram_03_u:008.021c: aparādhaṃ vinā hantuṃ lokān vīra na kāmaye
GE09ram_03_u:008.023a: kva ca śastraṃ kva ca vanaṃ kva ca kṣātraṃ tapaḥ kva ca
GE09ram_03_u:008.023c: vyāviddham idam asmābhir deśadharmas tu pūjyatām
GE09ram_03_u:008.024c: punar gatvā tv ayodhyāyāṃ kṣatradharmaṃ cariṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:008.025a: akṣayā tu bhavet prītiḥ śvaśrū śvaśurayor mama
GE09ram_03_u:008.025c: yadi rājyaṃ hi saṃnyasya bhaves tvaṃ nirato muniḥ
GE09ram_03_u:008.026a: dharmād arthaḥ prabhavati dharmāt prabhavate sukham
GE09ram_03_u:008.026c: dharmeṇa labhate sarvaṃ dharmasāram idaṃ jagat
GE09ram_03_u:008.027a: ātmānaṃ niyamais tais taiḥ karṣayitvā prayatnataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:008.027c: prāpyate nipuṇair dharmo na sukhāl labhyate sukham
GE09ram_03_u:008.028a: nityaṃ śucimatiḥ saumya cara dharmaṃ tapovane
GE09ram_03_u:008.028c: sarvaṃ hi viditaṃ tubhyaṃ trailokyam api tattvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:008.029a: strīcāpalād etad udāhṛtaṃ me; dharmaṃ ca vaktuṃ tava kaḥ samarthaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:008.029c: vicārya buddhyā tu sahānujena; yad rocate tat kuru mācireṇa
GE09ram_03_u:009.001a: vākyam etat tu vaidehyā vyāhṛtaṃ bhartṛbhaktayā
GE09ram_03_u:009.001c: śrutvā dharme sthito rāmaḥ pratyuvācātha maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:009.002a: hitam uktaṃ tvayā devi snigdhayā sadṛśaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:009.003a: kiṃ tu vakṣyāmy ahaṃ devi tvayaivoktam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:009.003c: kṣatriyair dhāryate cāpo nārtaśabdo bhaved iti
GE09ram_03_u:009.004c: māṃ sīte svayam āgamya śaraṇyāḥ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:009.005c: na labhante sukhaṃ bhītā rākṣasaiḥ krūrakarmabhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:009.006a: kāle kāle ca niratā niyamair vividhair vane
GE09ram_03_u:009.008a: mayā tu vacanaṃ śrutvā teṣām evaṃ mukhāc cyutam
GE09ram_03_u:009.009a: prasīdantu bhavanto me hrīr eṣā hi mamātulā
GE09ram_03_u:009.009e: kiṃ karomīti ca mayā vyāhṛtaṃ dvijasaṃnidhau
GE09ram_03_u:009.010a: sarvair eva samāgamya vāg iyaṃ samudāhṛtā
GE09ram_03_u:009.010e: arditāḥ sma bhṛśaṃ rāma bhavān nas trātum arhati
GE09ram_03_u:009.012c: gatiṃ mṛgayamāṇānāṃ bhavān naḥ paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:009.013a: kāmaṃ tapaḥ prabhāvena śaktā hantuṃ niśācarān
GE09ram_03_u:009.013c: cirārjitaṃ tu necchāmas tapaḥ khaṇḍayituṃ vayam
GE09ram_03_u:009.014c: tena śāpaṃ na muñcāmo bhakṣyamāṇāś ca rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:009.015c: rakṣanas tvaṃ saha bhrātrā tvannāthā hi vayaṃ vane
GE09ram_03_u:009.016a: mayā caitad vacaḥ śrutvā kārtsnyena paripālanam
GE09ram_03_u:009.017a: saṃśrutya ca na śakṣyāmi jīvamānaḥ pratiśravam
GE09ram_03_u:009.017c: munīnām anyathā kartuṃ satyam iṣṭaṃ hi me sadā
GE09ram_03_u:009.018a: apy ahaṃ jīvitaṃ jahyāṃ tvāṃ vā sīte salakṣmaṇām
GE09ram_03_u:009.018c: na tu pratijñāṃ saṃśrutya brāhmaṇebhyo viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:009.019a: tad avaśyaṃ mayā kāryam ṛṣīṇāṃ paripālanam
GE09ram_03_u:009.019c: anuktenāpi vaidehi pratijñāya tu kiṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:009.020a: mama snehāc ca sauhārdād idam uktaṃ tvayā vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:009.020c: parituṣṭo 'smy ahaṃ sīte na hy aniṣṭo 'nuśiṣyate
GE09ram_03_u:009.020e: sadṛśaṃ cānurūpaṃ ca kulasya tava śobhane
GE09ram_03_u:009.021a: ity evam uktvā vacanaṃ mahātmā; sītāṃ priyāṃ maithila rājaputrīm
GE09ram_03_u:009.021c: rāmo dhanuṣmān sahalakṣmaṇena; jagāma ramyāṇi tapovanāni
GE09ram_03_u:010.001a: agrataḥ prayayau rāmaḥ sītā madhye sumadhyamā
GE09ram_03_u:010.002a: tau paśyamānau vividhāñ śailaprasthān vanāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:010.002c: nadīś ca vividhā ramyā jagmatuḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:010.003c: sarāṃsi ca sapadmāni yutāni jalajaiḥ khagaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:010.004c: mahiṣāṃś ca varāhāṃś ca gajāṃś ca drumavairiṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:010.005a: te gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ lambamāne divākare
GE09ram_03_u:010.007c: gītavāditranirghoṣo na tu kaś cana dṛśyate
GE09ram_03_u:010.008a: tataḥ kautūhalād rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:010.009a: idam atyadbhutaṃ śrutvā sarveṣāṃ no mahāmune
GE09ram_03_u:010.009c: kautūhalaṃ mahaj jātaṃ kim idaṃ sādhu kathyatām
GE09ram_03_u:010.010a: tenaivam ukto dharmātmā rāghaveṇa munis tadā
GE09ram_03_u:010.012a: sa hi tepe tapas tīvraṃ māṇḍakarṇir mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_03_u:010.013e: asmakaṃ kasya cit sthānam eṣa prārthayate muniḥ
GE09ram_03_u:010.014a: tataḥ kartuṃ tapovighnaṃ sarvair devair niyojitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:010.016c: taṭāke nirmitaṃ tāsām asminn antarhitaṃ gṛham
GE09ram_03_u:010.021a: praviśya saha vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:010.021c: tadā tasmin sa kākutsthaḥ śrīmaty āśramamaṇḍale
GE09ram_03_u:010.023a: yeṣām uṣitavān pūrvaṃ sakāśe sa mahāstravit
GE09ram_03_u:010.023c: kva cit paridaśān māsān ekaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ kva cit
GE09ram_03_u:010.024a: kva cic ca caturo māsān pañcaṣaṭ cāparān kva cit
GE09ram_03_u:010.024c: aparatrādhikān māsān adhyardham adhikaṃ kva cit
GE09ram_03_u:010.025a: trīn māsān aṣṭamāsāṃś ca rāghavo nyavasat sukham
GE09ram_03_u:010.025c: tathā saṃvasatas tasya munīnām āśrameṣu vai
GE09ram_03_u:010.026a: parisṛtya ca dharmajño rāghavaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:010.027a: sa tam āśramam āgamya munibhiḥ pratipūjitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:010.027c: tatrāpi nyavasad rāmaḥ kaṃ cit kālam ariṃdamaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:010.028a: athāśramastho vinayāt kadā cit taṃ mahāmunim
GE09ram_03_u:010.028c: upāsīnaḥ sa kākutsthaḥ sutīkṣṇam idam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:010.029c: vasatīti mayā nityaṃ kathāḥ kathayatāṃ śrutam
GE09ram_03_u:010.030a: na tu jānāmi taṃ deśaṃ vanasyāsya mahattayā
GE09ram_03_u:010.031a: prasādāt tatra bhavataḥ sānujaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:010.032c: yad ahaṃ taṃ munivaraṃ śuśrūṣeyam api svayam
GE09ram_03_u:010.033a: iti rāmasya sa muniḥ śrutvā dharmātmano vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:010.034a: aham apy etad eva tvāṃ vaktukāmaḥ salakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:010.035a: diṣṭyā tv idānīm arthe 'smin svayam eva bravīṣi mām
GE09ram_03_u:010.035c: aham ākhyāsi te vatsa yatrāgastyo mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_03_u:010.036a: yojanāny āśramāt tāta yāhi catvāri vai tataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:010.039a: tatraikāṃ rajanīm uṣya prabhāte rāma gamyatām
GE09ram_03_u:010.040e: raṃsyate tatra vaidehī lakṣmaṇaś ca tvayā saha
GE09ram_03_u:010.041c: yadi buddhiḥ kṛtā draṣṭum agastyaṃ taṃ mahāmunim
GE09ram_03_u:010.042a: iti rāmo muneḥ śrutvā saha bhrātrābhivādya ca
GE09ram_03_u:010.046a: yathā hīme vanasyāsya jñātāḥ pathi sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:010.047a: pippalīnāṃ ca pakvānāṃ vanād asmād upāgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:010.048a: tatra tatra ca dṛśyante saṃkṣiptāḥ kāṣṭhasaṃcayāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:010.048c: lūnāś ca pathi dṛśyante darbhā vaidūryavarcasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:010.051a: tat sutīkṣṇasya vacanaṃ yathā saumya mayā śrutam
GE09ram_03_u:010.052c: yasya bhrātrā kṛteyaṃ dik śaraṇyā puṇyakarmaṇā
GE09ram_03_u:010.053a: ihaikadā kila krūro vātāpir api celvalaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:010.054a: dhārayan brāhmaṇaṃ rūpam ilvalaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ vadan
GE09ram_03_u:010.054c: āmantrayati viprān sa śrāddham uddiśya nirghṛṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:010.055a: bhrātaraṃ saṃskṛtaṃ bhrātā tatas taṃ meṣarūpiṇam
GE09ram_03_u:010.055c: tān dvijān bhojayām āsa śrāddhadṛṣṭena karmaṇā
GE09ram_03_u:010.057a: tato bhrātur vacaḥ śrutvā vātāpir meṣavan nadan
GE09ram_03_u:010.059c: anubhūya kila śrāddhe bhakṣitaḥ sa mahāsuraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:010.060a: tataḥ saṃpannam ity uktvā dattvā hastāvasecanam
GE09ram_03_u:010.061a: taṃ tathā bhāṣamāṇaṃ tu bhrātaraṃ vipraghātinam
GE09ram_03_u:010.062a: kuto niṣkramituṃ śaktir mayā jīrṇasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:010.062c: bhrātus te meṣa rūpasya gatasya yamasādanam
GE09ram_03_u:010.063a: atha tasya vacaḥ śrutvā bhrātur nidhanasaṃśritam
GE09ram_03_u:010.067a: upāsya paścimāṃ saṃdhyāṃ saha bhrātrā yathāvidhi
GE09ram_03_u:010.068a: samyak pratigṛhītas tu muninā tena rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:010.068c: nyavasat tāṃ niśām ekāṃ prāśya mūlaphalāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:010.070a: abhivādaye tvā bhagavan sukham adhyuṣito niśām
GE09ram_03_u:010.070c: āmantraye tvāṃ gacchāmi guruṃ te draṣṭum agrajam
GE09ram_03_u:010.072a: nīvārān panasāṃs tālāṃs timiśān vañjulān dhavān
GE09ram_03_u:010.072c: ciribilvān madhūkāṃś ca bilvān api ca tindukān
GE09ram_03_u:010.076a: snigdhapatrā yathā vṛkṣā yathā kṣāntā mṛgadvijāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:010.077a: agastya iti vikhyāto loke svenaiva karmaṇā
GE09ram_03_u:010.080c: dig iyaṃ dakṣiṇā trāsād dṛśyate nopabhujyate
GE09ram_03_u:010.081a: yadā prabhṛti cākrāntā dig iyaṃ puṇyakarmaṇā
GE09ram_03_u:010.082a: nāmnā ceyaṃ bhagavato dakṣiṇā dik pradakṣiṇā
GE09ram_03_u:010.083c: saṃdeśaṃ pālayaṃs tasya vindhyaśaulo na vardhate
GE09ram_03_u:010.085a: eṣa lokārcitaḥ sādhur hite nityaṃ rataḥ satām
GE09ram_03_u:010.086c: śeṣaṃ ca vanavāsasya saumya vatsyāmy ahaṃ prabho
GE09ram_03_u:010.087a: atra devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:010.088a: nātra jīven mṛṣāvādī krūro vā yadi vā śaṭhaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:010.088c: nṛśaṃsaḥ kāma vṛtto vā munir eṣa tathāvidhaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:010.089a: atra devāś ca yakṣāś ca nāgāś ca patagaiḥ saha
GE09ram_03_u:010.090c: tyaktvā dehān navair dehaiḥ svaryātāḥ paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:010.091a: yakṣatvam amaratvaṃ ca rājyāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:010.091c: atra devāḥ prayacchanti bhūtair ārādhitāḥ śubhaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:010.092c: nivedayeha māṃ prāptam ṛṣaye saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:011.001c: agastyaśiṣyam āsādya vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_03_u:011.002a: rājā daśaratho nāma jyeṣṭhas tasya suto balī
GE09ram_03_u:011.002c: rāmaḥ prāpto muniṃ draṣṭuṃ bhāryayā saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:011.003a: lakṣmaṇo nāma tasyāhaṃ bhrātā tv avarajo hitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:011.003c: anukūlaś ca bhaktaś ca yadi te śrotram āgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:011.004a: te vayaṃ vanam atyugraṃ praviṣṭāḥ pitṛśāsanāt
GE09ram_03_u:011.006a: sa praviśya muni śreṣṭhaṃ tapasā duṣpradharṣaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:011.007a: putrau daśarathasyemau rāmo lakṣmaṇa eva ca
GE09ram_03_u:011.009a: tataḥ śiṣyād upaśrutya prāptaṃ rāmaṃ salakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:011.009c: vaidehīṃ ca mahābhāgām idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:011.010a: diṣṭyā rāmaś cirasyādya draṣṭuṃ māṃ samupāgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:011.010c: manasā kāṅkṣitaṃ hy asya mayāpy āgamanaṃ prati
GE09ram_03_u:011.011c: praveśyatāṃ samīpaṃ me kiṃ cāsau na praveśitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:011.012a: evam uktas tu muninā dharmajñena mahātmanā
GE09ram_03_u:011.013a: tato niṣkramya saṃbhrāntaḥ śiṣyo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:011.013c: kvāsau rāmo muniṃ draṣṭum etu praviśatu svayam
GE09ram_03_u:011.014c: darśayām āsa kākutsthaṃ sītāṃ ca janakātmajām
GE09ram_03_u:011.015a: taṃ śiṣyaḥ praśritaṃ vākyam agastyavacanaṃ bruvan
GE09ram_03_u:011.017a: sa tatra brahmaṇaḥ sthānam agneḥ sthānaṃ tathaiva ca
GE09ram_03_u:011.017c: viṣṇoḥ sthānaṃ mahendrasya sthānaṃ caiva vivasvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:011.018a: somasthānaṃ bhagasthānaṃ sthānaṃ kauberam eva ca
GE09ram_03_u:011.018c: dhātur vidhātuḥ sthānaṃ ca vāyoḥ sthānaṃ tathaiva ca
GE09ram_03_u:011.019a: tataḥ śiṣyaiḥ parivṛto munir apy abhiniṣpatat
GE09ram_03_u:011.020a: eṣa lakṣmaṇa niṣkrāmaty agastyo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:011.022a: abhivādya tu dharmātmā tasthau rāmaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_03_u:011.022c: sītayā saha vaidehyā tadā rāma salakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:011.023c: kuśalapraśnam uktvā ca āsyatām iti so 'bravīt
GE09ram_03_u:011.024a: agniṃ hutvā pradāyārghyam atithiṃ pratipūjya ca
GE09ram_03_u:011.024c: vānaprasthena dharmeṇa sa teṣāṃ bhojanaṃ dadau
GE09ram_03_u:011.026c: duḥsākṣīva pare loke svāni māṃsāni bhakṣayet
GE09ram_03_u:011.027c: pūjanīyaś ca mānyaś ca bhavān prāptaḥ priyātithiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:011.028a: evam uktvā phalair mūlaiḥ puṣpaiś cānyaiś ca rāghavam
GE09ram_03_u:011.031a: saṃpūrṇau niśitair bāṇair jvaladbhir iva pāvakaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:011.032a: anena dhanuṣā rāma hatvā saṃkhye mahāsurān
GE09ram_03_u:011.032c: ājahāra śriyaṃ dīptāṃ purā viṣṇur divaukasām
GE09ram_03_u:011.033a: tad dhanus tau ca tūṇīrau śaraṃ khaḍgaṃ ca mānada
GE09ram_03_u:011.034a: evam uktvā mahātejāḥ samastaṃ tad varāyudham
GE09ram_03_u:011.034c: dattvā rāmāya bhagavān agastyaḥ punar abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:012.001a: rāma prīto 'smi bhadraṃ te parituṣṭo 'smi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:012.001c: abhivādayituṃ yan māṃ prāptau sthaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:012.003a: eṣā hi sukumārī ca duḥkhaiś ca na vimānitā
GE09ram_03_u:012.004a: yathaiṣā ramate rāma iha sītā tathā kuru
GE09ram_03_u:012.004c: duṣkaraṃ kṛtavaty eṣā vane tvām anugacchatī
GE09ram_03_u:012.005a: eṣā hi prakṛtiḥ strīṇām āsṛṣṭe raghunandana
GE09ram_03_u:012.007a: iyaṃ tu bhavato bhāryā doṣair etair vivarjitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:012.007c: ślāghyā ca vyapadeśyā ca yathā devī hy arundhatī
GE09ram_03_u:012.008a: alaṃkṛto 'yaṃ deśaś ca yatra saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_03_u:012.008c: vaidehyā cānayā rāma vatsyasi tvam ariṃdama
GE09ram_03_u:012.009a: evam uktas tu muninā rāghavaḥ saṃyatāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_03_u:012.009c: uvāca praśritaṃ vākyam ṛṣiṃ dīptam ivānalam
GE09ram_03_u:012.011a: kiṃ tu vyādiśa me deśaṃ sodakaṃ bahukānanam
GE09ram_03_u:012.012a: tato 'bravīn muni śreṣṭhaḥ śrutvā rāmasya bhāṣitam
GE09ram_03_u:012.012c: dhyātvā muhūrtaṃ dharmātmā dhīro dhīrataraṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:012.014c: ramasva tvaṃ pitur vākyaṃ yathoktam anupālayan
GE09ram_03_u:012.015a: vidito hy eṣa vṛttānto mama sarvas tavānagha
GE09ram_03_u:012.015c: tapasaś ca prabhāvena snehād daśarathasya ca
GE09ram_03_u:012.016a: hṛdayasthaś ca te chando vijñātas tapasā mayā
GE09ram_03_u:012.016c: iha vāsaṃ pratijñāya mayā saha tapovane
GE09ram_03_u:012.017a: ataś ca tvām ahaṃ brūmi gaccha pañcavaṭīm iti
GE09ram_03_u:012.017c: sa hi ramyo vanoddeśo maithilī tatra raṃsyate
GE09ram_03_u:012.018a: sa deśaḥ ślāghanīyaś ca nātidūre ca rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:012.018c: godāvaryāḥ samīpe ca maithilī tatra raṃsyate
GE09ram_03_u:012.019c: viviktaś ca mahābāho puṇyo ramyas tathaiva ca
GE09ram_03_u:012.020a: bhavān api sadāraś ca śaktaś ca parirakṣaṇe
GE09ram_03_u:012.020c: api cātra vasan rāmas tāpasān pālayiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:012.021a: etad ālakṣyate vīra madhukānāṃ mahad vanam
GE09ram_03_u:012.023a: agastyenaivam uktas tu rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_03_u:012.025a: gṛhītacāpau tu narādhipātmajau; viṣaktatūṇī samareṣv akātarau
GE09ram_03_u:012.025c: yathopadiṣṭena pathā maharṣiṇā; prajagmatuḥ pañcavaṭīṃ samāhitau
GE09ram_03_u:013.002a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā tau mahābhāgau vanasthaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_03_u:013.002c: menāte rākṣasaṃ pakṣiṃ bruvāṇau ko bhavān iti
GE09ram_03_u:013.003a: sa tau madhurayā vācā saumyayā prīṇayann iva
GE09ram_03_u:013.003c: uvāca vatsa māṃ viddhi vayasyaṃ pitur ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:013.004a: sa taṃ pitṛsakhaṃ buddhvā pūjayām āsa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:013.004c: sa tasya kulam avyagram atha papraccha nāma ca
GE09ram_03_u:013.005a: rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā kulam ātmānam eva ca
GE09ram_03_u:013.006c: tān me nigadataḥ sarvān āditaḥ śṛṇu rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:013.007c: śeṣaś ca saṃśrayaś caiva bahuputraś ca vīryavān
GE09ram_03_u:013.008a: sthāṇur marīcir atriś ca kratuś caiva mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:013.008c: pulastyaś cāṅgirāś caiva pracetāḥ pulahas tathā
GE09ram_03_u:013.009c: kaśyapaś ca mahātejās teṣām āsīc ca paścimaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:013.010a: prajāpates tu dakṣasya babhūvur iti naḥ śrutam
GE09ram_03_u:013.011c: aditiṃ ca ditiṃ caiva danūm api ca kālakām
GE09ram_03_u:013.012a: tāmrāṃ krodhavaśāṃ caiva manuṃ cāpy analām api
GE09ram_03_u:013.012c: tās tu kanyās tataḥ prītaḥ kaśyapaḥ punar abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:013.013a: putrāṃs trailokyabhartṝn vai janayiṣyatha mat samān
GE09ram_03_u:013.013c: aditis tan manā rāma ditiś ca danur eva ca
GE09ram_03_u:013.014a: kālakā ca mahābāho śeṣās tv amanaso 'bhavan
GE09ram_03_u:013.015a: ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau ca paraṃtapa
GE09ram_03_u:013.015c: ditis tv ajanayat putrān daityāṃs tāta yaśasvinaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:013.016c: danus tv ajanayat putram aśvagrīvam ariṃdama
GE09ram_03_u:013.017c: krauñcīṃ bhāsīṃ tathā śyenīṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrīṃ tathā śukīm
GE09ram_03_u:013.018c: ulūkāñ janayat krauñcī bhāsī bhāsān vyajāyata
GE09ram_03_u:013.019a: śyenī śyenāṃś ca gṛdhrāṃś ca vyajāyata sutejasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:013.019c: dhṛtarāṣṭrī tu haṃsāṃś ca kalahaṃsāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:013.020a: cakravākāṃś ca bhadraṃ te vijajñe sāpi bhāminī
GE09ram_03_u:013.020c: śukī natāṃ vijajñe tu natāyā vinatā sutā
GE09ram_03_u:013.021c: mṛgīṃ ca mṛgamandāṃ ca harīṃ bhadramadām api
GE09ram_03_u:013.022a: mātaṅgīm atha śārdūlīṃ śvetāṃ ca surabhīṃ tathā
GE09ram_03_u:013.023a: apatyaṃ tu mṛgāḥ sarve mṛgyā naravarottama
GE09ram_03_u:013.023c: ṛṣkāś ca mṛgamandāyāḥ sṛmarāś camarās tathā
GE09ram_03_u:013.024a: tatas tv irāvatīṃ nāma jajñe bhadramadā sutām
GE09ram_03_u:013.024c: tasyās tv airāvataḥ putro lokanātho mahāgajaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:013.025a: haryāś ca harayo 'patyaṃ vānarāś ca tapasvinaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:013.025c: golāṅgūlāṃś ca śārdūlī vyāghrāṃś cājanayat sutān
GE09ram_03_u:013.026a: mātaṅgyās tv atha mātaṅgā apatyaṃ manujarṣabha
GE09ram_03_u:013.026c: diśāgajaṃ tu śvetākṣaṃ śvetā vyajanayat sutam
GE09ram_03_u:013.027a: tato duhitarau rāma surabhir devy ajāyata
GE09ram_03_u:013.027c: rohiṇīṃ nāma bhadraṃ te gandharvīṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_03_u:013.028a: rohiṇy ajanayad gā vai gandharvī vājinaḥ sutān
GE09ram_03_u:013.028c: surasājanayan nāgān rāma kadrūś ca pannagān
GE09ram_03_u:013.029c: brāhmaṇān kṣatriyān vaiśyāñ śūdrāṃś ca manujarṣabha
GE09ram_03_u:013.030a: mukhato brāhmaṇā jātā urasaḥ kṣatriyās tathā
GE09ram_03_u:013.030c: ūrubhyāṃ jajñire vaiśyāḥ padbhyāṃ śūdrā iti śrutiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:013.031c: vinatā ca śukī pautrī kadrūś ca surasā svasā
GE09ram_03_u:013.032c: dvau putrau vinatāyās tu garuḍo 'ruṇa eva ca
GE09ram_03_u:013.033a: tasmāj jāto 'ham aruṇāt saṃpātiś ca mamāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:013.033c: jaṭāyur iti māṃ viddhi śyenīputram ariṃdama
GE09ram_03_u:013.034c: sītāṃ ca tāta rakṣiṣye tvayi yāte salakṣmaṇe
GE09ram_03_u:013.035a: jaṭāyuṣaṃ tu pratipūjya rāghavo; mudā pariṣvajya ca saṃnato 'bhavat
GE09ram_03_u:013.035c: pitur hi śuśrāva sakhitvam ātmavāñ; jaṭāyuṣā saṃkathitaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:013.036a: sa tatra sītāṃ paridāya maithilīṃ; sahaiva tenātibalena pakṣiṇā
GE09ram_03_u:013.036c: jagāma tāṃ pañcavaṭīṃ salakṣmaṇo; ripūn didhakṣañ śalabhān ivānalaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:014.002a: āgatāḥ sma yathoddiṣṭam amuṃ deśaṃ maharṣiṇā
GE09ram_03_u:014.003a: sarvataś cāryatāṃ dṛṣṭiḥ kānane nipuṇo hy asi
GE09ram_03_u:014.003c: āśramaḥ katarasmin no deśe bhavati saṃmataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:014.004a: ramate yatra vaidehī tvam ahaṃ caiva lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:014.006a: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakmaṇaḥ saṃyatāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_03_u:014.006c: sītā samakṣaṃ kākutstham idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:014.007a: paravān asmi kākutstha tvayi varṣaśataṃ sthite
GE09ram_03_u:014.007c: svayaṃ tu rucire deśe kriyatām iti māṃ vada
GE09ram_03_u:014.009a: sa taṃ ruciram ākramya deśam āśramakarmaṇi
GE09ram_03_u:014.009c: haste gṛhītvā hastena rāmaḥ saumitrim abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:014.010a: ayaṃ deśaḥ samaḥ śrīmān puṣpitair tarubhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:014.012c: iyaṃ godāvarī ramyā puṣpitais tarubhir vṛtā
GE09ram_03_u:014.014c: dṛśyante girayaḥ saumya phullais tarubhir āvṛtāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:014.015a: sauvarṇe rājatais tāmrair deśe deśe ca dhātubhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:014.016a: sālais tālais tamālaiś ca kharjūraiḥ panasāmrakaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:014.017a: cūtair aśokais tilakaiś campakaiḥ ketakair api
GE09ram_03_u:014.018a: candanaiḥ syandanair nīpaiḥ panasair lakucair api
GE09ram_03_u:014.019a: idaṃ puṇyam idaṃ medhyam idaṃ bahumṛgadvijam
GE09ram_03_u:014.019c: iha vatsyāma saumitre sārdham etena pakṣiṇā
GE09ram_03_u:014.020a: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā
GE09ram_03_u:014.022a: sa gatvā lakṣmaṇaḥ śrīmān nadīṃ godāvarīṃ tadā
GE09ram_03_u:014.022c: snātvā padmāni cādāya saphalaḥ punar āgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:014.023a: tataḥ puṣpabaliṃ kṛtvā śāntiṃ ca sa yathāvidhi
GE09ram_03_u:014.023c: darśayām āsa rāmāya tad āśramapadaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:014.024a: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛtaṃ saumyam āśramaṃ saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:014.025c: atisnigdhaṃ ca gāḍhaṃ ca vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:014.026a: prīto 'smi te mahat karma tvayā kṛtam idaṃ prabho
GE09ram_03_u:014.026c: pradeyo yannimittaṃ te pariṣvaṅgo mayā kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:014.027c: tvayā putreṇa dharmātmā na saṃvṛttaḥ pitā mama
GE09ram_03_u:014.028a: evaṃ lakṣmaṇam uktvā tu rāghavo lakṣmivardhanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:014.028c: tasmin deśe bahuphale nyavasat sa sukhaṃ vaśī
GE09ram_03_u:014.029a: kaṃ cit kālaṃ sa dharmātmā sītayā lakṣmaṇena ca
GE09ram_03_u:015.001a: vasatas tasya tu mukhaṃ rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:015.002a: sa kadā cit prabhātāyāṃ śarvaryāṃ raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:015.003a: prahvaḥ kalaśahastas taṃ sītayā saha vīryavān
GE09ram_03_u:015.004a: ayaṃ sa kālaḥ saṃprāptaḥ priyo yas te priyaṃvada
GE09ram_03_u:015.014c: sīteva cātapa śyāmā lakṣyate na tu śobhate
GE09ram_03_u:015.018c: dūram abhyuditaḥ sūryaḥ śaśāṅka iva lakṣyate
GE09ram_03_u:015.019c: saṃraktaḥ kiṃ cid āpāṇḍur ātapaḥ śobhate kṣitau
GE09ram_03_u:015.023c: śaityād agāgrastham api prāyeṇa rasavaj jalam
GE09ram_03_u:015.025c: tapaś carati dharmātmā tvadbhaktyā bharataḥ pure
GE09ram_03_u:015.026a: tyaktvā rājyaṃ ca mānaṃ ca bhogāṃś ca vividhān bahūn
GE09ram_03_u:015.027a: so 'pi velām imāṃ nūnam abhiṣekārtham udyataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:015.027c: vṛtaḥ prakṛtibhir nityaṃ prayāti sarayūṃ nadīm
GE09ram_03_u:015.029c: dharmajñaḥ satyavādī ca hrī niṣedho jitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:015.031a: jitaḥ svargas tava bhrātrā bharatena mahātmanā
GE09ram_03_u:015.031c: vanastham api tāpasye yas tvām anuvidhīyate
GE09ram_03_u:015.032a: na pitryam anuvarntante mātṛkaṃ dvipadā iti
GE09ram_03_u:015.033a: bhartā daśaratho yasyāḥ sādhuś ca bharataḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:015.033c: kathaṃ nu sāmbā kaikeyī tādṛśī krūradarśinī
GE09ram_03_u:015.034a: ity evaṃ lakṣmaṇe vākyaṃ snehād bruvati dharmike
GE09ram_03_u:015.035a: na te 'mbā madhyamā tāta garhitavyā kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_03_u:015.036a: niścitāpi hi me buddhir vanavāse dṛḍhavratā
GE09ram_03_u:015.037a: ity evaṃ vilapaṃs tatra prāpya godāvarīṃ nadīm
GE09ram_03_u:015.038a: tarpayitvātha salilais te pitṝn daivatāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:015.038c: stuvanti smoditaṃ sūryaṃ devatāś ca samāhitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:015.039a: kṛtābhiṣekaḥ sa rarāja rāmaḥ; sītādvitīyaḥ saha lakṣmaṇena
GE09ram_03_u:015.039c: kṛtābhiṣekas tv agarājaputryā; rudraḥ sanandir bhagavān iveśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:016.001a: kṛtābhiṣeko rāmas tu sītā saumitrir eva ca
GE09ram_03_u:016.001c: tasmād godāvarītīrāt tato jagmuḥ svam āśramam
GE09ram_03_u:016.003a: sa rāmaḥ parṇaśālāyām āsīnaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:016.003e: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā cakāra vividhāḥ kathāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:016.004c: taṃ deśaṃ rākṣasī kā cid ājagāma yadṛcchayā
GE09ram_03_u:016.005a: sā tu śūrpaṇakhā nāma daśagrīvasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:016.011c: āgatas tvam imaṃ deśaṃ kathaṃ rākṣasasevitam
GE09ram_03_u:016.012a: evam uktas tu rākṣasyā śūrpaṇakhyā paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:016.013c: tasyāham agrajaḥ putro rāmo nāma janaiḥ śrutaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:016.014a: bhrātāyaṃ lakṣmaṇo nāma yavīyān mām anuvrataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:016.014c: iyaṃ bhāryā ca vaidehī mama sīteti viśrutā
GE09ram_03_u:016.015a: niyogāt tu narendrasya pitur mātuś ca yantritaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:016.015c: dharmārthaṃ dharmakāṅkṣī ca vanaṃ vastum ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:016.016a: tvāṃ tu veditum icchāmi kathyatāṃ kāsi kasya vā
GE09ram_03_u:016.016c: iha vā kiṃnimittaṃ tvam āgatā brūhi tattvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:016.017c: śrūyatāṃ rāma vakṣyāmi tattvārthaṃ vacanaṃ mama
GE09ram_03_u:016.019a: rāvaṇo nāma me bhrātā rākṣaso rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:016.020a: vibhīṣaṇas tu dharmātmā na tu rākṣasaceṣṭitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:016.021e: cirāya bhava bhartā me sītayā kiṃ kariṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:016.022a: vikṛtā ca virūpā ca na seyaṃ sadṛśī tava
GE09ram_03_u:016.022c: aham evānurūpā te bhāryā rūpeṇa paśya mām
GE09ram_03_u:016.025a: ity evam uktaḥ kākutsthaḥ prahasya madirekṣaṇām
GE09ram_03_u:017.003a: anujas tv eṣa me bhrātā śīlavān priyadarśanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:017.003c: śrīmān akṛtadāraś ca lakṣmaṇo nāma vīryavān
GE09ram_03_u:017.004c: anurūpaś ca te bhartā rūpasyāsya bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:017.005a: enaṃ bhaja viśālākṣi bhartāraṃ bhrātaraṃ mama
GE09ram_03_u:017.006c: visṛjya rāmaṃ sahasā tato lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:017.007a: asya rūpasya te yuktā bhāryāhaṃ varavarṇinī
GE09ram_03_u:017.007c: mayā saha sukhaṃ sarvān daṇḍakān vicariṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:017.008a: evam uktas tu saumitrī rākṣasyā vākyakovidaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:017.008c: tataḥ śūrpaṇakhīṃ smitvā lakṣmaṇo yuktam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:017.009a: kathaṃ dāsasya me dāsī bhāryā bhavitum icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:017.010c: āryasya tvaṃ viśālākṣi bhāryā bhava yavīyasī
GE09ram_03_u:017.011c: bhāryāṃ vṛddhāṃ parityajya tvām evaiṣa bhajiṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:017.012a: ko hi rūpam idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ saṃtyajya varavarṇini
GE09ram_03_u:017.015c: vṛddhāṃ bhāryām avaṣṭabhya na māṃ tvaṃ bahu manyase
GE09ram_03_u:017.018c: nigṛhya rāmaḥ kupitas tato lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:017.019a: krūrair anāryaiḥ saumitre parihāsaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_03_u:017.019c: na kāryaḥ paśya vaidehīṃ kathaṃ cit saumya jīvatīm
GE09ram_03_u:017.021a: ity ukto lakṣmaṇas tasyāḥ kruddho rāmasya paśyataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:017.022a: nikṛttakarṇanāsā tu visvaraṃ sā vinadya ca
GE09ram_03_u:017.023c: nanāda vividhān nādān yathā prāvṛṣi toyadaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:017.025a: tatas tu sā rākṣasasaṃgha saṃvṛtaṃ; kharaṃ janasthānagataṃ virūpitā
GE09ram_03_u:017.025c: upetya taṃ bhrātaram ugratejasaṃ; papāta bhūmau gaganād yathāśaniḥ
GE09ram_03_u:017.026a: tataḥ sabhāryaṃ bhayamohamūrchitā; salakṣmaṇaṃ rāghavam āgataṃ vanam
GE09ram_03_u:017.026c: virūpaṇaṃ cātmani śoṇitokṣitā; śaśaṃsa sarvaṃ bhaginī kharasya sā
GE09ram_03_u:018.001a: tāṃ tathā patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā virūpāṃ śoṇitokṣitām
GE09ram_03_u:018.002c: imām avasthāṃ nītā tvaṃ kenāntakasamā gatā
GE09ram_03_u:018.003c: ko 'yam evaṃ mahāvīryas tvāṃ virūpāṃ cakāra ha
GE09ram_03_u:018.004a: na hi paśyāmy ahaṃ loke yaḥ kuryān mama vipriyam
GE09ram_03_u:018.005c: salile kṣīram āsaktaṃ niṣpibann iva sārasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:018.006c: saphenaṃ rudhiraṃ raktaṃ medinī kasya pāsyati
GE09ram_03_u:018.007a: kasya patrarathāḥ kāyān māṃsam utkṛtya saṃgatāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:018.008a: taṃ na devā na gandharvā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:018.009a: upalabhya śanaiḥ saṃjñāṃ taṃ me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:018.009c: yena tvaṃ durvinītena vane vikramya nirjitā
GE09ram_03_u:018.010a: iti bhrātur vacaḥ śrutvā kruddhasya ca viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:018.010c: tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā vākyaṃ sabāṣpam idam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:018.012c: devau vā mānuṣau vā tau na tarkayitum utsahe
GE09ram_03_u:018.013c: dṛṣṭā tatra mayā nārī tayor madhye sumadhyamā
GE09ram_03_u:018.014a: tābhyām ubhābhyāṃ saṃbhūya pramadām adhikṛtya tām
GE09ram_03_u:018.015a: tasyāś cānṛjuvṛttāyās tayoś ca hatayor aham
GE09ram_03_u:018.016a: eṣa me prathamaḥ kāmaḥ kṛtas tāta tvayā bhavet
GE09ram_03_u:018.016c: tasyās tayoś ca rudhiraṃ pibeyam aham āhave
GE09ram_03_u:018.019a: tau hatvā tāṃ ca durvṛttām upāvartitum arhatha
GE09ram_03_u:018.019c: iyaṃ ca rudhiraṃ teṣāṃ bhaginī mama pāsyati
GE09ram_03_u:018.020c: śīghraṃ saṃpadyatāṃ gatvā tau pramathya svatejasā
GE09ram_03_u:018.021c: tatra jagmus tayā sārdhaṃ ghanā vāteritā yathā
GE09ram_03_u:019.001c: rakṣasām ācacakṣe tau bhrātarau saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:019.002c: dadṛśuḥ sītayā sārdhaṃ vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca
GE09ram_03_u:019.003a: tān dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ śrīmān āgatāṃ tāṃ ca rākṣasīm
GE09ram_03_u:019.004c: imān asyā vadhiṣyāmi padavīm āgatān iha
GE09ram_03_u:019.005a: vākyam etat tataḥ śrutvā rāmasya viditātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:019.006c: cakāra sajyaṃ dharmātmā tāni rakṣāṃsi cābravīt
GE09ram_03_u:019.010c: yadi prāṇair ihārtho vo nivartadhvaṃ niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:019.011a: tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasās te caturdaśa
GE09ram_03_u:019.013a: krodham utpādya no bhartuḥ kharasya sumahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:019.013c: tvam eva hāsyase prāṇān adyāsmābhir hato yudhi
GE09ram_03_u:019.014a: kā hi te śaktir ekasya bahūnāṃ raṇamūrdhani
GE09ram_03_u:019.014c: asmākam agrataḥ sthātuṃ kiṃ punar yoddhum āhave
GE09ram_03_u:019.015c: prāṇāṃs tyakṣyasi vīryaṃ ca dhanuś ca karapīḍitam
GE09ram_03_u:019.016a: ity evam uktvā saṃrabdhā rākṣasās te caturdaśa
GE09ram_03_u:019.016e: cikṣipus tāni śūlāni rāghavaṃ prati durjayam
GE09ram_03_u:019.019a: gṛhītvā dhanur āyamya lakṣyān uddiśya rākṣasān
GE09ram_03_u:019.019c: mumoca rāghavo bāṇān vajrān iva śatakratuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:019.021a: te bhittvā rakṣasāṃ vegād vakṣāṃsi rudhirāplutāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:019.022a: te bhinnahṛdayā bhūmau chinnamūlā iva drumāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:019.023a: tān bhūmau patitān dṛṣṭvā rākṣasī krodhamūrchitā
GE09ram_03_u:019.023c: paritrastā punas tatra vyasṛjad bhairavaṃ ravam
GE09ram_03_u:019.024a: sā nadantī mahānādaṃ javāc chūrpaṇakhā punaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:019.024c: upagamya kharaṃ sā tu kiṃ cit saṃśuṣka śoṇitā
GE09ram_03_u:019.025a: nipātitān prekṣya raṇe tu rākṣasān; pradhāvitā śūrpaṇakhā punas tataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:019.025c: vadhaṃ ca teṣāṃ nikhilena rakṣasāṃ; śaśaṃsa sarvaṃ bhaginī kharasya sā
GE09ram_03_u:020.001a: sa punaḥ patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā krodhāc chūrpaṇakhāṃ kharaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:020.001c: uvāca vyaktatā vācā tām anarthārtham āgatām
GE09ram_03_u:020.002a: mayā tv idānīṃ śūrās te rākṣasā rudhirāśanāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:020.003a: bhaktāś caivānuraktāś ca hitāś ca mama nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:020.003c: ghnanto 'pi na nihantavyā na na kuryur vaco mama
GE09ram_03_u:020.004a: kim etac chrotum icchāmi kāraṇaṃ yatkṛte punaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:020.004c: hā nātheti vinardantī sarpavad veṣṭase kṣitau
GE09ram_03_u:020.005a: anāthavad vilapasi kiṃ nu nāthe mayi sthite
GE09ram_03_u:020.005c: uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha mā bhaiṣīr vaiklavyaṃ tyajyatām iha
GE09ram_03_u:020.006a: ity evam uktā durdharṣā khareṇa parisāntvitā
GE09ram_03_u:020.006c: vimṛjya nayane sāsre kharaṃ bhrātaram abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:020.007a: preṣitāś ca tvayā śūrā rākṣasās te caturdaśa
GE09ram_03_u:020.009a: tān bhūmau patitān dṛṣṭvā kṣaṇenaiva mahābalān
GE09ram_03_u:020.009c: rāmasya ca mahat karma mahāṃs trāso 'bhavan mama
GE09ram_03_u:020.010a: sāsmi bhītā samudvignā viṣaṇṇā ca niśācara
GE09ram_03_u:020.010c: śaraṇaṃ tvāṃ punaḥ prāptā sarvato bhayadarśinī
GE09ram_03_u:020.011c: kiṃ māṃ na trāyase magnāṃ vipule śokasāgare
GE09ram_03_u:020.012a: ete ca nihatā bhūmau rāmeṇa niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:020.012c: ye ca me padavīṃ prāptā rākṣasāḥ piśitāśanāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:020.013a: mayi te yady anukrośo yadi rakṣaḥsu teṣu ca
GE09ram_03_u:020.013c: rāmeṇa yadi śaktis te tejo vāsti niśācara
GE09ram_03_u:020.014a: yadi rāmaṃ mamāmitram adya tvaṃ na vadhiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:020.015a: buddhyāham anupaśyāmi na tvaṃ rāmasya saṃyuge
GE09ram_03_u:020.016c: mānuṣau yan na śaknoṣi hantuṃ tau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_03_u:020.017c: niḥsattvasyālpavīryasya vāsas te kīdṛśas tv iha
GE09ram_03_u:020.018e: bhrātā cāsya mahāvīryo yena cāsmi virūpitā
GE09ram_03_u:021.001a: evam ādharṣitaḥ śūraḥ śūrpaṇakhyā kharas tadā
GE09ram_03_u:021.001c: uvāca rakṣasāṃ madhye kharaḥ kharataraṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:021.003a: na rāmaṃ gaṇaye vīryān mānuṣaṃ kṣīṇajīvitam
GE09ram_03_u:021.003c: ātmā duścaritaiḥ prāṇān hato yo 'dya vimokṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:021.004a: bāṣpaḥ saṃhriyatām eṣa saṃbhramaś ca vimucyatām
GE09ram_03_u:021.004c: ahaṃ rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā nayāmi yamasādanam
GE09ram_03_u:021.005c: rāmasya rudhiraṃ raktam uṣṇaṃ pāsyasi rākṣasi
GE09ram_03_u:021.006a: sā prahṛṣṭvā vacaḥ śrutvā kharasya vadanāc cyutam
GE09ram_03_u:021.006c: praśaśaṃsa punar maurkhyād bhrātaraṃ rakṣasāṃ varam
GE09ram_03_u:021.007a: tayā paruṣitaḥ pūrvaṃ punar eva praśaṃsitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:021.007c: abravīd dūṣaṇaṃ nāma kharaḥ senāpatiṃ tadā
GE09ram_03_u:021.011a: upasthāpaya me kṣipraṃ rathaṃ saumya dhanūṃṣi ca
GE09ram_03_u:021.011c: śarāṃś ca citrān khaḍgāṃś ca śaktīś ca vividhāḥ śitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:021.015a: matsyaiḥ puṣpair drumaiḥ śailaiś candrasūryaiś ca kāñcanaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:021.015c: māṅgalyaiḥ pakṣisaṃghaiś ca tārābhiś ca samāvṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:021.020a: mudgaraiḥ paṭṭiśaiḥ śūlaiḥ sutīkṣṇaiś ca paraśvadhaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:021.020c: khaḍgaiś cakraiś ca hastasthair bhrājamānaiś ca tomaraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:021.021a: śaktibhiḥ patighair ghorair atimātraiś ca kārmukaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:021.023a: tāṃs tv abhidravato dṛṣṭvā rākṣasān bhīmavikramān
GE09ram_03_u:021.023c: kharasyāpi rathaḥ kiṃ cij jagāma tadanantaram
GE09ram_03_u:021.025a: sa codito rathaḥ śīghraṃ kharasya ripughātinaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:021.025c: śabdenāpūrayām āsa diśaś ca pratiśas tathā
GE09ram_03_u:021.026a: pravṛddhamanyus tu kharaḥ kharasvano; ripor vadhārthaṃ tvarito yathāntakaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:021.026c: acūcudat sārathim unnadan punar; mahābalo megha ivāśmavarṣavān
GE09ram_03_u:022.001a: tat prayātaṃ balaṃ ghoram aśivaṃ śoṇitodakam
GE09ram_03_u:022.006a: vyājahruś ca padīptāyāṃ diśi vai bhairavasvanam
GE09ram_03_u:022.006c: aśivā yātu dāhānāṃ śivā ghorā mahāsvanāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:022.007c: ākāśaṃ tad anākāśaṃ cakrur bhīmā balāhakāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:022.008c: diśo vā vidiśo vāpi suvyaktaṃ na cakāśire
GE09ram_03_u:022.009c: kharasyābhimukhaṃ nedus tadā ghorā mṛgāḥ khagāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:022.012c: utpetuś ca vinā rātriṃ tārāḥ khadyotasaprabhāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:022.013c: tasmin kṣaṇe babhūvuś ca vinā puṣpaphalair drumāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:022.014a: uddhūtaś ca vinā vātaṃ reṇur jaladharāruṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:022.017c: lalāṭe ca rujā jātā na ca mohān nyavartata
GE09ram_03_u:022.018c: abravīd rākṣasān sarvān prahasan sa kharas tadā
GE09ram_03_u:022.019c: na cintayāmy ahaṃ vīryād balavān durbalān iva
GE09ram_03_u:022.020a: tārā api śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ pātayeyaṃ nabhastalāt
GE09ram_03_u:022.021a: rāghavaṃ taṃ balotsiktaṃ bhrātaraṃ cāpi lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:022.022a: sakāmā bhaginī me 'stu pītvā tu rudhiraṃ tayoḥ
GE09ram_03_u:022.023a: na kva cit prāptapūrvo me saṃyugeṣu parājayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:022.023c: yuṣmākam etat pratyakṣaṃ nānṛtaṃ kathayāmy aham
GE09ram_03_u:022.024c: vajrahastaṃ raṇe hanyāṃ kiṃ punas tau ca mānuṣau
GE09ram_03_u:022.025a: sā tasya garjitaṃ śrutvā rākṣasasya mahācamūḥ
GE09ram_03_u:022.026c: ṛṣayo devagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca saha cāraṇaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:022.027c: svasti gobrāhmaṇebhyo 'stu lokānāṃ ye ca saṃmatāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:022.028c: cakrā hasto yathā yuddhe sarvān asurapuṃgavān
GE09ram_03_u:022.029a: etac cānyac ca bahuśo bruvāṇāḥ paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:022.030a: rathena tu kharo vegāt sainyasyāgrād viniḥsṛtaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:022.030c: taṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasaṃ bhūyo rākṣasāś ca viniḥsṛtāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:022.034a: sā bhīmavegā samarābhikāmā; sudāruṇā rākṣasavīra senā
GE09ram_03_u:022.034c: tau rājaputrau sahasābhyupetā; mālāgrahāṇām iva candrasūryau
GE09ram_03_u:023.001a: āśramaṃ prati yāte tu khare kharaparākrame
GE09ram_03_u:023.001c: tān evautpātikān rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā dadarśa ha
GE09ram_03_u:023.002c: prajānām ahitān dṛṣṭvā vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:023.005a: sadhūmāś ca śarāḥ sarve mama yuddhābhinandinaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:023.006c: agrato no bhayaṃ prāptaṃ saṃśayo jīvitasya ca
GE09ram_03_u:023.007a: saṃprahāras tu sumahān bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:023.007c: ayam ākhyāti me bāhuḥ sphuramāṇo muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:023.008a: saṃnikarṣe tu naḥ śūra jayaṃ śatroḥ parājayam
GE09ram_03_u:023.008c: suprabhaṃ ca prasannaṃ ca tava vaktraṃ hi lakṣyate
GE09ram_03_u:023.009a: udyatānāṃ hi yuddhārthaṃ yeṣāṃ bhavati lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:023.009c: niṣprabhaṃ vadanaṃ teṣāṃ bhavaty āyuḥ parikṣayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:023.012a: pratikūlitum icchāmi na hi vākyam idaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_03_u:023.012c: śāpito mama pādābhyāṃ gamyatāṃ vatsa māciram
GE09ram_03_u:023.013a: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:023.013c: śarān ādāya cāpaṃ ca guhāṃ durgāṃ samāśrayat
GE09ram_03_u:023.014a: tasmin praviṣṭe tu guhāṃ lakṣmaṇe saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:023.014c: hanta niryuktam ity uktvā rāmaḥ kavacam āviśat
GE09ram_03_u:023.016a: sa cāpam udyamya mahac charān ādāya vīryavān
GE09ram_03_u:023.017a: tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca saha cāraṇaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:023.018c: ekaś ca rāmo dharmātmā kathaṃ yuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:023.021c: teṣāṃ sutumulaḥ śabdaḥ pūrayām āsa tad vanam
GE09ram_03_u:023.023a: tat tv anīkaṃ mahāvegaṃ rāmaṃ samupasarpata
GE09ram_03_u:023.025a: vitatya ca dhanur bhīmaṃ tūṇyāś coddhṛtya sāyakān
GE09ram_03_u:023.026a: duṣprekṣyaḥ so 'bhavat kruddho yugāntāgnir iva jvalan
GE09ram_03_u:023.027a: tasya kruddhasya rūpaṃ tu rāmasya dadṛśe tadā
GE09ram_03_u:024.002a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā saguṇaṃ cāpam udyamya kharaniḥsvanam
GE09ram_03_u:024.003c: yatra rāmo mahābāhur eko dhunvan dhanuḥ sthitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:024.004a: taṃ tu niṣpatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve te rajanīcarāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:024.005a: sa teṣāṃ yātudhānānāṃ madhye rato gataḥ kharaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:024.006a: tatas taṃ bhīmadhanvānaṃ kruddhāḥ sarve niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:024.007a: mudgarair āyasaiḥ śūlaiḥ prāsaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:024.009a: te rāme śaravarṣāṇi vyasṛjan rakṣasāṃ guṇāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:024.010a: sa taiḥ parivṛto ghorai rāghavo rakṣasāṃ gaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:024.010c: tithiṣv iva mahādevo vṛtaḥ pāriṣadāṃ gaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:024.011a: tāni muktāni śastrāṇi yātudhānaiḥ sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:024.012a: sa taiḥ praharaṇair ghorair bhinnagātro na vivyathe
GE09ram_03_u:024.012c: rāmaḥ pradīptair bahubhir vajrair iva mahācalaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:024.014c: ekaṃ sahastrair bahubhis tadā dṛṣṭvā samāvṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:024.017a: te śarāḥ śatrusainyeṣu muktā rāmeṇa līlayā
GE09ram_03_u:024.017c: ādadū rakṣasāṃ prāṇān pāśāḥ kālakṛtā iva
GE09ram_03_u:024.018a: bhittvā rākṣasadehāṃs tāṃs te śarā rudhirāplutāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:024.020a: tair dhanūṃṣi dhvajāgrāṇi varmāṇi ca śirāṃsi ca
GE09ram_03_u:024.022a: tat sainyaṃ niśitair bāṇair arditaṃ marmabhedibhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:024.022c: rāmeṇa na sukhaṃ lebhe śuṣkaṃ vanam ivāgninā
GE09ram_03_u:024.023a: ke cid bhīmabalāḥ śūrāḥ śūlān khaḍgān paraśvadhān
GE09ram_03_u:024.024a: tāni bāṇair mahābāhuḥ śastrāṇy āvārya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:024.024c: jahāra samare prāṇāṃś ciccheda ca śirodharān
GE09ram_03_u:024.025a: avaśiṣṭāś ca ye tatra viṣaṇṇāś ca niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:024.026a: tān sarvān punar ādāya samāśvāsya ca dūṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:024.028c: rāmasyāsya mahāghoraṃ punas teṣāṃ ca rakṣasām
GE09ram_03_u:025.001a: tad drumāṇāṃ śilānāṃ ca varṣaṃ prāṇaharaṃ mahat
GE09ram_03_u:025.002a: pratigṛhya ca tad varaṃ nimīlita ivarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:025.002c: rāmaḥ krodhaṃ paraṃ bheje vadhārthaṃ sarvarakṣasām
GE09ram_03_u:025.009a: sa karābhyāṃ vikīrṇābhyāṃ papāta bhuvi dūṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:025.010a: dṛṣṭvā taṃ patitaṃ bhūmau dūṣaṇaṃ nihataṃ raṇe
GE09ram_03_u:025.010c: sādhu sādhv iti kākutsthaṃ sarvabhūtāny apūjayan
GE09ram_03_u:025.012c: sthūlākṣaḥ paṭṭiśaṃ gṛhya pramāthī ca paraśvadham
GE09ram_03_u:025.013a: dṛṣṭvaivāpatatas tāṃs tu rāghavaḥ sāyakaiḥ śitaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:025.015c: sa papāta hato bhūmau viṭapīva mahādrumaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:025.017a: te rukmapuṅkhā viśikhāḥ sadhūmā iva pāvakāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:025.017c: nijaghnus tāni rakṣāṃsi vajrā iva mahādrumān
GE09ram_03_u:025.018a: rakṣasāṃ tu śataṃ rāmaḥ śatenaikena karṇinā
GE09ram_03_u:025.020c: āstīrṇā vasudhā kṛtsnā mahāvediḥ kuśair iva
GE09ram_03_u:025.023a: tasya sainyasya sarvasya kharaḥ śeṣo mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:025.023c: rākṣasas triśirāś caiva rāmaś ca ripusūdanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:025.024a: tatas tu tad bhīmabalaṃ mahāhave; samīkṣya rāmeṇa hataṃ balīyasā
GE09ram_03_u:025.024c: rathena rāmaṃ mahatā kharas tataḥ; samāsasādendra ivodyatāśaniḥ
GE09ram_03_u:026.003a: pratijānāmi te satyam āyudhaṃ cāham ālabhe
GE09ram_03_u:026.004a: ahaṃ vāsya raṇe mṛtyur eṣa vā samare mama
GE09ram_03_u:026.005a: prahṛṣṭo vā hate rāme janasthānaṃ prayāsyasi
GE09ram_03_u:026.007c: abhyadravad raṇe rāmaṃ triśṛṅga iva parvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:026.010a: sa saṃprahāras tumulo rāma triśirasor mahān
GE09ram_03_u:026.011a: tatas triśirasā bāṇair lalāṭe tāḍitas tribhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:026.011c: amarṣī kupito rāmaḥ saṃrabdham idam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:026.012c: puṣpair iva śarair yasya lalāṭe 'smi parikṣataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:026.013a: evam uktvā tu saṃrabdhaḥ śarān āśīviṣopamān
GE09ram_03_u:026.015c: rāmaś ciccheda bāṇena dhvajaṃ cāsya samucchritam
GE09ram_03_u:026.016c: bibheda rāmas taṃ bāṇair hṛdaye so 'bhavaj jaḍaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:026.017c: śirāṃsy apātayat trīṇi vegavadbhis tribhiḥ śataiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:026.019c: dravanti sma na tiṣṭhanti vyāghratrastā mṛgā iva
GE09ram_03_u:026.020a: tān kharo dravato dṛṣṭvā nivartya ruṣitaḥ svayam
GE09ram_03_u:027.001a: nihataṃ dūṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā raṇe triśirasā saha
GE09ram_03_u:027.001c: kharasyāpy abhavat trāso dṛṣṭvā rāmasya vikramam
GE09ram_03_u:027.002a: sa dṛṣṭvā rākṣasaṃ sainyam aviṣahyaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_03_u:027.002c: hatam ekena rāmeṇa dūṣaṇas triśirā api
GE09ram_03_u:027.003a: tad balaṃ hatabhūyiṣṭhaṃ vimanāḥ prekṣya rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:027.003c: āsasāda kharo rāmaṃ namucir vāsavaṃ yathā
GE09ram_03_u:027.004c: kharaś cikṣepa rāmāya kruddhān āśīviṣān iva
GE09ram_03_u:027.005c: cacāra samare mārgāñ śarai rathagataḥ kharaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:027.006a: sa sarvāś ca diśo bāṇaiḥ pradiśaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:027.006c: pūrayām āsa taṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmo 'pi sumahad dhanuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:027.009a: śarajālāvṛtaḥ sūryo na tadā sma prakāśate
GE09ram_03_u:027.010c: ājaghāna raṇe rāmaṃ totrair iva mahādvipam
GE09ram_03_u:027.012c: dṛṣṭvā nodvijate rāmaḥ siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgaṃ yathā
GE09ram_03_u:027.013c: āsasāda raṇe rāmaṃ pataṅga iva pāvakam
GE09ram_03_u:027.015a: sa punas tv aparān sapta śarān ādāya varmaṇi
GE09ram_03_u:027.016a: tatas tat prahataṃ bāṇaiḥ kharamuktaiḥ suparvabhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:027.017a: sa śarair arpitaḥ kruddhaḥ sarvagātreṣu rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:027.017c: rarāja samare rāmo vidhūmo 'gnir iva jvalan
GE09ram_03_u:027.018c: cakārāntāya sa ripoḥ sajyam anyan mahad dhanuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:027.019a: sumahad vaiṣṇavaṃ yat tad atisṛṣṭaṃ maharṣiṇā
GE09ram_03_u:027.019c: varaṃ tad dhanur udyamya kharaṃ samabhidhāvata
GE09ram_03_u:027.020c: ciccheda rāmaḥ saṃkruddhaḥ kharasya samare dhvajam
GE09ram_03_u:027.021a: sa darśanīyo bahudhā vicchinnaḥ kāñcano dhvajaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:027.022a: taṃ caturbhiḥ kharaḥ kruddho rāmaṃ gātreṣu mārgaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:027.022c: vivyādha hṛdi marmajño mātaṅgam iva tomaraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:027.024a: sa dhanur dhanvināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ pragṛhya paramāhave
GE09ram_03_u:027.025a: śirasy ekena bāṇena dvābhyāṃ bāhvor athārpayat
GE09ram_03_u:027.025c: tribhiś candrārdhavaktraiś ca vakṣasy abhijaghāna ha
GE09ram_03_u:027.027a: tato 'sya yugam ekena caturbhiś caturo hayān
GE09ram_03_u:027.027c: ṣaṣṭhena ca śiraḥ saṃkhye ciccheda kharasāratheḥ
GE09ram_03_u:027.028a: tribhis triveṇuṃ balavān dvābhyām akṣaṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:027.028c: dvādaśena tu bāṇena kharasya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:027.029c: gadāpāṇir avaplutya tasthau bhūmau kharas tadā
GE09ram_03_u:027.030a: tat karma rāmasya mahārathasya; sametya devāś ca maharṣayaś ca
GE09ram_03_u:027.030c: apūjayan prāñjalayaḥ prahṛṣṭās; tadā vimānāgragatāḥ sametāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:028.001a: kharaṃ tu virathaṃ rāmo gadāpāṇim avasthitam
GE09ram_03_u:028.003c: trayāṇām api lokānām īśvaro 'pi na tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_03_u:028.004c: tīkṣṇaṃ sarvajano hanti sarpaṃ duṣṭam ivāgatam
GE09ram_03_u:028.005a: lobhāt pāpāni kurvāṇaḥ kāmād vā yo na budhyate
GE09ram_03_u:028.005c: bhraṣṭaḥ paśyati tasyāntaṃ brāhmaṇī karakād iva
GE09ram_03_u:028.006c: kiṃ nu hatvā mahābhāgān phalaṃ prāpsyasi rākṣasa
GE09ram_03_u:028.007c: aiśvaryaṃ prāpya tiṣṭhanti śīrṇamūlā iva drumāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:028.008a: avaśyaṃ labhate kartā phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:028.008c: ghoraṃ paryāgate kāle drumaḥ puṣpam ivārtavam
GE09ram_03_u:028.009a: nacirāt prāpyate loke pāpānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalam
GE09ram_03_u:028.010c: aham āsādito rājā prāṇān hantuṃ niśācara
GE09ram_03_u:028.011a: adya hi tvāṃ mayā muktāḥ śarāḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:028.013a: adya tvāṃ nihataṃ bāṇaiḥ paśyantu paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:028.013c: nirayasthaṃ vimānasthā ye tvayā hiṃsitāḥ purā
GE09ram_03_u:028.014a: prahara tvaṃ yathākāmaṃ kuru yatnaṃ kulādhama
GE09ram_03_u:028.014c: adya te pātayiṣyāmi śiras tālaphalaṃ yathā
GE09ram_03_u:028.015a: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa kruddhaḥ saṃraktalocanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:028.017a: vikrāntā balavanto vā ye bhavanti nararṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:028.017c: kathayanti na te kiṃ cit tejasā svena garvitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:028.019c: mṛtyukāle hi saṃprāpte svayam aprastave stavam
GE09ram_03_u:028.020a: sarvathā tu laghutvaṃ te katthanena vidarśitam
GE09ram_03_u:028.021a: na tu mām iha tiṣṭhantaṃ paśyasi tvaṃ gadādharam
GE09ram_03_u:028.022a: paryāpto 'haṃ gadāpāṇir hantuṃ prāṇān raṇe tava
GE09ram_03_u:028.023a: kāmaṃ bahv api vaktavyaṃ tvayi vakṣyāmi na tv aham
GE09ram_03_u:028.023c: astaṃ gacched dhi savitā yuddhavighras tato bhavet
GE09ram_03_u:028.025a: ity uktvā paramakruddhas tāṃ gadāṃ paramāṅgadām
GE09ram_03_u:028.025c: kharaś cikṣepa rāmāya pradīptām aśaniṃ yathā
GE09ram_03_u:028.026c: bhasmavṛkṣāṃś ca gulmāṃś ca kṛtvāgāt tatsamīpataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:028.028a: sā viśīrṇā śarair bhinnā papāta dharaṇītale
GE09ram_03_u:029.001a: bhittvā tu tāṃ gadāṃ bāṇai rāghavo dharmavatsalaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:029.001c: smayamānaḥ kharaṃ vākyaṃ saṃrabdham idam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:029.004c: rākṣasānāṃ karomīti mithyā tad api te vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:029.007c: svapsyase gāṃ samāśliṣya durlabhāṃ pramadām iva
GE09ram_03_u:029.011c: anurūpakulāḥ patnyo yāsāṃ tvaṃ patir īdṛśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:029.012c: tvatkṛte śaṅkitair agnau munibhiḥ pātyate haviḥ
GE09ram_03_u:029.013a: tam evam abhisaṃrabdhaṃ bruvāṇaṃ rāghavaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_03_u:029.013c: kharo nirbhartsayām āsa roṣāt kharatara svanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:029.014a: dṛḍhaṃ khalv avalipto 'si bhayeṣv api ca nirbhayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:029.014c: vācyāvācyaṃ tato hi tvaṃ mṛtyuvaśyo na budhyase
GE09ram_03_u:029.016a: evam uktvā tato rāmaṃ saṃrudhya bhṛkuṭiṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:029.017c: sa tam utpāṭayām āsa saṃdṛśya daśanacchadam
GE09ram_03_u:029.018c: rāmam uddiśya cikṣepa hatas tvam iti cābravīt
GE09ram_03_u:029.019a: tam āpatantaṃ bāṇaughaiś chittvā rāmaḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_03_u:029.019c: roṣam āhārayat tīvraṃ nihantuṃ samare kharam
GE09ram_03_u:029.021a: tasya bāṇāntarād raktaṃ bahu susrāva phenilam
GE09ram_03_u:029.022a: vihvalaḥ sa kṛto bāṇaiḥ kharo rāmeṇa saṃyuge
GE09ram_03_u:029.025a: sa tad dattaṃ maghavatā surarājena dhīmatā
GE09ram_03_u:029.025c: saṃdadhe ca sa dharmātmā mumoca ca kharaṃ prati
GE09ram_03_u:029.027a: sa papāta kharo bhūmau dahyamānaḥ śarāgninā
GE09ram_03_u:029.028a: sa vṛtra iva vajreṇa phenena namucir yathāa
GE09ram_03_u:029.029c: sabhājya muditā rāmam idaṃ vacanam abruvan
GE09ram_03_u:029.031a: ānītas tvam imaṃ deśam upāyena maharṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:029.032a: tad idaṃ naḥ kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ tvayā daśarathātmaja
GE09ram_03_u:029.033a: etasminn antare vīro lakṣmaṇaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:029.034a: tato rāmas tu vijayī pūjyamāno maharṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:030.002a: dūṣaṇaṃ ca kharaṃ caiva hataṃ triśirasaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_03_u:030.003a: sā dṛṣṭvā karma rāmasya kṛtam anyaiḥ suduṣkaram
GE09ram_03_u:030.013a: purīṃ bhogavatīṃ gatvā parājitya ca vāsukim
GE09ram_03_u:030.013c: takṣakasya priyāṃ bhāryāṃ parājitya jahāra yaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:030.014c: vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ tasya kāmagaṃ vai jahāra yaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:030.015a: vanaṃ caitrarathaṃ divyaṃ nalinīṃ nandanaṃ vanam
GE09ram_03_u:030.017c: purā svayambhuve dhīraḥ śirāṃsy upajahāra yaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:030.018c: abhayaṃ yasya saṃgrāme mṛtyuto mānuṣād ṛte
GE09ram_03_u:030.021a: rākṣasī bhrātaraṃ krūraṃ sā dadarśa mahābalam
GE09ram_03_u:030.022c: sudāruṇaṃ vākyam abhītacāriṇī; mahātmanā śūrpaṇakhā virūpitā
GE09ram_03_u:031.003c: lubdhaṃ na bahu manyante śmaśānāgnim iva prajāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:031.004a: svayaṃ kāryāṇi yaḥ kāle nānutiṣṭhati pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:031.004c: sa tu vai saha rājyena taiś ca kāryair vinaśyati
GE09ram_03_u:031.005c: varjayanti narā dūrān nadīpaṅkam iva dvipāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:031.006a: ye na rakṣanti viṣayam asvādhīnā narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:031.006c: te na vṛddhyā prakāśante girayaḥ sāgare yathā
GE09ram_03_u:031.008a: yeṣāṃ cāraś ca kośaś ca nayaś ca jayatāṃ vara
GE09ram_03_u:031.008c: asvādhīnā narendrāṇāṃ prākṛtais te janaiḥ samāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:031.009a: yasmāt paśyanti dūrasthān sarvān arthān narādhipāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:031.010a: ayuktacāraṃ manye tvāṃ prākṛtaiḥ sacivair vṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:031.010c: svajanaṃ ca janasthānaṃ hataṃ yo nāvabudhyase
GE09ram_03_u:031.011c: hatāny ekena rāmeṇa kharaś ca sahadūṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:031.012a: ṛṣīṇām abhayaṃ dattaṃ kṛtakṣemāś ca daṇḍakāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:031.013a: tvaṃ tu lubdhaḥ pramattaś ca parādhīnaś ca rāvaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:031.013c: viṣaye sve samutpannaṃ bhayaṃ yo nāvabudhyase
GE09ram_03_u:031.016a: nānutiṣṭhati kāryāṇi bhayeṣu na bibheti ca
GE09ram_03_u:031.016c: kṣipraṃ rājyāc cyuto dīnas tṛṇais tulyo bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:031.017a: śuṣkakāṣṭhair bhavet kāryaṃ loṣṭair api ca pāṃsubhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:031.017c: na tu sthānāt paribhraṣṭaiḥ kāryaṃ syād vasudhādhipaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:031.018a: upabhuktaṃ yathā vāsaḥ srajo vā mṛditā yathā
GE09ram_03_u:031.019a: apramattaś ca yo rājā sarvajño vijitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:031.019c: kṛtajño dharmaśīlaś ca sa rājā tiṣṭhate ciram
GE09ram_03_u:031.020c: vyaktakrodhaprasādaś ca sa rājā pūjyate janaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:031.021a: tvaṃ tu rāvaṇadurbuddhir guṇair etair vivarjitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:031.021c: yasya te 'viditaś cārai rakṣasāṃ sumahān vadhaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:031.022a: parāvamantā viṣayeṣu saṃgato; nadeśa kālapravibhāga tattvavit
GE09ram_03_u:031.022c: ayuktabuddhir guṇadoṣaniścaye; vipannarājyo na cirād vipatsyate
GE09ram_03_u:031.023a: iti svadoṣān parikīrtitāṃs tayā; samīkṣya buddhyā kṣaṇadācareśvaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:031.023c: dhanena darpeṇa balena cānvito; vicintayām āsa ciraṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:032.001a: tataḥ śūrpaṇakhāṃ kruddhāṃ bruvatīṃ paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:032.002a: kaś ca rāmaḥ kathaṃ vīryaḥ kiṃ rūpaḥ kiṃ parākramaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:032.003a: āyudhaṃ kiṃ ca rāmasya nihatā yena rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:032.003c: kharaś ca nihataṃ saṃkhye dūṣaṇas triśirās tathā
GE09ram_03_u:032.006c: dīptān kṣipati nārācān sarpān iva mahāviṣān
GE09ram_03_u:032.007a: nādadānaṃ śarān ghorān na muñcantaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_03_u:032.007c: na kārmukaṃ vikarṣantaṃ rāmaṃ paśyāmi saṃyuge
GE09ram_03_u:032.008a: hanyamānaṃ tu tat sainyaṃ paśyāmi śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:032.010c: ṛṣīṇām abhayaṃ dattaṃ kṛtakṣemāś ca daṇḍakāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:032.011a: ekā kathaṃ cin muktāhaṃ paribhūya mahātmanā
GE09ram_03_u:032.012c: anuraktaś ca bhaktaś ca lakṣmaṇo nāma vīryavān
GE09ram_03_u:032.013a: amarṣī durjayo jetā vikrānto buddhimān balī
GE09ram_03_u:032.013c: rāmasya dakṣiṇe bāhur nityaṃ prāṇo bahiṣcaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:032.015a: naiva devī na gandharvā na yakṣī na ca kiṃnarī
GE09ram_03_u:032.016a: yasya sītā bhaved bhāryā yaṃ ca hṛṣṭā pariṣvajet
GE09ram_03_u:032.016c: atijīvet sa sarveṣu lokeṣv api puraṃdarāt
GE09ram_03_u:032.017c: tavānurūpā bhāryā sā tvaṃ ca tasyās tathā patiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:032.019c: manmathasya śarāṇāṃ ca tvaṃ vidheyo bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:032.020a: yadi tasyām abhiprāyo bhāryārthe tava jāyate
GE09ram_03_u:032.020c: śīghram uddhriyatāṃ pādo jayārtham iha dakṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:032.021a: kuru priyaṃ tathā teṣāṃ rakṣasāṃ rākṣaseśvara
GE09ram_03_u:032.022a: taṃ śarair niśitair hatvā lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāratham
GE09ram_03_u:032.023a: rocate yadi te vākyaṃ mamaitad rākṣaseśvara
GE09ram_03_u:032.024a: niśamya rāmeṇa śarair ajihmagair; hatāñ janasthānagatān niśācarān
GE09ram_03_u:032.024c: kharaṃ ca buddhvā nihataṃ ca dūṣaṇaṃ; tvam adya kṛtyaṃ pratipattum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:033.001a: tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā vākyaṃ tac chrutvā romaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:033.001c: sacivān abhyanujñāya kāryaṃ buddhvā jagāma ha
GE09ram_03_u:033.002a: tat kāryam anugamyātha yathāvad upalabhya ca
GE09ram_03_u:033.002c: doṣāṇāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca saṃpradhārya balābalam
GE09ram_03_u:033.003a: iti kartavyam ity eva kṛtvā niścayam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:033.003c: sthirabuddhis tato ramyāṃ yānaśālāṃ jagāma ha
GE09ram_03_u:033.004c: sūtaṃ saṃcodayām āsa rathaḥ saṃyujyatām iti
GE09ram_03_u:033.013c: sālais tālais tamālaiś ca tarubhiś ca supuṣpitaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:033.014c: nāgaiḥ suparṇair gandharvaiḥ kiṃnaraiś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:033.015a: jitakāmaiś ca siddhaiś ca cāmaṇaiś copaśobhitam
GE09ram_03_u:033.022a: agarūṇāṃ ca mukhyānāṃ vanāny upavanāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:033.022c: takkolānāṃ ca jātyānāṃ phalānāṃ ca sugandhinām
GE09ram_03_u:033.023a: puṣpāṇi ca tamālasya gulmāni maricasya ca
GE09ram_03_u:033.024c: kāñcanāni ca śailāni rājatāni ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:033.027c: tatrāpaśyat sa meghābhaṃ nyagrodham ṛṣibhir vṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:033.028a: samantād yasya tāḥ śākhāḥ śatayojanam āyatāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:033.028c: yasya hastinam ādāya mahākāyaṃ ca kaccapam
GE09ram_03_u:033.029a: tasya tāṃ sahasā śākhāṃ bhāreṇa patagottamaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:033.030c: ajā babhūvur dhūmrāś ca saṃgatāḥ paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:033.031a: teṣāṃ dayārthaṃ garuḍas tāṃ śākhāṃ śatayojanām
GE09ram_03_u:033.036a: taṃ tu gatvā paraṃ pāraṃ samudrasya nadīpateḥ
GE09ram_03_u:033.038a: sa rāvaṇaḥ samāgamya vidhivat tena rakṣasā
GE09ram_03_u:033.038c: tataḥ paścād idaṃ vākyam abravīd vākyakovidaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:034.001a: mārīca śrūyatāṃ tāta vacanaṃ mama bhāṣataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:034.001c: ārto 'smi mama cārtasya bhavān hi paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:034.002a: jānīṣe tvaṃ janasthānaṃ bhrātā yatra kharo mama
GE09ram_03_u:034.002c: dūṣaṇaś ca mahābāhuḥ svasā śūrpaṇakhā ca me
GE09ram_03_u:034.006a: te tv idānīṃ janasthāne vasamānā mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:034.006c: saṃgatāḥ param āyattā rāmeṇa saha saṃyuge
GE09ram_03_u:034.007c: anuktvā paruṣaṃ kiṃ cic charair vyāpāritaṃ dhanuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:034.009a: kharaś ca nihataḥ saṃkhye dūṣaṇaś ca nipātitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:034.009c: hatvā triśirasaṃ cāpi nirbhayā daṇḍakāḥ kṛtāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:034.010c: sa hantā tasya sainyasya rāmaḥ kṣatriyapāṃsanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:034.011c: tyaktadharmas tv adharmātmā bhūtānām ahite rataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:034.012a: yena vairaṃ vināraṇye sattvam āśritya kevalam
GE09ram_03_u:034.013c: ānayiṣyāmi vikramya sahāyas tatra me bhava
GE09ram_03_u:034.014a: tvayā hy ahaṃ sahāyena pārśvasthena mahābala
GE09ram_03_u:034.014c: bhrātṛbhiś ca surān yuddhe samagrān nābhicintaye
GE09ram_03_u:034.015a: tat sahāyo bhava tvaṃ me samartho hy asi rākṣasa
GE09ram_03_u:034.015c: vīrye yuddhe ca darpe ca na hy asti sadṛśas tava
GE09ram_03_u:034.016c: śṛṇu tat karma sāhāyye yat kāryaṃ vacanān mama
GE09ram_03_u:034.017a: sauvarṇas tvaṃ mṛgo bhūtvā citro rajatabindubhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:034.017c: āśrame tasya rāmasya sītāyāḥ pramukhe cara
GE09ram_03_u:034.018a: tvāṃ tu niḥsaṃśayaṃ sītā dṛṣṭvā tu mṛgarūpiṇam
GE09ram_03_u:034.019a: tatas tayor apāye tu śūnye sītāṃ yathāsukham
GE09ram_03_u:034.021c: śuṣkaṃ samabhavad vaktraṃ paritrasto babhūva ca
GE09ram_03_u:034.022c: kṛtāñjalis tattvam uvāca vākyaṃ; hitaṃ ca tasmai hitam ātmanaś ca
GE09ram_03_u:035.002c: apriyasya ca pathyasya vaktā śrotā ca durlabhaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:035.003a: na nūnaṃ budhyase rāmaṃ mahāvīryaṃ guṇonnatam
GE09ram_03_u:035.004a: api svasti bhavet tāta sarveṣāṃ bhuvi rakṣasām
GE09ram_03_u:035.004c: api rāmo na saṃkruddhaḥ kuryāl lokam arākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_03_u:035.005c: api sītā nimittaṃ ca na bhaved vyasanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_03_u:035.006a: api tvām īśvaraṃ prāpya kāmavṛttaṃ niraṅkuśam
GE09ram_03_u:035.006c: na vinaśyet purī laṅkā tvayā saha sarākṣasā
GE09ram_03_u:035.007c: ātmānaṃ svajanaṃ rāṣṭraṃ sa rājā hanti durmatiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:035.008a: na ca pitrā parityakto nāmaryādaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_03_u:035.008c: na lubdho na ca duḥśīlo na ca kṣatriyapāṃsanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:035.009c: na ca tīkṣṇo hi bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ ca hite rataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:035.011c: hitvā rājyaṃ ca bhogāṃś ca praviṣṭo daṇḍakāvanam
GE09ram_03_u:035.012a: na rāmaḥ karkaśas tāta nāvidvān nājitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:035.012c: anṛtaṃ na śrutaṃ caiva naiva tvaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:035.013c: rājā sarvasya lokasya devānām iva vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:035.014a: kathaṃ tvaṃ tasya vaidehīṃ rakṣitāṃ svena tejasā
GE09ram_03_u:035.014c: icchasi prasabhaṃ hartuṃ prabhām iva vivasvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:035.015c: rāmāgniṃ sahasā dīptaṃ na praveṣṭuṃ tvam arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:035.017a: rājyaṃ sukhaṃ ca saṃtyajya jīvitaṃ ceṣṭam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:035.018a: aprameyaṃ hi tat tejo yasya sā janakātmajā
GE09ram_03_u:035.018c: na tvaṃ samarthas tāṃ hartuṃ rāmacāpāśrayāṃ vane
GE09ram_03_u:035.020a: kim udyamaṃ vyartham imaṃ kṛtvā te rākṣasādhipa
GE09ram_03_u:035.020c: dṛṣṭaś cet tvaṃ raṇe tena tad antaṃ tava jīvitam
GE09ram_03_u:035.020e: jīvitaṃ ca sukhaṃ caiva rājyaṃ caiva sudurlabham
GE09ram_03_u:035.021c: mantrayitvā tu dharmiṣṭhaiḥ kṛtvā niścayam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:035.022a: doṣāṇāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca saṃpradhārya balābalam
GE09ram_03_u:035.022c: ātmanaś ca balaṃ jñātvā rāghavasya ca tattvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:035.022e: hitaṃ hi tava niścitya kṣamaṃ tvaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:035.023a: ahaṃ tu manye tava na kṣamaṃ raṇe; samāgamaṃ kosalarājasūnunā
GE09ram_03_u:035.023c: idaṃ hi bhūyaḥ śṛṇu vākyam uttamaṃ; kṣamaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca niśācarādhipa
GE09ram_03_u:036.001a: kadā cid apy ahaṃ vīryāt paryaṭan pṛthivīm imām
GE09ram_03_u:036.003c: svayaṃ gatvā daśarathaṃ narendram idam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:036.004a: ayaṃ rakṣatu māṃ rāmaḥ parvakāle samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:036.004c: mārīcān me bhayaṃ ghoraṃ samutpannaṃ nareśvara
GE09ram_03_u:036.005a: ity evam ukto dharmātmā rājā daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_03_u:036.006a: ūna ṣoḍaśa varṣo 'yam akṛtāstraś ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:036.006c: kāmaṃ tu mama yat sainyaṃ mayā saha gamiṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:036.007a: ity evam uktaḥ sa munī rājānaṃ punar abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:036.007c: rāmān nānyad balaṃ loke paryāptaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:036.008a: bālo 'py eṣa mahātejāḥ samarthas tasya nigrahe
GE09ram_03_u:036.008c: gamiṣye rāmam ādāya svasti te 'stu paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:036.009a: ity evam uktvā sa munis tam ādāya nṛpātmajam
GE09ram_03_u:036.010a: taṃ tadā daṇḍakāraṇye yajñam uddiśya dīkṣitam
GE09ram_03_u:036.014c: māṃ tu dṛṣṭvā dhanuḥ sajyam asaṃbhrāntaś cakāra ha
GE09ram_03_u:036.015a: avajānann ahaṃ mohād bālo 'yam iti rāghavam
GE09ram_03_u:036.016a: tena muktas tato bāṇaḥ śitaḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:036.017e: prāpya saṃjñāṃ cirāt tāta laṅkāṃ prati gataḥ purīm
GE09ram_03_u:036.018a: evam asmi tadā muktaḥ sahāyās te nipātitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:036.019a: tan mayā vāryamāṇas tvaṃ yadi rāmeṇa vigraham
GE09ram_03_u:036.019c: kariṣyasy āpadaṃ ghorāṃ kṣipraṃ prāpya naśiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:036.021c: drakṣyasi tvaṃ purīṃ laṅkāṃ vinaṣṭāṃ maithilīkṛte
GE09ram_03_u:036.023c: drakṣyasy abhihatān bhūmau tava doṣāt tu rākṣasān
GE09ram_03_u:036.027a: mānaṃ vṛddhiṃ ca rājyaṃ ca jīvitaṃ ceṣṭam iātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:036.027c: yadīcchasi ciraṃ bhoktuṃ mā kṛthā rāma vipriyam
GE09ram_03_u:036.028a: nivāryamāṇaḥ suhṛdā mayā bhṛśaṃ; prasahya sītāṃ yadi dharṣayiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:037.001a: evam asmi tadā muktaḥ kathaṃ cit tena saṃyuge
GE09ram_03_u:037.001c: idānīm api yad vṛttaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva yad uttaram
GE09ram_03_u:037.002a: rākṣasābhyām ahaṃ dvābhyām anirviṇṇas tathā kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:037.005c: rudhirāṇi pibaṃs teṣāṃ tathā māṃsāni bhakṣayan
GE09ram_03_u:037.007c: āsādayaṃ tadā rāmaṃ tāpasaṃ dharmam āśritam
GE09ram_03_u:037.008a: vaidehīṃ ca mahābhāgāṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāratham
GE09ram_03_u:037.011a: tena muktās trayo bāṇāḥ śitāḥ śatrunibarhaṇāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:037.013c: samutkrāntas tato muktas tāv ubhau rākṣasau hatau
GE09ram_03_u:037.014a: śareṇa mukto rāmasya kathaṃ cit prāpya jīvitam
GE09ram_03_u:037.016c: rāmabhūtam idaṃ sarvam araṇyaṃ pratibhāti me
GE09ram_03_u:037.017a: rāmam eva hi paśyāmi rahite rākṣaseśvara
GE09ram_03_u:037.018c: ratnāni ca rathāś caiva trāsaṃ saṃjanayanti me
GE09ram_03_u:037.019a: ahaṃ tasya prabhāvajño na yuddhaṃ tena te kṣamam
GE09ram_03_u:037.019c: raṇe rāmeṇa yudhyasva kṣamāṃ vā kuru rākṣasa
GE09ram_03_u:037.019e: na te rāmakathā kāryā yadi māṃ draṣṭum icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:037.020a: idaṃ vaco bandhuhitārthinā mayā; yathocyamānaṃ yadi nābhipatsyase
GE09ram_03_u:037.020c: sabāndhavas tyakṣyasi jīvitaṃ raṇe; hato 'dya rāmeṇa śarair ajihmagaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:038.001a: mārīcena tu tad vākyaṃ kṣamaṃ yuktaṃ ca rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:038.003a: yat kilaitad ayuktārthaṃ mārīca mayi kathyate
GE09ram_03_u:038.003c: vākyaṃ niṣphalam atyarthaṃ bījam uptam ivoṣare
GE09ram_03_u:038.004a: tvadvākyair na tu māṃ śakyaṃ bhettuṃ rāmasya saṃyuge
GE09ram_03_u:038.005a: yas tyaktvā suhṛdo rājyaṃ mātaraṃ pitaraṃ tathā
GE09ram_03_u:038.005c: strīvākyaṃ prākṛtaṃ śrutvā vanam ekapade gataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:038.006a: avaśyaṃ tu mayā tasya saṃyuge kharaghātinaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:038.006c: prāṇaiḥ priyatarā sītā hartavyā tava saṃnidhau
GE09ram_03_u:038.007a: evaṃ me niścitā buddhir hṛdi mārīca vartate
GE09ram_03_u:038.007c: na vyāvartayituṃ śakyā sendrair api surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:038.008a: doṣaṃ guṇaṃ vā saṃpṛṣṭas tvam evaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:038.008c: apāyaṃ vāpy upāyaṃ vā kāryasyāsya viniścane
GE09ram_03_u:038.009c: udyatāñjalinā rājño ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:038.010a: vākyam apratikūlaṃ tu mṛdupūrvaṃ śubhaṃ hitam
GE09ram_03_u:038.011a: sāvamardaṃ tu yad vākyaṃ mārīca hitam ucyate
GE09ram_03_u:038.012c: agner indrasya somasya yamasya varuṇasya ca
GE09ram_03_u:038.012e: auṣṇyaṃ tathā vikramaṃ ca saumyaṃ daṇḍaṃ prasannatām
GE09ram_03_u:038.013a: tasmāt sarvāsv avasthāsu mānyāḥ pūjyāś ca pārthivāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:038.013c: tvaṃ tu dharmam avijñāya kevalaṃ moham āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:038.014c: guṇadoṣau na pṛcchāmi kṣamaṃ cātmani rākṣasa
GE09ram_03_u:038.014e: asmiṃs tu sa bhavān kṛtye sāhāryyaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:038.015a: sauvarṇas tvaṃ mṛgo bhūtvā citro rajatabindubhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:038.016a: tvāṃ tu māyā mṛgaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāñcanaṃ jātavismayā
GE09ram_03_u:038.016c: ānayainam iti kṣipraṃ rāmaṃ vakṣyati maithilī
GE09ram_03_u:038.017a: apakrānte ca kākutsthe lakṣmaṇe ca yathāsukham
GE09ram_03_u:038.018a: evaṃ kṛtvā tv idaṃ kāryaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ gaccha rākṣasa
GE09ram_03_u:038.019a: gaccha saumya śivaṃ mārgaṃ kāryasyāsya vivṛddhaye
GE09ram_03_u:038.019c: prāpya sītām ayuddhena vañcayitvā tu rāghavam
GE09ram_03_u:038.019e: laṅkāṃ prati gamiṣyāmi kṛtakāryaḥ saha tvayā
GE09ram_03_u:038.020a: etat kāryam avaśyaṃ me balād api kariṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:038.020c: rājño hi pratikūlastho na jātu sukham edhate
GE09ram_03_u:038.021a: āsādyā taṃ jīvitasaṃśayas te; mṛtyur dhruvo hy adya mayā virudhya
GE09ram_03_u:038.021c: etad yathāvat parigṛhya buddhyā; yad atra pathyaṃ kuru tat tathā tvam
GE09ram_03_u:039.003a: kas tvayā sukhinā rājan nābhinandati pāpakṛt
GE09ram_03_u:039.005c: yas tvām icchati naśyantaṃ svakṛtena niśācara
GE09ram_03_u:039.006a: vadhyāḥ khalu na hanyante sacivās tava rāvaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:039.006c: ye tvām utpatham ārūḍhaṃ na nigṛhṇanti sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:039.007a: amātyaiḥ kāmavṛtto hi rājā kāpatham āśritaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:039.007c: nigrāhyaḥ sarvathā sadbhir na nigrāhyo nigṛhyase
GE09ram_03_u:039.008a: dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca yaśaś ca jayatāṃ vara
GE09ram_03_u:039.009a: viparyaye tu tat sarvaṃ vyarthaṃ bhavati rāvaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:039.010a: rājamūlo hi dharmaś ca jayaś ca jayatāṃ vara
GE09ram_03_u:039.011a: rājyaṃ pālayituṃ śakyaṃ na tīkṣṇena niśācara
GE09ram_03_u:039.012a: ye tīkṣṇamantrāḥ sacivā bhajyante saha tena vai
GE09ram_03_u:039.014c: rakṣyamāṇā na vardhante meṣā gomāyunā yathā
GE09ram_03_u:039.015c: yeṣāṃ tvaṃ karkaśo rājā durbuddhir ajitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:039.016a: tad idaṃ kākatālīyaṃ ghoram āsāditaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_03_u:039.016c: atra kiṃ śobhanaṃ yat tvaṃ sasainyo vinaśiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:039.017a: māṃ nihatya tu rāmo 'sau nacirāt tvāṃ vadhiṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:039.017c: anena kṛtakṛtyo 'smi mriye yad ariṇā hataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:039.018a: darśanād eva rāmasya hataṃ mām upadhāraya
GE09ram_03_u:039.018c: ātmānaṃ ca hataṃ viddhi hṛtvā sītāṃ sabāndhavam
GE09ram_03_u:039.019a: ānayiṣyāmi cet sītām āśramāt sahito mayā
GE09ram_03_u:039.019c: naiva tvam asi naivāhaṃ naiva laṅkā na rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:039.020a: nivāryamāṇas tu mayā hitaiṣiṇā; na mṛṣyase vākyam idaṃ niśācara
GE09ram_03_u:039.020c: paretakalpā hi gatāyuṣo narā; hitaṃ na gṛhṇanti suhṛdbhir īritam
GE09ram_03_u:040.001a: evam uktvā tu paruṣaṃ mārīco rāvaṇo tataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:040.003a: kiṃ tu kartuṃ mayā śakyam evaṃ tvayi durātmani
GE09ram_03_u:040.003c: eṣa gacchāmy ahaṃ tāta svasti te 'stu niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:040.004a: prahṛṣṭas tv abhavat tena vacanena sa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:040.005a: etac chauṇḍīryayuktaṃ te macchabdād iva bhāṣitam
GE09ram_03_u:040.005c: idānīm asi mārīcaḥ pūrvam anyo niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:040.006c: mayā saha ratho yuktaḥ piśācavadanaiḥ kharaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:040.007a: tato rāvaṇamārīcau vimānam iva taṃ ratham
GE09ram_03_u:040.008a: tathaiva tatra paśyantau pattanāni vanāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:040.008c: girīṃś ca saritaḥ sarvā rāṣṭrāṇi nagarāṇi ca
GE09ram_03_u:040.010c: haste gṛhītvā mārīcaṃ rāvaṇo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:040.011c: kriyatāṃ tat sakhe śīghraṃ yadarthaṃ vayam āgatāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:040.012a: sa rāvaṇavacaḥ śrutvā mārīco rākṣasas tadā
GE09ram_03_u:040.017a: vanaṃ prajvalayan ramyaṃ rāmāśramapadaṃ ca tat
GE09ram_03_u:040.017c: manoharaṃ darśanīyaṃ rūpaṃ kṛtvā sa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:040.022a: punar gatvā nivṛttaś ca vicacāra mṛgottamaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:040.023a: vikrīḍaṃś ca punar bhūmau punar eva niṣīdati
GE09ram_03_u:040.025c: samudvīkṣya ca sarve taṃ mṛgā ye 'nye vanecarāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:040.026c: rākṣasaḥ so 'pi tān vanyān mṛgān mṛgavadhe rataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:040.027c: tasminn eva tataḥ kāle vaidehī śubhalocanā
GE09ram_03_u:040.028c: karṇikārān aśokāṃś ca cūṭāṃś ca madirekṣaṇā
GE09ram_03_u:040.031a: sa ca tāṃ rāma dayitāṃ paśyan māyāmayo mṛgaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:040.031c: vicacāra tatas tatra dīpayann iva tad vanam
GE09ram_03_u:041.001a: sā taṃ saṃprekṣya suśroṇī kusumāni vicinvatī
GE09ram_03_u:041.002c: bhartāram api cākrandal lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva sāyudham
GE09ram_03_u:041.003c: vīkṣamāṇau tu taṃ deśaṃ tadā dadṛśatur mṛgam
GE09ram_03_u:041.004a: śaṅkamānas tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇo rāmam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:041.004c: tam evainam ahaṃ manye mārīcaṃ rākṣasaṃ mṛgam
GE09ram_03_u:041.006a: asya māyāvido māyā mṛgarūpam idaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:041.007a: mṛgo hy evaṃvidho ratnavicitro nāsti rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:041.007c: jagatyāṃ jagatīnātha māyaiṣā hi na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:041.010c: mṛgāś caranti sahitāś camarāḥ sṛmarās tathā
GE09ram_03_u:041.011a: ṛkṣāḥ pṛṣatasaṃghāś ca vānarāḥ kinarās tathā
GE09ram_03_u:041.012a: na cāsya sadṛśo rājan dṛṣṭapūrvo mṛgaḥ purā
GE09ram_03_u:041.014a: aho rūpam aho lakṣmīḥ svarasaṃpac ca śobhanā
GE09ram_03_u:041.015a: yadi grahaṇam abhyeti jīvann eva mṛgas tava
GE09ram_03_u:041.018a: jīvan na yadi te 'bhyeti grahaṇaṃ mṛgasattamaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:041.020a: kāmavṛttam idaṃ raudraṃ strīṇām asadṛśaṃ matam
GE09ram_03_u:041.020c: vapuṣā tv asya sattvasya vismayo janito mama
GE09ram_03_u:041.022a: evaṃ sītāvacaḥ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā ca mṛgam adbhutam
GE09ram_03_u:041.022c: uvāca rāghavo hṛṣṭo bhrātaraṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:041.023a: paśya lakṣmaṇa vaidehyāḥ spṛhāṃ mṛgagatām imām
GE09ram_03_u:041.023c: rūpaśreṣṭhatayā hy eṣa mṛgo 'dya na bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:041.024c: kutaḥ pṛthivyāṃ saumitre yo 'sya kaś cit samo mṛgaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:041.026c: jihvāṃ mukhān niḥsarantīṃ meghād iva śatahradām
GE09ram_03_u:041.027c: kasya nāmānirūpyo 'sau na mano lobhayen mṛgaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:041.028a: kasya rūpam idaṃ dṛṣṭvā jāmbūnadamaya prabham
GE09ram_03_u:041.028c: nānāratnamayaṃ divyaṃ na mano vismayaṃ vrajet
GE09ram_03_u:041.029a: māṃsahetor api mṛgān vihārārthaṃ ca dhanvinaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:041.031a: tat sāram akhilaṃ nṝṇāṃ dhanaṃ nicayavardhanam
GE09ram_03_u:041.031c: manasā cintitaṃ sarvaṃ yathā śukrasya lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:041.032c: tam artham arthaśāstrajñaḥ prāhur arthyāś ca lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:041.034a: na kādalī na priyakī na praveṇī na cāvikī
GE09ram_03_u:041.034c: bhaved etasya sadṛśī sparśaneneti me matiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:041.035a: eṣa caiva mṛgaḥ śrīmān yaś ca divyo nabhaścaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:041.036a: yadi vāyaṃ tathā yan māṃ bhaved vadasi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:041.038c: nihatāḥ parameṣvāsās tasmād vadhyas tv ayaṃ mṛgaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:041.040a: sa kadā cic cirāl loke āsasāda mahāmunim
GE09ram_03_u:041.040c: agastyaṃ tejasā yuktaṃ bhakṣyas tasya babhūva ha
GE09ram_03_u:041.041a: samutthāne ca tad rūpaṃ kartukāmaṃ samīkṣya tam
GE09ram_03_u:041.041c: utsmayitvā tu bhagavān vātāpim idam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:041.042c: jīvaloke dvijaśreṣṭhās tasmād asi jarāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:041.043a: evaṃ tan na bhaved rakṣo vātāpir iva lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:041.044a: bhaved dhato 'yaṃ vātāpir agastyeneva mā gatiḥ
