GE09ram_03_u:041.044c: iha tvaṃ bhava saṃnaddho yantrito rakṣa maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:041.045a: asyām āyattam asmākaṃ yat kṛtyaṃ raghunandana
GE09ram_03_u:041.045c: aham enaṃ vadhiṣyāmi grahīṣyāmy atha vā mṛgam
GE09ram_03_u:041.046a: yāvad gacchāmi saumitre mṛgam ānayituṃ drutam
GE09ram_03_u:041.047a: tvacā pradhānayā hy eṣa mṛgo 'dya na bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:041.048a: yāvat pṛṣatam ekena sāyakena nihanmy aham
GE09ram_03_u:041.048c: hatvaitac carma ādāya śīghram eṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:041.049a: pradakṣiṇenātibalena pakṣiṇā; jaṭāyuṣā buddhimatā ca lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:041.049c: bhavāpramattaḥ pratigṛhya maithilīṃ; pratikṣaṇaṃ sarvata eva śaṅkitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:042.001a: tathā tu taṃ samādiśya bhrātaraṃ raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:042.003a: taṃ vañcayāno rājendram āpatantaṃ nirīkṣya vai
GE09ram_03_u:042.004a: baddhāsir dhanur ādāya pradudrāva yato mṛgaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:042.004c: taṃ sa paśyati rūpeṇa dyotamānam ivāgrataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:042.005c: ativṛttam iṣoḥ pātāl lobhayānaṃ kadā cana
GE09ram_03_u:042.006c: daśyamānam adṛśyaṃ ca navoddeśeṣu keṣu cit
GE09ram_03_u:042.007c: muhūrtād eva dadṛśe muhur dūrāt prakāśate
GE09ram_03_u:042.008c: āsīt kruddhas tu kākutstho vivaśas tena mohitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:042.010a: dṛṣṭvā rāmo mahātejās taṃ hantuṃ kṛtaniścayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:042.010c: saṃdhāya sudṛḍhe cāpe vikṛṣya balavad balī
GE09ram_03_u:042.011a: tam eva mṛgam uddiśya jvalantam iva pannagam
GE09ram_03_u:042.013e: mriyamāṇas tu mārīco jahau tāṃ kṛtrimāṃ tanum
GE09ram_03_u:042.014a: saṃprāptakālam ājñāya cakāra ca tataḥ svaram
GE09ram_03_u:042.014c: sadṛśaṃ rāghavasyaiva hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca
GE09ram_03_u:042.015c: mṛgarūpaṃ tu tat tyaktvā rākṣasaṃ rūpam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:042.015e: cakre sa sumahākāyo mārīco jīvitaṃ tyajan
GE09ram_03_u:042.017a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ bhūmau rākṣasaṃ ghoradarśanam
GE09ram_03_u:042.017c: jagāma manasā sītāṃ lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ smaran
GE09ram_03_u:042.018a: hā sīte lakṣmaṇety evam ākruśya tu mahāsvaram
GE09ram_03_u:042.018c: mamāra rākṣasaḥ so 'yaṃ śrutvā sītā kathaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_03_u:042.019a: lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābāhuḥ kām avasthāṃ gamiṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:042.020a: tatra rāmaṃ bhayaṃ tīvram āviveśa viṣādajam
GE09ram_03_u:042.020c: rākṣasaṃ mṛgarūpaṃ taṃ hatvā śrutvā ca tat svaram
GE09ram_03_u:042.021a: nihatya pṛṣataṃ cānyaṃ māṃsam ādāya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:043.001a: ārtasvaraṃ tu taṃ bhartur vijñāya sadṛśaṃ vane
GE09ram_03_u:043.001c: uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ sītā gaccha jānīhi rāghavam
GE09ram_03_u:043.002a: na hi me jīvitaṃ sthāne hṛdayaṃ vāvatiṣṭhate
GE09ram_03_u:043.002c: krośataḥ paramārtasya śrutaḥ śabdo mayā bhṛśam
GE09ram_03_u:043.003a: ākrandamānaṃ tu vane bhrātaraṃ trātum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:043.003c: taṃ kṣipram abhidhāva tvaṃ bhrātaraṃ śaraṇaiṣiṇam
GE09ram_03_u:043.004a: rakṣasāṃ vaśam āpannaṃ siṃhānām iva govṛṣam
GE09ram_03_u:043.004c: na jagāma tathoktas tu bhrātur ājñāya śāsanam
GE09ram_03_u:043.005a: tam uvāca tatas tatra kupitā janakātmajā
GE09ram_03_u:043.005c: saumitre mitrarūpeṇa bhrātus tvam asi śatruvat
GE09ram_03_u:043.006a: yas tvam asyām avasthāyāṃ bhrātaraṃ nābhipadyase
GE09ram_03_u:043.006c: icchasi tvaṃ vinaśyantaṃ rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇa matkṛte
GE09ram_03_u:043.007a: vyasanaṃ te priyaṃ manye sneho bhrātari nāsti te
GE09ram_03_u:043.007c: tena tiṣṭhasi visrabdhas tam apaśyan mahādyutim
GE09ram_03_u:043.008a: kiṃ hi saṃśayam āpanne tasminn iha mayā bhavet
GE09ram_03_u:043.008c: kartavyam iha tiṣṭhantyā yat pradhānas tvam āgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:043.009c: abravīl lakṣmaṇas trastāṃ sītāṃ mṛgavadhūm iva
GE09ram_03_u:043.011a: dānaveṣu ca ghoreṣu na sa vidyeta śobhane
GE09ram_03_u:043.012a: avadhyaḥ samare rāmo naivaṃ tvaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:043.012c: na tvām asmin vane hātum utsahe rāghavaṃ vinā
GE09ram_03_u:043.013a: anivāryaṃ balaṃ tasya balair balavatām api
GE09ram_03_u:043.013c: tribhir lokaiḥ samudyuktaiḥ seśvaraiḥ sāmarair api
GE09ram_03_u:043.014a: hṛdayaṃ nirvṛtaṃ te 'stu saṃtāpas tyajyatām ayam
GE09ram_03_u:043.014c: āgamiṣyati te bhartā śīghraṃ hatvā mṛgottamam
GE09ram_03_u:043.015a: na sa tasya svaro vyaktaṃ na kaś cid api daivataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:043.016c: rāmeṇa tvaṃ varārohe na tvāṃ tyaktum ihotsahe
GE09ram_03_u:043.017a: kṛtavairāś ca kalyāṇi vayam etair niśācaraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:043.020c: ahaṃ tava priyaṃ manye tenaitāni prabhāṣase
GE09ram_03_u:043.021a: naitac citraṃ sapatneṣu pāpaṃ lakṣmaṇa yad bhavet
GE09ram_03_u:043.022a: suduṣṭas tvaṃ vane rāmam ekam eko 'nugacchasi
GE09ram_03_u:043.022c: mama hetoḥ praticchannaḥ prayukto bharatena vā
GE09ram_03_u:043.024a: samakṣaṃ tava saumitre prāṇāṃs tyakṣye na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:043.024c: rāmaṃ vinā kṣaṇam api na hi jīvāmi bhūtale
GE09ram_03_u:043.025a: ity uktaḥ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ sītayā somaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:043.026a: uttaraṃ notsahe vaktuṃ daivataṃ bhavatī mama
GE09ram_03_u:043.026c: vākyam apratirūpaṃ tu na citraṃ strīṣu maithili
GE09ram_03_u:043.027a: svabhāvas tv eṣa nārīṇām eṣu lokeṣu dṛśyate
GE09ram_03_u:043.028c: nyāyavādī yathā vākyam ukto 'haṃ paruṣaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_03_u:043.029a: dhik tvām adya praṇaśya tvaṃ yan mām evaṃ viśaṅkase
GE09ram_03_u:043.030a: gamiṣye yatra kākutsthaḥ svasti te 'stu varānane
GE09ram_03_u:043.031a: nimittāni hi ghorāṇi yāni prādurbhavanti me
GE09ram_03_u:043.031c: api tvāṃ saha rāmeṇa paśyeyaṃ punar āgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:043.034a: pibāmi vā viṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ pravekṣyāmi hutāśanam
GE09ram_03_u:043.034c: na tv ahaṃ rāghavād anyaṃ padāpi puruṣaṃ spṛśe
GE09ram_03_u:043.035c: pāṇibhyāṃ rudatī duḥkhād udaraṃ prajaghāna ha
GE09ram_03_u:043.036a: tām ārtarūpāṃ vimanā rudantīṃ; saumitrir ālokya viśālanetrām
GE09ram_03_u:043.036c: āśvāsayām āsa na caiva bhartus; taṃ bhrātaraṃ kiṃ cid uvāca sītā
GE09ram_03_u:043.037a: tatas tu sītām abhivādya lakṣmaṇaḥ; kṛtāñjaliḥ kiṃ cid abhipraṇamya
GE09ram_03_u:043.037c: avekṣamāṇo bahuśaś ca maithilīṃ; jagāma rāmasya samīpam ātmavān
GE09ram_03_u:044.001a: tayā paruṣam uktas tu kupito rāghavānujaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:044.001c: sa vikāṅkṣan bhṛśaṃ rāmaṃ pratasthe nacirād iva
GE09ram_03_u:044.005a: tām apaśyat tato bālāṃ rājaputrīṃ yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_03_u:044.006c: samīkṣya na prakampante na pravāti ca mārutaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:044.007a: śīghrasrotāś ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā vīkṣantaṃ raktalocanam
GE09ram_03_u:044.007c: stimitaṃ gantum ārebhe bhayād godāvarī nadī
GE09ram_03_u:044.008a: rāmasya tv antaraṃ prepsur daśagrīvas tadantare
GE09ram_03_u:044.010a: sa pāpo bhavyarūpeṇa tṛṇaiḥ kūpa ivāvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:044.014a: tām uttamāṃ trilokānāṃ padmahīnām iva śriyam
GE09ram_03_u:044.015c: kamalānāṃ śubhāṃ mālāṃ padminīva ca bibhratī
GE09ram_03_u:044.016a: hrīḥ śrīḥ kīrtiḥ śubhā lakṣmīr apsarā vā śubhānane
GE09ram_03_u:044.016c: bhūtir vā tvaṃ varārohe ratir vā svairacāriṇī
GE09ram_03_u:044.017a: samāḥ śikhariṇaḥ snigdhāḥ pāṇḍurā daśanās tava
GE09ram_03_u:044.020c: mano harasi me rāme nadīkūlam ivāmbhasā
GE09ram_03_u:044.021c: naiva devī na gandharvī na yakṣī na ca kiṃnarī
GE09ram_03_u:044.022c: iha vāsaś ca kāntāre cittam unmāthayanti me
GE09ram_03_u:044.023a: sā pratikrāma bhadraṃ te na tvaṃ vastum ihārhasi
GE09ram_03_u:044.025a: varaṃ mālyaṃ varaṃ pānaṃ varaṃ vastraṃ ca śobhane
GE09ram_03_u:044.025c: bhartāraṃ ca varaṃ manye tvadyuktam asitekṣaṇe
GE09ram_03_u:044.026a: kā tvaṃ bhavasi rudrāṇāṃ marutāṃ vā śucismite
GE09ram_03_u:044.026c: vasūnāṃ vā varārohe devatā pratibhāsi me
GE09ram_03_u:044.027a: neha gacchantī gandharvā na devā na ca kiṃnarāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:044.027c: rākṣasānām ayaṃ vāsaḥ kathaṃ nu tvam ihāgatā
GE09ram_03_u:044.028c: ṛkṣās tarakṣavaḥ kaṅkāḥ kathaṃ tebhyo na bibhyase
GE09ram_03_u:044.029c: katham ekā mahāraṇye na bibheṣi vanānane
GE09ram_03_u:044.030a: kāsi kasya kutaś ca tvaṃ kiṃnimittaṃ ca daṇḍakān
GE09ram_03_u:044.031c: dvijātiveṣeṇa hi taṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇam āgatam
GE09ram_03_u:044.032c: abravīt siddham ity eva tadā taṃ saumyadarśanam
GE09ram_03_u:044.033a: dvijātiveṣeṇa samīkṣya maithilī; tam āgataṃ pātrakusumbhadhāriṇam
GE09ram_03_u:044.033c: aśakyam uddveṣṭum upāyadarśanān; nyamantrayad brāhmaṇavad yathāgatam
GE09ram_03_u:044.034a: iyaṃ bṛsī brāhmaṇa kāmam āsyatām; idaṃ ca pādyaṃ pratigṛhyatām iti
GE09ram_03_u:044.034c: idaṃ ca siddhaṃ vanajātam uttamaṃ; tvadartham avyagram ihopabhujyatām
GE09ram_03_u:044.035c: prahasya tasyā haraṇe dhṛtaṃ manaḥ; samarpayām āsa vadhāya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:044.036a: tataḥ suveṣaṃ mṛgayā gataṃ patiṃ; pratīkṣamāṇā sahalakṣmaṇaṃ tadā
GE09ram_03_u:044.036c: nirīkṣamāṇā haritaṃ dadarśa tan; mahad vanaṃ naiva tu rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_03_u:045.001a: rāvaṇena tu vaidehī tadā pṛṣṭā jihīrṣuṇā
GE09ram_03_u:045.002a: brāhmaṇaś cātithiś caiṣa anukto hi śapeta mām
GE09ram_03_u:045.002c: iti dhyātvā muhūrtaṃ tu sītā vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:045.003c: sītā nāmnāsmi bhadraṃ te rāmabhāryā dvijottama
GE09ram_03_u:045.005a: tataḥ saṃvatsarād ūrdhvaṃ samamanyata me patim
GE09ram_03_u:045.006c: kaikeyī nāma bhartāraṃ mamāryā yācate varam
GE09ram_03_u:045.007a: pratigṛhya tu kaikeyī śvaśuraṃ sukṛtena me
GE09ram_03_u:045.008a: nādya bhokṣye na ca svapsye na pāsye 'haṃ kadā cana
GE09ram_03_u:045.008c: eṣa me jīvitasyānto rāmo yady abhiṣicyate
GE09ram_03_u:045.009a: iti bruvāṇāṃ kaikeyīṃ śvaśuro me sa mānadaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:045.009c: ayācatārthair anvarthair na ca yācñāṃ cakāra sā
GE09ram_03_u:045.010c: rāmeti prathito loke guṇavān satyavāk śuciḥ
GE09ram_03_u:045.011a: abhiṣekāya tu pituḥ samīpaṃ rāmam āgatam
GE09ram_03_u:045.011c: kaikeyī mama bhartāram ity uvāca drutaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:045.012a: tava pitrā samājñaptaṃ mamedaṃ śṛṇu rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:045.013a: tvayā tu khalu vastavyaṃ nava varṣāṇi pañca ca
GE09ram_03_u:045.014a: tathety uvāca tāṃ rāmaḥ kaikeyīm akutobhayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:045.014c: cakāra tadvacas tasyā mama bhartā dṛḍhavrataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:045.015a: dadyān na pratigṛhṇīyāt satyabrūyān na cānṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:045.015c: etad brāhmaṇa rāmasya vrataṃ dhruvam anuttamam
GE09ram_03_u:045.016a: tasya bhrātā tu vaimātro lakṣmaṇo nāma vīryavān
GE09ram_03_u:045.017a: sa bhrātā lakṣmaṇo nāma dharmacārī dṛḍhavrataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:045.018a: te vayaṃ pracyutā rājyāt kaileyyās tu kṛte trayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:045.019a: samāśvasa muhūrtaṃ tu śakyaṃ vastum iha tvayā
GE09ram_03_u:045.019c: āgamiṣyati me bhartā vanyam ādāya puṣkalam
GE09ram_03_u:045.020a: sa tvaṃ nāma ca gotraṃ ca kulam ācakṣva tattvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:045.020c: ekaś ca daṇḍakāraṇye kimarthaṃ carasi dvija
GE09ram_03_u:045.022c: ahaṃ sa rāvaṇo nāma sīte rakṣogaṇeśvaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:045.024c: sarvāsām eva bhadraṃ te mamāgramahiṣī bhava
GE09ram_03_u:045.025a: laṅkā nāma samudrasya madhye mama mahāpurī
GE09ram_03_u:045.026a: tatra sīte mayā sārdhaṃ vaneṣu vicariṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:045.027c: sīte paricariṣyanti bhāryā bhavasi me yadi
GE09ram_03_u:045.032a: tvaṃ punar jambukaḥ siṃhīṃ mām ihecchasi durlabhām
GE09ram_03_u:045.032c: nāhaṃ śakyā tvayā spraṣṭum ādityasya prabhā yathā
GE09ram_03_u:045.033a: pādapān kāñcanān nūnaṃ bahūn paśyasi mandabhāk
GE09ram_03_u:045.033c: rāghavasya priyāṃ bhāryāṃ yas tvam icchasi rāvaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:045.035c: kālakūṭaṃ viṣaṃ pītvā svastimān gantum icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:045.036a: akṣisūcyā pramṛjasi jihvayā leḍhi ca kṣuram
GE09ram_03_u:045.036c: rāghavasya priyāṃ bhāryām adhigantuṃ tvam icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:045.037a: avasajya śilāṃ kaṇṭhe samudraṃ tartum icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:045.037c: sūryā candramasau cobhau prāṇibhyāṃ hartum icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:045.037e: yo rāmasya priyāṃ bhāryāṃ pradharṣayitum icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:045.038c: kalyāṇa vṛttāṃ rāmasya yo bhāryāṃ hartum icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:045.039c: rāmasya sadṛśīṃ bhāryāṃ yo 'dhigantuṃ tvam icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:045.040a: yad antaraṃ siṃhaśṛgālayor vane; yad antaraṃ syandanikāsamudrayoḥ
GE09ram_03_u:045.040c: surāgryasauvīrakayor yad antaraṃ; tad antaraṃ dāśarathes tavaiva ca
GE09ram_03_u:045.041a: yad antaraṃ kāñcanasīsalohayor; yad antaraṃ candanavāripaṅkayoḥ
GE09ram_03_u:045.041c: yad antaraṃ hastibiḍālayor vane; tad antaraṃ daśarathes tavaiva ca
GE09ram_03_u:045.042a: yad antaraṃ vāyasavainateyayor; yad antaraṃ madgumayūrayor api
GE09ram_03_u:045.042c: yad antaraṃ sārasagṛdhrayor vane; tad antaraṃ dāśarathes tavaiva ca
GE09ram_03_u:045.043c: hṛtāpi te 'haṃ na jarāṃ gamiṣye; vajraṃ yathā makṣikayāvagīrṇam
GE09ram_03_u:045.044a: itīva tad vākyam aduṣṭabhāvā; sudṛṣṭam uktvā rajanīcaraṃ tam
GE09ram_03_u:045.044c: gātraprakampād vyathitā babhūva; vātoddhatā sā kadalīva tanvī
GE09ram_03_u:045.045a: tāṃ vepamānām upalakṣya sītāṃ; sa rāvaṇo mṛtyusamaprabhāvaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:045.045c: kulaṃ balaṃ nāma ca karma cātmanaḥ; samācacakṣe bhayakāraṇārtham
GE09ram_03_u:046.001c: lalāṭe bhrukuṭīṃ kṛtvā rāvaṇaḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_03_u:046.002c: rāvaṇo nāma bhadraṃ te daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_03_u:046.003c: vidravanti bhayād bhītā mṛtyor iva sadā prajāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:046.004c: dvandvam āsāditaḥ krodhād raṇe vikramya nirjitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:046.006a: yasya tat puṣpakaṃ nāma vimānaṃ kāmagaṃ śubham
GE09ram_03_u:046.006c: vīryād āvarjitaṃ bhadre yena yāmi vihāyasaṃ
GE09ram_03_u:046.008a: yatra tiṣṭhāmy ahaṃ tatra māruto vāti śaṅkitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:046.008c: tīvrāṃśuḥ śiśirāṃśuś ca bhayāt saṃpadyate raviḥ
GE09ram_03_u:046.009c: bhavanti yatra yatrāhaṃ tiṣṭhāmi ca carāmi ca
GE09ram_03_u:046.010a: mama pāre samudrasya laṅkā nāma purī śubhā
GE09ram_03_u:046.013a: tatra tvaṃ vasatī sīte rājaputri mayā saha
GE09ram_03_u:046.014a: bhuñjānā mānuṣān bhogān divyāṃś ca varavarṇini
GE09ram_03_u:046.015a: sthāpayitvā priyaṃ putraṃ rājñā daśarathena yaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:046.015c: mandavīryaḥ suto jyeṣṭhas tataḥ prasthāpito vanam
GE09ram_03_u:046.018a: pratyākhyāya hi māṃ bhīru paritāpaṃ gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:046.019a: evam uktā tu vaidehī kruddhā saṃraktalocanā
GE09ram_03_u:046.020c: bhrātaraṃ vyapadiśya tvam aśubhaṃ kartum icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:046.021c: yeṣāṃ tvaṃ karkaśo rājā durbuddhir ajitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:046.022a: apahṛtya śacīṃ bhāryāṃ śakyam indrasya jīvitum
GE09ram_03_u:046.022c: na tu rāmasya bhāryāṃ mām apanīyāsti jīvitam
GE09ram_03_u:046.023a: jīvec ciraṃ vajradharasya hastāc; chacīṃ pradhṛṣyāpratirūparūpām
GE09ram_03_u:046.023c: na mādṛśīṃ rākṣasadharṣayitvā; pītāmṛtasyāpi tavāsti mokṣaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:047.001c: haste hastaṃ samāhatya cakāra sumahad vapuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:047.002a: sa maithilīṃ punar vākyaṃ babhāṣe ca tato bhṛśam
GE09ram_03_u:047.003a: udvaheyaṃ bhujābhyāṃ tu medinīm ambare sthitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:047.003c: āpibeyaṃ samudraṃ ca mṛtyuṃ hanyāṃ raṇe sthitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:047.004a: arkaṃ rundhyāṃ śarais tīkṣṇair vibhindyāṃ hi mahītalam
GE09ram_03_u:047.004c: kāmarūpiṇam unmatte paśya māṃ kāmadaṃ patim
GE09ram_03_u:047.006a: sadyaḥ saumyaṃ parityajya bhikṣurūpaṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:047.010a: sa tām asitakeśāntāṃ bhāskarasya prabhām iva
GE09ram_03_u:047.011a: triṣu lokeṣu vikhyātaṃ yadi bhartāram icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:047.011c: mām āśraya varārohe tavāhaṃ sadṛśaḥ patiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:047.012a: māṃ bhajasva cirāya tvam ahaṃ ślāghyas tava priyaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:047.012c: naiva cāhaṃ kva cid bhadre kariṣye tava vipriyam
GE09ram_03_u:047.012e: tyajyatāṃ mānuṣo bhāvo mayi bhāvaḥ praṇīyatām
GE09ram_03_u:047.014a: yaḥ striyā vacanād rājyaṃ vihāya sasuhṛjjanam
GE09ram_03_u:047.015a: ity uktvā maithilīṃ vākyaṃ priyārhāṃ priyavādinīm
GE09ram_03_u:047.015c: jagrāha rāvaṇaḥ sītāṃ budhaḥ khe rohiṇīm iva
GE09ram_03_u:047.016a: vāmena sītāṃ padmākṣīṃ mūrdhajeṣu kareṇa saḥ
GE09ram_03_u:047.018a: sa ca māyāmayo divyaḥ kharayuktaḥ kharasvanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:047.019a: tatas tāṃ paruṣair vākyair abhitarjya mahāsvanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:047.020c: rāmeti sītā duḥkhārtā rāmaṃ dūragataṃ vane
GE09ram_03_u:047.021a: tām akāmāṃ sa kāmārtaḥ pannagendravadhūm iva
GE09ram_03_u:047.024a: jīvitaṃ sukham arthāṃś ca dharmahetoḥ parityajan
GE09ram_03_u:047.024c: hriyamāṇām adharmeṇa māṃ rāghava na paśyasi
GE09ram_03_u:047.025c: katham evaṃvidhaṃ pāpaṃ na tvaṃ śādhi hi rāvaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:047.026c: kālo 'py aṅgī bhavaty atra sasyānām iva paktaye
GE09ram_03_u:047.028a: hantedānīṃ sakāmā tu kaikeyī bāndhavaiḥ saha
GE09ram_03_u:047.029c: kṣipraṃ rāmāya śaṃsadhvaṃ sītāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:047.030c: kṣipraṃ rāmāya śaṃsadhvaṃ sītāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:047.031c: kṣipraṃ rāmāya śaṃsadhvaṃ sītāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:047.032a: daivatāni ca yānty asmin vane vividhapādape
GE09ram_03_u:047.032c: namaskaromy ahaṃ tebhyo bhartuḥ śaṃsata māṃ hṛtām
GE09ram_03_u:047.033a: yāni kāni cid apy atra sattvāni nivasanty uta
GE09ram_03_u:047.036a: rāmāya tu yathātattvaṃ jaṭāyo haraṇaṃ mama
GE09ram_03_u:047.036c: lakṣmaṇāya ca tat sarvam ākhyātavyam aśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:048.001a: taṃ śabdam avasuptasya jaṭāyur atha śuśruve
GE09ram_03_u:048.001c: niraikṣad rāvaṇaṃ kṣipraṃ vaidehīṃ ca dadarśa saḥ
GE09ram_03_u:048.004c: lokānāṃ ca hite yukto rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:048.005c: sītā nāma varārohā yāṃ tvaṃ hartum ihecchasi
GE09ram_03_u:048.006a: kathaṃ rājā sthito dharme paradārān parāmṛśet
GE09ram_03_u:048.007a: na tat samācared dhīro yat paro 'sya vigarhayet
GE09ram_03_u:048.008a: arthaṃ vā yadi vā kāmaṃ śiṣṭāḥ śāstreṣv anāgatam
GE09ram_03_u:048.009a: rājā dharmaś ca kāmaś ca dravyāṇāṃ cottamo nidhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:048.009c: dharmaḥ śubhaṃ vā pāpaṃ vā rājamūlaṃ pravartate
GE09ram_03_u:048.010a: pāpasvabhāvaś capalaḥ kathaṃ tvaṃ rakṣasāṃ vara
GE09ram_03_u:048.011a: kāmasvabhāvo yo yasya na sa śakyaḥ pramārjitum
GE09ram_03_u:048.011c: na hi duṣṭātmanām ārya mā vasaty ālaye ciram
GE09ram_03_u:048.012a: viṣaye vā pure vā te yadā rāmo mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:048.014a: atra brūhi yathāsatyaṃ ko rāmasya vyatikramaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:048.014c: yasya tvaṃ lokanāthasya hṛtvā bhāryāṃ gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:048.015a: kṣipraṃ visṛja vaidehīṃ mā tvā ghoreṇa cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_03_u:048.015c: dahed dahana bhūtena vṛtram indrāśanir yathā
GE09ram_03_u:048.016c: grīvāyāṃ pratimuktaṃ ca kālapāśaṃ na paśyasi
GE09ram_03_u:048.017a: sa bhāraḥ saumya bhartavyo yo naraṃ nāvasādayet
GE09ram_03_u:048.017c: tad annam upabhoktavyaṃ jīryate yad anāmayam
GE09ram_03_u:048.018a: yat kṛtvā na bhaved dharmo na kīrtir na yaśo bhuvi
GE09ram_03_u:048.018c: śarīrasya bhavet khedaḥ kas tat karma samācaret
GE09ram_03_u:048.020a: vṛddho 'haṃ tvaṃ yuvā dhanvī sarathaḥ kavacī śarī
GE09ram_03_u:048.020c: tathāpy ādāya vaidehīṃ kuśalī na gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:048.021a: na śaktas tvaṃ balād dhartuṃ vaidehīṃ mama paśyataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:048.022a: yudhyasva yadi śūro 'si muhūrtaṃ tiṣṭha rāvaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:048.022c: śayiṣyase hato bhūmau yathāpūrvaṃ kharas tathā
GE09ram_03_u:048.023c: nacirāc cīravāsās tvāṃ rāmo yudhi vadhiṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:048.024a: kiṃ nu śakyaṃ mayā kartuṃ gatau dūraṃ nṛpātmajau
GE09ram_03_u:048.024c: kṣipraṃ tvaṃ naśyase nīca tayor bhīto na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:048.025a: na hi me jīvamānasya nayiṣyasi śubhām imām
GE09ram_03_u:048.026a: avaśyaṃ tu mayā kāryaṃ priyaṃ tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:048.027a: tiṣṭha tiṣṭha daśagrīva muhūrtaṃ paśya rāvaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:048.027e: vṛntād iva phalaṃ tvāṃ tu pātayeyaṃ rathottamāt
GE09ram_03_u:049.003a: sa saṃprahāras tumulas tayos tasmin mahāvane
GE09ram_03_u:049.009a: sa tair bāṇair mahāvīryaḥ pūrṇamuktair ajihmagaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:049.009c: bibheda niśitais tīkṣṇair gṛdhraṃ ghoraiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:049.013c: tāṃś cāsya javasaṃpannāñ jaghāna samare balī
GE09ram_03_u:049.016c: sādhu sādhv iti bhūtāni gṛdhrarājam apūjayan
GE09ram_03_u:049.017a: pariśrāntaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā jarayā pakṣiyūthapam
GE09ram_03_u:049.017c: utpapāta punar hṛṣṭo maithilīṃ gṛhya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:049.019c: alpabuddhe harasy enāṃ vadhāya khalu rakṣasām
GE09ram_03_u:049.021c: śīghram eva vinaśyanti yathā tvaṃ vinaśiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:049.022a: baddhas tvaṃ kālapāśena kva gatas tasya mokṣyase
GE09ram_03_u:049.022c: vadhāya baḍiśaṃ gṛhya sāmiṣaṃ jalajo yathā
GE09ram_03_u:049.023a: na hi jātu durādharṣau kākutsthau tava rāvaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:049.024a: yathā tvayā kṛtaṃ karma bhīruṇā lokagarhitam
GE09ram_03_u:049.025a: yudhyasva yadi śūro 'si muhūrtaṃ tiṣṭha rāvaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:049.025c: śayiṣyase hato bhūmau yathā bhrātā kharas tathā
GE09ram_03_u:049.027a: pāpānubandho vai yasya karmaṇaḥ ko nu tat pumān
GE09ram_03_u:049.028a: evam uktvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ jaṭāyus tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:049.029a: taṃ gṛhītvā nakhais tīkṣṇair virarāda samantataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:049.030a: virarāda nakhair asya tuṇḍaṃ pṛṣṭhe samarpayan
GE09ram_03_u:049.031a: sa tathā gṛdhrarājena kliśyamāno muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:049.034a: tataḥ kruddho daśakrīvaḥ sītām utsṛjya vīryavān
GE09ram_03_u:049.035c: rākṣasānāṃ ca mukhyasya pakṣiṇāṃ pravarasya ca
GE09ram_03_u:049.036c: pakṣau pādau ca pārśvau ca khaḍgam uddhṛtya so 'cchinat
GE09ram_03_u:049.038a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ bhūmau kṣatajārdraṃ jaṭāyuṣam
GE09ram_03_u:049.039c: dadarśa laṅkādhipatiḥ pṛthivyāṃ; jaṭāyuṣaṃ śāntam ivāgnidāvam
GE09ram_03_u:049.040a: tatas tu taṃ patrarathaṃ mahītale; nipātitaṃ rāvaṇavegamarditam
GE09ram_03_u:049.040c: punaḥ pariṣvajya śaśiprabhānanā; ruroda sītā janakātmajā tadā
GE09ram_03_u:050.002a: sā tu tārādhipamukhī rāvaṇena samīkṣya tam
GE09ram_03_u:050.004a: na nūnaṃ rāma jānāsi mahad vyasanam ātmajaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:050.005a: trāhi mām adya kākutstha lakṣmaṇeti varāṅganā
GE09ram_03_u:050.007a: tāṃ latām iva veṣṭantīm āliṅgantīṃ mahādrumān
GE09ram_03_u:050.008a: krośantīṃ rāma rāmeti rāmeṇa rahitāṃ vane
GE09ram_03_u:050.010a: dṛṣṭvā sītāṃ parāmṛṣṭāṃ dīnāṃ divyena cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_03_u:050.010c: kṛtaṃ kāryam iti śrīmān vyājahāra pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:050.011a: prahṛṣṭā vyathitāś cāsan sarve te paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:050.012a: sa tu tāṃ rāma rāmeti rudantīṃ lakṣmaṇeti ca
GE09ram_03_u:050.013c: rarāja rājaputrī tu vidyut saudāmanī yathā
GE09ram_03_u:050.014a: uddhūtena ca vastreṇa tasyāḥ pītena rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:050.017a: tasyās tad vimalaṃ vaktram ākāśe rāvaṇāṅkagam
GE09ram_03_u:050.017c: na rarāja vinā rāmaṃ vinālam iva paṅkajam
GE09ram_03_u:050.018a: babhūva jaladaṃ nīlaṃ bhittvā candra ivoditaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:050.020c: śuśubhe na vinā rāmaṃ divā candra ivoditaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:050.021c: śuśubhe kāñcanī kāñcī nīlaṃ maṇim ivāśritā
GE09ram_03_u:050.023c: babhūva vimalo nīlaḥ saghoṣa iva toyadaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:050.031c: vaidehyā nipatan bhāti gaṅgeva gaganāc cyutā
GE09ram_03_u:050.032c: mā bhair iti vidhūtāgrā vyājahrur iva pādapāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:050.033c: sakhīm iva gatotsāhāṃ śocantīva sma maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:050.036a: hriyamāṇāṃ tu vaidehīṃ dṛṣṭvā dīno divākaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:050.037a: nāsti dharmaḥ kutaḥ satyaṃ nārjavaṃ nānṛśaṃsatā
GE09ram_03_u:050.037c: yatra rāmasya vaidehīṃ bhāryāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:050.040a: vikrośantīṃ dṛḍhaṃ sītāṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥkhaṃ tathā gatām
GE09ram_03_u:050.040c: tāṃ tu lakṣmaṇa rāmeti krośantīṃ madhurasvarām
GE09ram_03_u:050.042a: tatas tu sā cārudatī śucismitā; vinākṛtā bandhujanena maithilī
GE09ram_03_u:051.001a: kham utpatantaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā maithilī janakātmajā
GE09ram_03_u:051.003c: jñātvā virahitāṃ yo māṃ corayitvā palāyase
GE09ram_03_u:051.004a: tvayaiva nūnaṃ duṣṭātman bhīruṇā hartum icchatā
GE09ram_03_u:051.004e: yo hi mām udyatas trātuṃ so 'py ayaṃ vinipātitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:051.005a: paramaṃ khalu te vīryaṃ dṛśyate rākṣasādhama
GE09ram_03_u:051.005c: viśrāvya nāmadheyaṃ hi yuddhe nāsti jitā tvayā
GE09ram_03_u:051.006a: īdṛśaṃ garhitaṃ karma kathaṃ kṛtvā na lajjase
GE09ram_03_u:051.006c: striyāś ca haraṇaṃ nīca rahite ca parasya ca
GE09ram_03_u:051.008a: dhik te śauryaṃ ca sattvaṃ ca yat tvayā kathitaṃ tadā
GE09ram_03_u:051.008c: kulākrośakaraṃ loke dhik te cāritram īdṛśam
GE09ram_03_u:051.009a: kiṃ śakyaṃ kartum evaṃ hi yaj javenaiva dhāvasi
GE09ram_03_u:051.009c: muhūrtam api tiṣṭhasva na jīvan pratiyāsyasi
GE09ram_03_u:051.010a: na hi cakṣuḥpathaṃ prāpya tayoḥ pārthivaputrayoḥ
GE09ram_03_u:051.010c: sasainyo 'pi samartaḥs tvaṃ muhūrtam api jīvitum
GE09ram_03_u:051.011a: na tvaṃ tayoḥ śarasparśaṃ soḍhuṃ śaktaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_03_u:051.012a: sādhu kṛtvātmanaḥ pathyaṃ sādhu māṃ muñca rāvaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:051.012c: matpradharṣaṇaruṣṭo hi bhrātrā saha patir mama
GE09ram_03_u:051.012e: vidhāsyati vināśāya tvaṃ māṃ yadi na muñcasi
GE09ram_03_u:051.013a: yena tvaṃ vyavasāyena balān māṃ hartum icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:051.013c: vyavasāyaḥ sa te nīca bhaviṣyati nirarthakaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:051.014a: na hy ahaṃ tam apaśyantī bhartāraṃ vibudhopamam
GE09ram_03_u:051.015a: na nūnaṃ cātmanaḥ śreyaḥ pathyaṃ vā samavekṣase
GE09ram_03_u:051.016a: mumūrṣūṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ yat pathyaṃ tan na rocate
GE09ram_03_u:051.017a: yathā cāsmin bhayasthāne na bibheṣe daśānana
GE09ram_03_u:051.017c: vyaktaṃ hiraṇmayān hi tvaṃ saṃpaśyasi mahīruhān
GE09ram_03_u:051.019c: drakṣyase śālmalīṃ tīkṣṇām āyasaiḥ kaṇṭakaiś citām
GE09ram_03_u:051.020a: na hi tvam īdṛśaṃ kṛtvā tasyālīkaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:051.020c: dhārituṃ śakṣyasi ciraṃ viṣaṃ pītveva nirghṛṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:051.021c: kva gato lapsyase śarma bhartur mama mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:051.023c: na tvāṃ hanyāc charais tīkṣṇair iṣṭabhāryāpahāriṇam
GE09ram_03_u:051.024a: etac cānyac ca paruṣaṃ vaidehī rāvaṇāṅkagā
GE09ram_03_u:051.025a: tathā bhṛśārtāṃ bahu caiva bhāṣiṇīṃ; vilalāpa pūrvaṃ karuṇaṃ ca bhāminīm
GE09ram_03_u:051.025c: jahāra pāpas taruṇīṃ viveṣṭatīṃ; nṛpātmajām āgatagātravepathum
GE09ram_03_u:052.001a: hriyamāṇā tu vaidehī kaṃ cin nātham apaśyatī
GE09ram_03_u:052.002e: mumoca yadi rāmāya śaṃseyur iti maithilī
GE09ram_03_u:052.003a: vastram utsṛjya tan madhye vinikṣiptaṃ sabhūṣaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:052.003c: saṃbhramāt tu daśagrīvas tat karma na ca buddhivān
GE09ram_03_u:052.004a: piṅgākṣās tāṃ viśālākṣīṃ netrair animiṣair iva
GE09ram_03_u:052.005a: sa ca pampām atikramya laṅkām abhimukhaḥ purīm
GE09ram_03_u:052.006a: tāṃ jahāra susaṃhṛṣṭo rāvaṇo mṛtyum ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:052.007a: vanāni saritaḥ śailān sarāṃsi ca vihāyasā
GE09ram_03_u:052.007c: sa kṣipraṃ samatīyāya śaraś cāpād iva cyutaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:052.010c: etad anto daśagrīva iti siddhās tadābruvan
GE09ram_03_u:052.011a: sa tu sītāṃ viveṣṭantīm aṅkenādāya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:052.011c: praviveśa purīṃ laṅkāṃ rūpiṇīṃ mṛtyum ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:052.013c: nidadhe rāvaṇaḥ sītāṃ mayo māyām ivāsurīm
GE09ram_03_u:052.014c: yathā naināṃ pumān strī vā sītāṃ paśyaty asaṃmataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:052.015c: yad yad icchet tad evāsyā deyaṃ macchandato yathā
GE09ram_03_u:052.016a: yā ca vakṣyati vaidehīṃ vacanaṃ kiṃ cid apriyam
GE09ram_03_u:052.016c: ajñānād yadi vā jñānān na tasyā jīvitaṃ priyam
GE09ram_03_u:052.017a: tathoktvā rākṣasīs tās tu rākṣasendraḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_03_u:052.017c: niṣkramyāntaḥpurāt tasmāt kiṃ kṛtyam iti cintayan
GE09ram_03_u:052.018a: sa tān dṛṣṭvā mahāvīryo varadānena mohitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:052.020c: pauruṣaṃ balam āśritya trāsam utsṛjya dūrataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:052.021a: balaṃ hi sumahad yan me janasthāne niveśitam
GE09ram_03_u:052.022c: vairaṃ ca sumahaj jātaṃ rāmaṃ prati sudāruṇam
GE09ram_03_u:052.023a: niryātayitum icchāmi tac ca vairam ahaṃ ripoḥ
GE09ram_03_u:052.023c: na hi lapsyāmy ahaṃ nidrām ahatvā saṃyuge ripum
GE09ram_03_u:052.024a: taṃ tv idānīm ahaṃ hatvā kharadūṣaṇaghātinam
GE09ram_03_u:052.025a: janasthāne vasadbhis tu bhavadbhī rāmam āśritā
GE09ram_03_u:052.026a: apramādāc ca gantavyaṃ sarvair eva niśācaraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:052.026c: kartavyaś ca sadā yatno rāghavasya vadhaṃ prati
GE09ram_03_u:052.027c: ataś cāsmiñ janasthāne mayā yūyaṃ niyojitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:052.028a: tataḥ priyaṃ vākyam upetya rākṣasā; mahārtham aṣṭāv abhivādya rāvaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:052.028c: vihāya laṅkāṃ sahitāḥ pratasthire; yato janasthānam alakṣyadarśanāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:052.029a: tatas tu sītām upalabhya rāvaṇaḥ; susaṃprahṛṣṭaḥ parigṛhya maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:052.029c: prasajya rāmeṇa ca vairam uttamaṃ; babhūva mohān muditaḥ sa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:053.002c: praviveśa gṛhaṃ ramyaṃ sītāṃ draṣṭum abhitvaran
GE09ram_03_u:053.003a: sa praviśya tu tadveśma rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:053.006a: tāṃ tu śokavaśāṃ dīnām avaśāṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:053.006c: sa balād darśayām āsa gṛhaṃ devagṛhopamam
GE09ram_03_u:053.008a: kāñcanais tāpanīyaiś ca sphāṭikai rājatais tathā
GE09ram_03_u:053.009c: sopānaṃ kāñcanaṃ citram āruroha tayā saha
GE09ram_03_u:053.013a: darśayitvā tu vaidehīṃ kṛtsnaṃ tad bhavanottamam
GE09ram_03_u:053.014c: varjayitvā jarā vṛddhān bālāṃś ca rajanīcarān
GE09ram_03_u:053.015a: teṣāṃ prabhur ahaṃ sīte sarveṣāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām
GE09ram_03_u:053.016a: yad idaṃ rājyatantraṃ me tvayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE09ram_03_u:053.016c: jīvitaṃ ca viśālākṣi tvaṃ me prāṇair garīyasī
GE09ram_03_u:053.017c: tāsāṃ tvam īśvarī sīte mama bhāryā bhava priye
GE09ram_03_u:053.018a: sādhu kiṃ te 'nyayā buddhyā rocayasva vaco mama
GE09ram_03_u:053.019c: neyaṃ dharṣayituṃ śakyā sendrair api surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:053.020a: na deveṣu na yakṣeṣu na gandharveṣu narṣiṣu
GE09ram_03_u:053.020c: ahaṃ paśyāmi lokeṣu yo me vīryasamo bhavet
GE09ram_03_u:053.022a: bhajasva sīte mām eva bhartāhaṃ sadṛśas tava
GE09ram_03_u:053.022c: yauvanaṃ hy adhruvaṃ bhīru ramasveha mayā saha
GE09ram_03_u:053.023a: darśane mā kṛthā buddhiṃ rāghavasya varānane
GE09ram_03_u:053.023c: kāsya śaktir ihāgantum api sīte manorathaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:053.024a: na śakyo vāyur ākāśe pāśair baddhaṃ mahājavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:053.024c: dīpyamānasya vāpy agner grahītuṃ vimalāṃ śikhām
GE09ram_03_u:053.025a: trayāṇām api lokānāṃ na taṃ paśyāmi śobhane
GE09ram_03_u:053.026a: laṅkāyāṃ sumahad rājyam idaṃ tvam anupālaya
GE09ram_03_u:053.027a: duṣkṛtaṃ yat purā karma vanavāsena tad gatam
GE09ram_03_u:053.027c: yaś ca te sukṛto dharmas tasyeha phalam āpnuhi
GE09ram_03_u:053.028c: bhūṣaṇāni ca mukhyāni tāni seva mayā saha
GE09ram_03_u:053.029a: puṣpakaṃ nāma suśroṇi bhrātur vaiśravaṇasya me
GE09ram_03_u:053.029c: vimānaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ ca tad vimānaṃ manojavam
GE09ram_03_u:053.030a: tatra sīte mayā sārdhaṃ viharasva yathāsukham
GE09ram_03_u:053.031a: śokārtaṃ tu varārohe na bhrājati varānane
GE09ram_03_u:053.031c: alaṃ vrīḍena vaidehi dharmalopa kṛtena te
GE09ram_03_u:053.032c: etau pādau mayā snigdhau śirobhiḥ paripīḍitau
GE09ram_03_u:053.033a: prasādaṃ kuru me kṣipraṃ vaśyo dāso 'ham asmi te
GE09ram_03_u:053.033c: nemāḥ śūnyā mayā vācaḥ śuṣyamāṇena bhāṣitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:053.034a: na cāpi rāvaṇaḥ kāṃ cin mūrdhnā strīṃ praṇameta ha
GE09ram_03_u:054.001a: sā tathoktā tu vaidehī nirbhayā śokakarṣitā
GE09ram_03_u:054.002c: satyasandhaḥ parijñāto yasya putraḥ sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:054.003a: rāmo nāma sa dharmātmā triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:054.003c: dīrghabāhur viśālākṣo daivataṃ sa patir mama
GE09ram_03_u:054.004c: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā yas te prāṇāṃ hariṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:054.005a: pratyakṣaṃ yady ahaṃ tasya tvayā syāṃ dharṣitā balāt
GE09ram_03_u:054.005c: śayitā tvaṃ hataḥ saṃkhye janasthāne yathā kharaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:054.006a: ya ete rākṣasāḥ proktā ghorarūpā mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:054.006c: rāghave nirviṣāḥ sarve suparṇe pannagā yathā
GE09ram_03_u:054.008a: asurair vā surair vā tvaṃ yady avadho 'si rāvaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:054.008c: utpādya sumahad vairaṃ jīvaṃs tasya na mokṣyase
GE09ram_03_u:054.010a: yadi paśyet sa rāmas tvāṃ roṣadīptena cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_03_u:054.010c: rakṣas tvam adya nirdagdho gaccheḥ sadyaḥ parābhavam
GE09ram_03_u:054.011a: yaś candraṃ nabhaso bhūmau pātayen nāśayeta vā
GE09ram_03_u:054.011c: sāgaraṃ śoṣayed vāpi sa sītāṃ mocayed iha
GE09ram_03_u:054.013a: na te pāpam idaṃ karma sukhodarkaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:054.013c: yāhaṃ nītā vinā bhāvaṃ patipārśvāt tvayā vanāt
GE09ram_03_u:054.014a: sa hi daivatasaṃyukto mama bhartā mahādyutiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:054.014c: nirbhayo vīryam āśritya śūnye vasati daṇḍake
GE09ram_03_u:054.015a: sa te darpaṃ balaṃ vīryam utsekaṃ ca tathāvidham
GE09ram_03_u:054.016c: tadā kārye pramādyanti narāḥ kālavaśaṃ gatāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:054.017a: māṃ pradhṛṣya sa te kālaḥ prāpto 'yaṃ rakṣasādhama
GE09ram_03_u:054.018a: na śakyā yajñamadhyasthā vediḥ srugbhāṇḍa maṇḍitā
GE09ram_03_u:054.019a: idaṃ śarīraṃ niḥsaṃjñaṃ bandha vā ghātayasva vā
GE09ram_03_u:054.019c: nedaṃ śarīraṃ rakṣyaṃ me jīvitaṃ vāpi rākṣasa
GE09ram_03_u:054.019e: na hi śakṣyāmy upakrośaṃ pṛthivyāṃ dātum ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:054.020a: evam uktvā tu vaidehī kroddhāt suparuṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:054.020c: rāvaṇaṃ maithilī tatra punar novāca kiṃ cana
GE09ram_03_u:054.022a: śṛṇu maithili madvākyaṃ māsān dvādaśa bhāmini
GE09ram_03_u:054.022e: tatas tvāṃ prātarāśārthaṃ sūdāś chetsyanti leśaśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:054.023a: ity uktvā paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ rāvaṇaḥ śatrurāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:054.023c: rākṣasīś ca tataḥ kruddha idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:054.024a: śīghram evaṃ hi rākṣasyo vikṛtā ghoradarśanāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:054.025a: vacanād eva tās tasya vikṛtā ghoradarśanāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:054.026a: sa tāḥ provāca rājā tu rāvaṇo ghoradarśanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:054.028a: tatraināṃ tarjanair ghoraiḥ punaḥ sāntvaiś ca maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:054.028c: ānayadhvaṃ vaśaṃ sarvā vanyāṃ gajavadhūm iva
GE09ram_03_u:054.031c: rākṣasī vaśam āpannā vyāghrīṇāṃ hariṇī yathā
GE09ram_03_u:054.032a: na vindate tatra tu śarma maithilī; virūpanetrābhir atīva tarjitā
GE09ram_03_u:054.032c: patiṃ smarantī dayitaṃ ca devaraṃ; vicetanābhūd bhayaśokapīḍitā
GE09ram_03_u:055.001c: nihatya rāmo mārīcaṃ tūrṇaṃ pathi nyavartata
GE09ram_03_u:055.003a: sa tasya svaram ājñāya dāruṇaṃ romaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:055.004a: aśubhaṃ bata manye 'haṃ gomāyur vāśyate yathā
GE09ram_03_u:055.004c: svasti syād api vaidehyā rākṣasair bhakṣaṇaṃ vinā
GE09ram_03_u:055.005a: mārīcena tu vijñāya svaram ālakṣya māmakam
GE09ram_03_u:055.006a: sa saumitriḥ svaraṃ śrutvā tāṃ ca hitvātha maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:055.007a: rākṣasaiḥ sahitair nūnaṃ sītāyā īpsito vadhaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:055.007c: kāñcanaś ca mṛgo bhūtvā vyapanīyāśramāt tu mām
GE09ram_03_u:055.008a: dūraṃ nītvā tu mārīco rākṣaso 'bhūc charāhataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:055.008c: hā lakṣmaṇa hato 'smīti yad vākyaṃ vyajahāra ha
GE09ram_03_u:055.009a: api svasti bhaved dvābhyāṃ rahitābhyāṃ mayā vane
GE09ram_03_u:055.009e: nimittāni ca ghorāṇi dṛśyante 'dya bahūni ca
GE09ram_03_u:055.010a: ity evaṃ cintayan rāmaḥ śrutvā gomāyuniḥsvanam
GE09ram_03_u:055.011c: savyaṃ kṛtvā mahātmānaṃ ghorāṃś ca sasṛjuḥ svarān
GE09ram_03_u:055.014a: saṃjagarhe 'tha taṃ bhrātā jeṣṭho lakṣmaṇam āgatam
GE09ram_03_u:055.015a: gṛhītvā ca karaṃ savyaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:055.016a: aho lakṣmaṇa garhyaṃ te kṛtaṃ yat tvaṃ vihāya tām
GE09ram_03_u:055.016c: sītām ihāgataḥ saumya kaccit svasti bhaved iti
GE09ram_03_u:055.017a: na me 'sti saṃśayo vīra sarvathā janakātmajā
GE09ram_03_u:055.018a: aśubhāny eva bhūyiṣṭhaṃ yathā prādurbhavanti me
GE09ram_03_u:055.019a: idaṃ hi rakṣomṛgasaṃnikāśaṃ; pralobhya māṃ dūram anuprayātam
GE09ram_03_u:055.019c: hataṃ kathaṃ cin mahatā śrameṇa; sa rākṣaso 'bhūn mriyamāṇa eva
GE09ram_03_u:055.020a: manaś ca me dīnam ihāprahṛṣṭaṃ; cakṣuś ca savyaṃ kurute vikāram
GE09ram_03_u:055.020c: asaṃśayaṃ lakṣmaṇa nāsti sītā; hṛtā mṛtā vā pathi vartate vā
GE09ram_03_u:056.001a: sa dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇaṃ dīnaṃ śūnye daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:056.002a: prasthitaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ yā mām anujagāma ha
GE09ram_03_u:056.002c: kva sā lakṣmaṇa vaidehī yāṃ hitvā tvam ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:056.003c: kva sā duḥkhasahāyā me vaidehī tanumadhyamā
GE09ram_03_u:056.004a: yāṃ vinā notsahe vīra muhūrtam api jīvitum
GE09ram_03_u:056.004c: kva sā prāṇasahāyā me sītā surasutopamā
GE09ram_03_u:056.005a: patitvam amarāṇāṃ vā pṛthivyāś cāpi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:056.006a: kaccij jīvati vaidehī prāṇaiḥ priyatarā mama
GE09ram_03_u:056.006c: kaccit pravrājanaṃ saumya na me mithyā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:056.007a: sītānimittaṃ saumitre mṛte mayi gate tvayi
GE09ram_03_u:056.007c: kaccit sakāmā sukhitā kaikeyī sā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:056.008c: upasthāsyati kausalyā kaccin saumya na kaikayīm
GE09ram_03_u:056.009a: yadi jīvati vaidehī gamiṣyāmy āśramaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:056.009c: suvṛttā yadi vṛttā sā prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:056.011a: brūhi lakṣmaṇa vaidehī yadi jīvati vā na vā
GE09ram_03_u:056.011c: tvayi pramatte rakṣobhir bhakṣitā vā tapasvinī
GE09ram_03_u:056.012a: sukumārī ca bālā ca nityaṃ cāduḥkhadarśinī
GE09ram_03_u:056.013c: vadatā lakṣmaṇety uccais tavāpi janitaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_03_u:056.014a: śrutaś ca śaṅke vaidehyā sa svaraḥ sadṛśo mama
GE09ram_03_u:056.014c: trastayā preṣitas tvaṃ ca draṣṭuṃ māṃ śīghram āgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:056.015a: sarvathā tu kṛtaṃ kaṣṭaṃ sītām utsṛjatā vane
GE09ram_03_u:056.016c: taiḥ sītā nihatā ghorair bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:056.017c: kiṃ tv idānīṃ kariṣyāmi śaṅke prāptavyam īdṛśam
GE09ram_03_u:056.018a: iti sītāṃ varārohāṃ cintayann eva rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:056.019a: vigarhamāṇo 'nujam ārtarūpaṃ; kṣudhā śramāc caiva pipāsayā ca
GE09ram_03_u:056.019c: viniḥśvasañ śuṣkamukho viṣaṇṇaḥ; pratiśrayaṃ prāpya samīkṣya śūnyam
GE09ram_03_u:056.020a: svam āśramaṃ saṃpravigāhya vīro; vihāradeśān anusṛtya kāṃś cit
GE09ram_03_u:056.020c: etat tad ity eva nivāsabhūmau; prahṛṣṭaromā vyathito babhūva
GE09ram_03_u:057.002a: tam uvāca kimarthaṃ tvam āgato 'pāsya maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:057.002c: yadā sā tava viśvāsād vane viharitā mayā
GE09ram_03_u:057.003a: dṛṣṭvaivābhyāgataṃ tvāṃ me maithilīṃ tyajya lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:057.003c: śaṅkamānaṃ mahat pāpaṃ yat satyaṃ vyathitaṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:057.004a: sphurate nayanaṃ savyaṃ bāhuś ca hṛdayaṃ ca me
GE09ram_03_u:057.004c: dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇa dūre tvāṃ sītāvirahitaṃ pathi
GE09ram_03_u:057.005a: evam uktas tu saumitrir lakṣmaṇaḥ śubhalakṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:057.006a: na svayaṃ kāmakāreṇa tāṃ tyaktvāham ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:057.007a: āryeṇeva parikruṣṭaṃ hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca
GE09ram_03_u:057.007c: paritrāhīti yad vākyaṃ maithilyās tac chrutiṃ gatam
GE09ram_03_u:057.008a: sā tam ārtasvaraṃ śrutvā tava snehena maithilī
GE09ram_03_u:057.008c: gaccha gaccheti mām āha rudantī bhayavihvalā
GE09ram_03_u:057.010a: na tat paśyāmy ahaṃ rakṣo yad asya bhayam āvahet
GE09ram_03_u:057.010c: nirvṛtā bhava nāsty etat kenāpy evam udāhṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:057.011a: vigarhitaṃ ca nīcaṃ ca katham āryo 'bhidhāsyati
GE09ram_03_u:057.011c: trāhīti vacanaṃ sīte yas trāyet tridaśān api
GE09ram_03_u:057.012a: kiṃnimittaṃ tu kenāpi bhrātur ālambya me svaram
GE09ram_03_u:057.012c: visvaraṃ vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇa trāhi mām iti
GE09ram_03_u:057.013a: alaṃ vaiklavyam ālambya svasthā bhava nirutsukā
GE09ram_03_u:057.013c: na cāsti triṣu lokeṣu pumān yo rāghavaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_03_u:057.013e: jāto vā jāyamāno vā saṃyuge yaḥ parājayet
GE09ram_03_u:057.014c: uvācāśrūṇi muñcantī dāruṇaṃ mām idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:057.015a: bhāvo mayi tavātyarthaṃ pāpa eva niveśitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:057.015c: vinaṣṭe bhrātari prāpte na ca tvaṃ mām avāpsyasi
GE09ram_03_u:057.018a: evam ukto hi vaidehyā saṃrabdho raktalocanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:057.019c: abravīd duṣkṛtaṃ saumya tāṃ vinā yat tvam āgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:057.020a: jānann api samarthaṃ māṃ rakṣasāṃ vinivāraṇe
GE09ram_03_u:057.021a: na hi te parituṣyāmi tyaktvā yad yāsi maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:057.021c: kruddhāyāḥ paruṣaṃ śrutvā striyā yat tvam ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:057.022a: sarvathā tv apanītaṃ te sītayā yat pracoditaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:057.022c: krodhasya vaśam āgamya nākaroḥ śāsanaṃ mama
GE09ram_03_u:057.023a: asau hi rākṣasaḥ śete śareṇābhihato mayā
GE09ram_03_u:057.024a: vikṛṣya cāpaṃ paridhāya sāyakaṃ; salīla bāṇena ca tāḍito mayā
GE09ram_03_u:057.024c: mārgīṃ tanuṃ tyajya ca viklavasvaro; babhūva keyūradharaḥ sa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:057.025a: śarāhatenaiva tadārtayā girā; svaraṃ mamālambya sudūrasaṃśravam
GE09ram_03_u:057.025c: udāhṛtaṃ tad vacanaṃ sudāruṇaṃ; tvam āgato yena vihāya maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:058.001c: prāsphurac cāskhalad rāmo vepathuś cāsya jāyate
GE09ram_03_u:058.002c: api kṣemaṃ tu sītāyā iti vai vyājahāra ha
GE09ram_03_u:058.005a: dadarśa parṇaśālāṃ ca rahitāṃ sītayā tadā
GE09ram_03_u:058.005c: śriyā virahitāṃ dhvastāṃ hemante padminīm iva
GE09ram_03_u:058.008a: hṛtā mṛtā vā naṣṭā vā bhakṣitā vā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:058.008c: nilīnāpy atha vā bhīrur atha vā vanam āśritā
GE09ram_03_u:058.009a: gatā vicetuṃ puṣpāṇi phalāny api ca vā punaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:058.009c: atha vā padminīṃ yātā jalārthaṃ vā nadīṃ gatā
GE09ram_03_u:058.010a: yatnān mṛgayamāṇas tu nāsasāda vane priyām
GE09ram_03_u:058.011a: vṛkṣād vṛkṣaṃ pradhāvan sa girīṃś cāpi nadīn nadīm
GE09ram_03_u:058.012a: asti kaccit tvayā dṛṣṭā sā kadambapriyā priyā
GE09ram_03_u:058.012c: kadamba yadi jānīṣe śaṃsa sītāṃ śubhānanām
GE09ram_03_u:058.013c: śaṃsasva yadi vā dṛṣṭā bilva bilvopamastanī
GE09ram_03_u:058.014a: atha vārjuna śaṃsa tvaṃ priyāṃ tām arjunapriyām
GE09ram_03_u:058.014c: janakasya sutā bhīrur yadi jīvati vā na vā
GE09ram_03_u:058.015a: kakubhaḥ kakubhoruṃ tāṃ vyaktaṃ jānāti maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:058.016a: bhramarair upagītaś ca yathā drumavaro hy ayam
GE09ram_03_u:058.018c: kathayasva varārohāṃ kāruṣyaṃ yadi te mayi
GE09ram_03_u:058.019c: priyāṃ yadi vijānīṣe niḥśaṅkaṃ kathayasva me
GE09ram_03_u:058.020a: atha vā mṛgaśāvākṣīṃ mṛga jānāsi maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:058.021a: gaja sā gajanāsorur yadi dṛṣṭā tvayā bhavet
GE09ram_03_u:058.021c: tāṃ manye viditāṃ tubhyam ākhyāhi varavāraṇa
GE09ram_03_u:058.022a: śārdūla yadi sā dṛṣṭā priyā candranibhānanā
GE09ram_03_u:058.022c: maithilī mama visrabdhaḥ kathayasva na te bhayam
GE09ram_03_u:058.023a: kiṃ dhāvasi priye nūnaṃ dṛṣṭāsi kamalekṣaṇe
GE09ram_03_u:058.023c: vṛkṣeṇācchādya cātmānaṃ kiṃ māṃ na pratibhāṣase
GE09ram_03_u:058.024a: tiṣṭha tiṣṭha varārohe na te 'sti karuṇā mayi
GE09ram_03_u:058.025c: dhāvanty api mayā dṛṣṭā tiṣṭha yady asti sauhṛdam
GE09ram_03_u:058.026a: naiva sā nūnam atha vā hiṃsitā cāruhāsinī
GE09ram_03_u:058.026c: kṛcchraṃ prāptaṃ hi māṃ nūnaṃ yathopekṣitum arhati
GE09ram_03_u:058.027a: vyaktaṃ sā bhakṣitā bālā rākṣasaiḥ piśitāśanaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:058.028a: nūnaṃ tac chubhadantauṣṭhaṃ mukhaṃ niṣprabhatāṃ gatam
GE09ram_03_u:058.028c: sā hi campakavarṇābhā grīvā graiveya śobhitā
GE09ram_03_u:058.029a: komalā vilapantyās tu kāntāyā bhakṣitā śubhā
GE09ram_03_u:058.030c: mayā virahitā bālā rakṣasāṃ bhakṣaṇāya vai
GE09ram_03_u:058.031c: hā lakṣmaṇa mahābāho paśyasi tvaṃ priyāṃ kva cit
GE09ram_03_u:058.032a: hā priye kva gatā bhadre hā sīteti punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:058.032c: ity evaṃ vilapan rāmaḥ paridhāvan vanād vanam
GE09ram_03_u:058.033a: kva cid udbhramate vegāt kva cid vibhramate balāt
GE09ram_03_u:058.033c: kva cin matta ivābhāti kāntān veṣaṇatatparaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:058.034a: sa vanāni nadīḥ śailān giriprasravaṇāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:058.035a: tathā sa gatvā vipulaṃ mahad vanaṃ; parītya sarvaṃ tv atha maithilīṃ prati
GE09ram_03_u:058.035c: aniṣṭhitāśaḥ sa cakāra mārgaṇe; punaḥ priyāyāḥ paramaṃ pariśramam
GE09ram_03_u:059.001c: rahitāṃ parṇaśālāṃ ca vidhvastāny āsanāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:059.002a: adṛṣṭvā tatra vaidehīṃ saṃnirīkṣya ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:059.002c: uvāca rāmaḥ prākruśya pragṛhya rucirau bhujau
GE09ram_03_u:059.003a: kva nu lakṣmaṇa vaidehī kaṃ vā deśam ito gatā
GE09ram_03_u:059.003c: kenāhṛtā vā saumitre bhakṣitā kena vā priyā
GE09ram_03_u:059.004a: vṛṣkeṇāvārya yadi māṃ sīte hasitum icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:059.004c: alaṃ te hasitenādya māṃ bhajasva suduḥkhitam
GE09ram_03_u:059.005a: yaiḥ saha krīḍase sīte viśvastair mṛgapotakaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:059.005c: ete hīnās tvayā saumye dhyāyanty asrāvilekṣaṇāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:059.006c: paraloke mahārājo nūnaṃ drakṣyati me pitā
GE09ram_03_u:059.007a: kathaṃ pratijñāṃ saṃśrutya mayā tvam abhiyojitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:059.008a: kāmavṛttam anāryaṃ māṃ mṛṣāvādinam eva ca
GE09ram_03_u:059.008c: dhik tvām iti pare loke vyaktaṃ vakṣyati me pitā
GE09ram_03_u:059.009c: mām ihotsṛjya karuṇaṃ kīrtir naram ivānṛjum
GE09ram_03_u:059.010a: kva gacchasi varārohe mām utsṛjya sumadhyame
GE09ram_03_u:059.010c: tvayā virahitaś cāhaṃ mokṣye jīvitam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:059.012c: paṅkam āsādya vipulaṃ sīdantam iva kuñjaram
GE09ram_03_u:059.013a: mā viṣādaṃ mahābāho kuru yatnaṃ mayā saha
GE09ram_03_u:059.013c: idaṃ ca hi vanaṃ śūra bahukandaraśobhitam
GE09ram_03_u:059.014c: sā vanaṃ vā praviṣṭā syān nalinīṃ vā supuṣpitām
GE09ram_03_u:059.015c: vitrāsayitukāmā vā līnā syāt kānane kva cit
GE09ram_03_u:059.015e: jijñāsamānā vaidehī tvāṃ māṃ ca puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_03_u:059.016a: tasyā hy anveṣaṇe śrīman kṣipram eva yatāvahe
GE09ram_03_u:059.016c: vanaṃ sarvaṃ vicinuvo yatra sā janakātmajā
GE09ram_03_u:059.016e: manyase yadi kākutstha mā sma śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:059.017a: evam uktas tu sauhārdāl lakṣmaṇena samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:059.017e: tau vanāni girīṃś caiva saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca
GE09ram_03_u:059.018c: tasya śailasya sānūni guhāś ca śikharāṇi ca
GE09ram_03_u:059.019c: vicitya sarvataḥ śailaṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:059.020a: neha paśyāmi saumitre vaidehīṃ parvate śubhe
GE09ram_03_u:059.022a: yathā viṣṇur mahābāhur baliṃ baddhvā mahīm imām
GE09ram_03_u:059.022c: evam uktas tu vīreṇa lakṣmaṇena sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:059.024c: na hi paśyāmi vaidehīṃ prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasīm
GE09ram_03_u:059.027a: bahuśaḥ sa tu niḥśvasya rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:059.028a: taṃ sāntvayām āsa tato lakṣmaṇaḥ priyabāndhavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:059.029c: apaśyaṃs tāṃ priyāṃ sītāṃ prākrośat sa punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:060.001a: sa dīno dīnayā vācā lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:060.001c: śīghraṃ lakṣmaṇa jānīhi gatvā godāvarīṃ nadīm
GE09ram_03_u:060.001e: api godāvarīṃ sītā padmāny ānayituṃ gatā
GE09ram_03_u:060.002a: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ punar eva hi
GE09ram_03_u:060.003a: tāṃ lakṣmaṇas tīrthavatīṃ vicitvā rāmam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:060.003c: naināṃ paśyāmi tīrtheṣu krośato na śṛṇoti me
GE09ram_03_u:060.004a: kaṃ nu sā deśam āpannā vaidehī kleśanāśinī
GE09ram_03_u:060.004c: na hi taṃ vedmi vai rāma yatra sā tanumadhyamā
GE09ram_03_u:060.005a: lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā dīnaḥ saṃtāpa mohitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:060.006a: sa tām upasthito rāmaḥ kva sītety evam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:060.007c: na tāṃ śaśaṃsū rāmāya tathā godāvarī nadī
GE09ram_03_u:060.008a: tataḥ pracoditā bhūtaiḥ śaṃsāsmai tāṃ priyām iti
GE09ram_03_u:060.008c: na ca sābhyavadat sītāṃ pṛṣṭā rāmeṇa śocitā
GE09ram_03_u:060.009a: rāvaṇasya ca tad rūpaṃ karmāṇi ca durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:060.009c: dhyātvā bhayāt tu vaidehīṃ sā nadī na śaśaṃsa tām
GE09ram_03_u:060.010a: nirāśas tu tayā nadyā sītāyā darśane kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:060.011a: kiṃ nu lakṣmaṇa vakṣyāmi sametya janakaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:060.011c: mātaraṃ caiva vaidehyā vinā tām aham apriyam
GE09ram_03_u:060.012a: yā me rājyavihīnasya vane vanyena jīvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:060.012c: sarvaṃ vyapanayac chokaṃ vaidehī kva nu sā gatā
GE09ram_03_u:060.013c: manye dīrghā bhaviṣyanti rātrayo mama jāgrataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:060.014c: sarvāṇy anucariṣyāmi yadi sītā hi dṛśyate
GE09ram_03_u:060.015a: evaṃ saṃbhāṣamāṇau tāv anyonyaṃ bhrātarāv ubhau
GE09ram_03_u:060.016a: tāṃ puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmo mahītale
GE09ram_03_u:060.016c: uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ vīro duḥkhito duḥkhitaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:060.018c: kruddho 'bravīd giriṃ tatra siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgaṃ yathā
GE09ram_03_u:060.019a: tāṃ hemavarṇāṃ hemābhāṃ sītāṃ darśaya parvata
GE09ram_03_u:060.019c: yāvat sānūni sarvāṇi na te vidhvaṃsayāmy aham
GE09ram_03_u:060.021a: imāṃ vā saritaṃ cādya śoṣayiṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:060.021c: yadi nākhyāti me sītām adya candranibhānanām
GE09ram_03_u:060.022a: evaṃ sa ruṣito rāmo didhakṣann iva cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_03_u:060.022c: dadarśa bhūmau niṣkrāntaṃ rākṣasasya padaṃ mahat
GE09ram_03_u:060.023a: sa samīkṣya parikrāntaṃ sītāyā rākṣasasya ca
GE09ram_03_u:060.024c: bhūṣaṇānāṃ hi saumitre mālyāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:060.026c: bhittvā bhittvā vibhaktā vā bhakṣitā vā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:060.027c: babhūva yuddhaṃ saumitre ghoraṃ rākṣasayor iha
GE09ram_03_u:060.028c: dharaṇyāṃ patitaṃ saumya kasya bhagnaṃ mahad dhanuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:060.029c: viśīrṇaṃ patitaṃ bhūmau kavacaṃ kasya kāñcanam
GE09ram_03_u:060.030c: bhagnadaṇḍam idaṃ kasya bhūmau saumya nipātitam
GE09ram_03_u:060.031c: bhīmarūpā mahākāyāḥ kasya vā nihatā raṇe
GE09ram_03_u:060.032c: apaviddhaś ca bhagnaś ca kasya sāṃgrāmiko rathaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:060.035a: hṛtā mṛtā vā sītā hi bhakṣitā vā tapasvinī
GE09ram_03_u:060.035c: na dharmas trāyate sītāṃ hriyamāṇāṃ mahāvane
GE09ram_03_u:060.036a: bhakṣitāyāṃ hi vaidehyāṃ hṛtāyām api lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:060.036c: ke hi loke priyaṃ kartuṃ śaktāḥ saumya mameśvarāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:060.038c: nirvīrya iti manyante nūnaṃ māṃ tridaśeśvarāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:060.039a: māṃ prāpya hi guṇo doṣaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ paśya lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:060.040a: naiva yakṣā na gandharvā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:060.040c: kiṃnarā vā manuṣyā vā sukhaṃ prāpsyanti lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:060.044a: na tāṃ kuśalinīṃ sītāṃ pradāsyanti mameśvarāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:060.044c: asmin muhūrte saumitre mama drakṣyanti vikramam
GE09ram_03_u:060.049a: naiva devā na daiteyā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:060.050e: nirmaryādān imāṃl lokān kariṣyāmy adya sāyakaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:060.051a: yathā jarā yathā mṛtyur yathākālo yathāvidhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:060.052a: pureva me cārudatīm aninditāṃ; diśanti sītāṃ yadi nādya maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:060.052c: sadevagandharvamanuṣya pannagaṃ; jagat saśailaṃ parivartayāmy aham
GE09ram_03_u:061.002a: vīkṣamāṇaṃ dhanuḥ sajyaṃ niḥśvasantaṃ muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:061.002c: hantukāmaṃ paśuṃ rudraṃ kruddhaṃ dakṣakratau yathā
GE09ram_03_u:061.003a: adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ saṃkruddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:061.004a: purā bhūtvā mṛdur dāntaḥ sarvabhūtahite rataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:061.004c: na krodhavaśam āpannaḥ prakṛtiṃ hātum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:061.005a: candre lakṣṇīḥ prabhā sūrye gatir vāyau bhuvi kṣamā
GE09ram_03_u:061.005c: etac ca niyataṃ sarvaṃ tvayi cānuttamaṃ yaśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:061.006a: na tu jānāmi kasyāyaṃ bhagnaḥ sāṃgrāmiko rathaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:061.006c: kena vā kasya vā hetoḥ sāyudhaḥ saparicchadaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:061.008a: ekasya tu vimardo 'yaṃ na dvayor vadatāṃ vara
GE09ram_03_u:061.008c: na hi vṛttaṃ hi paśyāmi balasya mahataḥ padam
GE09ram_03_u:061.009a: naikasya tu kṛte lokān vināśayitum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:061.010a: sadā tvaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ śaraṇyaḥ paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:061.010c: ko nu dārapraṇāśaṃ te sādhu manyeta rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:061.011c: nālaṃ te vipriyaṃ kartuṃ dīkṣitasyeva sādhavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:061.012a: yena rājan hṛtā sītā tam anveṣitum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:061.013a: samudraṃ ca viceṣyāmaḥ parvatāṃś ca vanāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:061.013c: guhāś ca vividhā ghorā nalinīḥ pārvatīś ca ha
GE09ram_03_u:061.015a: na cet sāmnā pradāsyanti patnīṃ te tridaśeśvarāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:061.016a: śīlena sāmnā vinayena sītāṃ; nayena na prāpsyasi cen narendra
GE09ram_03_u:062.002a: tataḥ saumitrir āśvāsya muhūrtād iva lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:062.003a: mahatā tapasā rāma mahatā cāpi karmaṇā
GE09ram_03_u:062.004a: tava caiva guṇair baddhas tvadviyogān mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:062.004c: rājā devatvam āpanno bharatasya yathā śrutam
GE09ram_03_u:062.005a: yadi duḥkham idaṃ prāptaṃ kākutstha na sahiṣyase
GE09ram_03_u:062.005c: prākṛtaś cālpasattvaś ca itaraḥ kaḥ sahiṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:062.006a: duḥkhito hi bhavāṃl lokāṃs tejasā yadi dhakṣyate
GE09ram_03_u:062.006c: ārtāḥ prajā naravyāghra kva nu yāsyanti nirvṛtim
GE09ram_03_u:062.007c: gataḥ śakreṇa sālokyam anayas taṃ samaspṛśat
GE09ram_03_u:062.008a: maharṣayo vasiṣṭhas tu yaḥ pitur naḥ purohitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:062.008c: ahnā putraśataṃ jajñe tathaivāsya punar hatam
GE09ram_03_u:062.009a: yā ceyaṃ jagato mātā devī lokanamaskṛtā
GE09ram_03_u:062.009c: asyāś ca calanaṃ bhūmer dṛśyate satyasaṃśrava
GE09ram_03_u:062.010a: yau cemau jagatāṃ netre yatra sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE09ram_03_u:062.011a: sumahānty api bhūtāni devāś ca puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_03_u:062.012c: śrūyete naraśārdūla na tvaṃ vyathitum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:062.013a: naṣṭāyām api vaidehyāṃ hṛtāyām api cānagha
GE09ram_03_u:062.013c: śocituṃ nārhase vīra yathānyaḥ prākṛtas tathā
GE09ram_03_u:062.014a: tvadvidhā hi na śocanti satataṃ satyadarśinaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:062.016c: nāntareṇa kriyāṃ teṣāṃ phalam iṣṭaṃ pravartate
GE09ram_03_u:062.017a: mām eva hi purā vīra tvam eva bahuṣo 'nvaśāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:062.017c: anuśiṣyād dhi ko nu tvām api sākṣād bṛhaspatiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:062.018a: buddhiś ca te mahāprājña devair api duranvayā
GE09ram_03_u:062.019a: divyaṃ ca mānuṣaṃ caivam ātmanaś ca parākramam
GE09ram_03_u:062.020c: tam eva tu ripuṃ pāpaṃ vijñāyoddhartum
GE09ram_03_u:063.002c: avaṣṭabhya dhanuś citraṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:063.003a: kiṃ kariṣyāvahe vatsa kva vā gacchāva lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:063.004a: taṃ tathā paritāpārtaṃ lakṣmaṇo rāmam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:063.004c: idam eva janasthānaṃ tvam anveṣitum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:063.007a: tāni yukto mayā sārdhaṃ tvam anveṣitum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:063.008c: ity uktas tad vanaṃ sarvaṃ vicacāra salakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:063.009a: kruddho rāmaḥ śaraṃ ghoraṃ saṃdhāya dhanuṣi kṣuram
GE09ram_03_u:063.010c: taṃ dṛṣṭvā giriśṛṅgābhaṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:063.010e: anena sītā vaidehī bhakṣitā nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:063.011a: gṛdhrarūpam idaṃ vyaktaṃ rakṣo bhramati kānanam
GE09ram_03_u:063.011e: enaṃ vadhiṣye dīptāgrair ghorair bāṇair ajihmagaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:063.012a: ity uktvābhyapatad gṛdhraṃ saṃdhāya dhanuṣi kṣuram
GE09ram_03_u:063.012c: kruddho rāmaḥ samudrāntāṃ cālayann iva medinīm
GE09ram_03_u:063.013a: taṃ dīnadīnayā vācā saphenaṃ rudhiraṃ vaman
GE09ram_03_u:063.014c: sā devī mama ca prāṇā rāvaṇenobhayaṃ hṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:063.015a: tvayā virahitā devī lakṣmaṇena ca rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:063.016a: sītām abhyavapan no 'haṃ rāvaṇaś ca raṇe mayā
GE09ram_03_u:063.017a: etad asya dhanur bhagnam etad asya śarāvaram
GE09ram_03_u:063.017c: ayam asya raṇe rāma bhagnaḥ sāṃgrāmiko rathaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:063.018a: pariśrāntasya me pakṣau chittvā khaḍgena rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:063.018e: rakṣasā nihataṃ pūrvma na māṃ hantuṃ tvam arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:063.019a: rāmas tasya tu vijñāya sītāsaktāṃ priyāṃ kathām
GE09ram_03_u:063.020a: ekam ekāyane durge niḥśvasantaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_03_u:063.020c: samīkṣya duḥkhito rāmaḥ saumitrim idam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:063.021a: rājyād bhraṃśo vane vāsaḥ sītā naṣṭā hato dvijaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:063.022a: saṃpūrṇam api ced adya pratareyaṃ mahodadhim
GE09ram_03_u:063.022c: so 'pi nūnaṃ mamālakṣmyā viśuṣyet saritāṃ patiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:063.025a: ity evam uktvā bahuśo rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:063.026a: nikṛttapakṣaṃ rudhirāvasiktaṃ; taṃ gṛdhrarājaṃ parirabhya rāmaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:063.026c: kva maithili prāṇasamā mameti; vimucya vācaṃ nipapāta bhūmau
GE09ram_03_u:064.001a: rāmaḥ prekṣya tu taṃ gṛdhraṃ bhuvi raudreṇa pātitam
GE09ram_03_u:064.002c: rākṣasena hataḥ saṃkhye prāṇāṃs tyajati dustyajān
GE09ram_03_u:064.003a: ayam asya śarīre 'smin prāṇo lakṣmaṇa vidyate
GE09ram_03_u:064.004a: jaṭāyo yadi śaknoṣi vākyaṃ vyāharituṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:064.004c: sītām ākhyāhi bhadraṃ te vadham ākhyāhi cātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:064.005a: kiṃnimitto 'harat sītāṃ rāvaṇas tasya kiṃ mayā
GE09ram_03_u:064.005c: aparāddhaṃ tu yaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇena hṛtā priyā
GE09ram_03_u:064.006a: kathaṃ tac candrasaṃkāśaṃ mukham āsīn manoharam
GE09ram_03_u:064.006c: sītayā kāni coktāni tasmin kāle dvijottama
GE09ram_03_u:064.007a: kathaṃvīryaḥ kathaṃrūpaḥ kiṃkarmā sa ca rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:064.007c: kva cāsya bhavanaṃ tāta brūhi me paripṛcchataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:064.010a: pariśrāntasya me tāta pakṣau chittvā niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:064.010c: sītām ādāya vaidehīṃ prayāto dakṣiṇā mukhaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:064.011a: uparudhyanti me prāṇā dṛṣṭir bhramati rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:064.012a: yena yāti muhūrtena sītām ādāya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:064.013a: vindo nāma muhūrto 'sau sa ca kākutstha nābudhat
GE09ram_03_u:064.013c: jhaṣavad baḍiśaṃ gṛhya kṣipram eva vinaśyati
GE09ram_03_u:064.014a: na ca tvayā vyathā kāryā janakasya sutāṃ prati
GE09ram_03_u:064.014c: vaidehyā raṃsyase kṣipraṃ hatvā taṃ rākṣasaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_03_u:064.016a: putro viśravasaḥ sākṣād bhrātā vaiśravaṇasya ca
GE09ram_03_u:064.016c: ity uktvā durlabhān prāṇān mumoca patageśvaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:064.017c: tyaktvā śarīraṃ gṛdhrasya jagmuḥ prāṇā vihāyasaṃ
GE09ram_03_u:064.018a: sa nikṣipya śiro bhūmau prasārya caraṇau tadā
GE09ram_03_u:064.018c: vikṣipya ca śarīraṃ svaṃ papāta dharaṇītale
GE09ram_03_u:064.019a: taṃ gṛdhraṃ prekṣya tāmrākṣaṃ gatāsum acalopamam
GE09ram_03_u:064.019c: rāmaḥ subahubhir duḥkhair dīnaḥ saumitrim abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:064.020a: bahūni rakṣasāṃ vāse varṣāṇi vasatā sukham
GE09ram_03_u:064.021c: so 'yam adya hataḥ śete kālo hi duratikramaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:064.022a: paśya lakṣmaṇa gṛdhro 'yam upakārī hataś ca me
GE09ram_03_u:064.022c: sītām abhyavapan no vai rāvaṇena balīyasā
GE09ram_03_u:064.023c: mama hetor ayaṃ prāṇān mumoca patageśvaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:064.025a: sītāharaṇajaṃ duḥkhaṃ na me saumya tathāgatam
GE09ram_03_u:064.025c: yathā vināśo gṛdhrasya matkṛte ca paraṃtapa
GE09ram_03_u:064.026a: rājā daśarathaḥ śrīmān yathā mama mayā yaśāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:064.026c: pūjanīyaś ca mānyaś ca tathāyaṃ patageśvaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:064.028c: imaṃ dhakṣyāmi saumitre hataṃ raudreṇa rakṣasā
GE09ram_03_u:064.029a: yā gatir yajñaśīlānām āhitāgneś ca yā gatiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:064.029c: aparāvartināṃ yā ca yā ca bhūmipradāyinām
GE09ram_03_u:064.030a: mayā tvaṃ samanujñāto gaccha lokān anuttamān
GE09ram_03_u:064.030c: gṛdhrarāja mahāsattva saṃskṛtaś ca mayā vraja
GE09ram_03_u:064.031a: evam uktvā citāṃ dīptām āropya patageśvaram
GE09ram_03_u:064.031c: dadāha rāmo dharmātmā svabandhum iva duḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:064.032a: rāmo 'tha sahasaumitrir vanaṃ yātvā sa vīryavān
GE09ram_03_u:064.032c: sthūlān hatvā mahārohīn anu tastāra taṃ dvijam
GE09ram_03_u:064.034a: yat tat pretasya martyasya kathayanti dvijātayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:064.034c: tat svargagamanaṃ tasya kṣipraṃ rāmo jajāpa ha
GE09ram_03_u:064.035c: udakaṃ cakratus tasmai gṛdhrarājāya tāv ubhau
GE09ram_03_u:064.036a: sa gṛdhrarājaḥ kṛtavān yaśaskaraṃ; suduṣkaraṃ karma raṇe nipātitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:064.036c: maharṣikalpena ca saṃskṛtas tadā; jagāma puṇyāṃ gatim ātmanaḥ śubhām
GE09ram_03_u:065.001a: kṛtvaivam udakaṃ tasmai prasthitau rāghavau tadā
GE09ram_03_u:065.001c: avekṣantau vane sītāṃ paścimāṃ jagmatur diśam
GE09ram_03_u:065.003a: gulmair vṛkṣaiś ca bahubhir latābhiś ca praveṣṭitam
GE09ram_03_u:065.004a: vyatikramya tu vegena gṛhītvā dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_03_u:065.005a: tataḥ paraṃ janasthānāt trikrośaṃ gamya rāghavau
GE09ram_03_u:065.007a: didṛkṣamāṇau vaidehīṃ tad vanaṃ tau vicikyatuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:065.008a: lakṣmaṇas tu mahātejāḥ sattvavāñ śīlavāñ śuciḥ
GE09ram_03_u:065.009a: spandate me dṛḍhaṃ bāhur udvignam iva me manaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:065.010a: tasmāt sajjībhavārya tvaṃ kuruṣva vacanaṃ hitam
GE09ram_03_u:065.010c: mamaiva hi nimittāni sadyaḥ śaṃsanti saṃbhramam
GE09ram_03_u:065.011c: āvayor vijayaṃ yuddhe śaṃsann iva vinardati
GE09ram_03_u:065.012a: tayor anveṣator evaṃ sarvaṃ tad vanam ojasā
GE09ram_03_u:065.012c: saṃjajñe vipulaḥ śabdaḥ prabhañjann iva tad vanam
GE09ram_03_u:065.013c: vanasya tasya śabdo 'bhūd divam āpūrayann iva
GE09ram_03_u:065.014a: taṃ śabdaṃ kāṅkṣamāṇas tu rāmaḥ kakṣe sahānujaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:065.015a: āsedatus tatas tatra tāv ubhau pramukhe sthitam
GE09ram_03_u:065.019a: ghorau bhujau vikurvāṇam ubhau yojanam āyatau
GE09ram_03_u:065.019c: karābhyāṃ vividhān gṛhya ṛṣkān pakṣigaṇān mṛgān
GE09ram_03_u:065.020c: sthitam āvṛtya panthānaṃ tayor bhrātroḥ prapannayoḥ
GE09ram_03_u:065.022a: sa mahābāhur atyarthaṃ prasārya vipulau bhujau
GE09ram_03_u:065.022c: jagrāha sahitāv eva rāghavau pīḍayan balāt
GE09ram_03_u:065.025a: ghoraṃ deśam imaṃ prāptau mama bhakṣāv upasthitau
GE09ram_03_u:065.025c: vadataṃ kāryam iha vāṃ kimarthaṃ cāgatau yuvām
GE09ram_03_u:065.028c: vyasanaṃ jīvitāntāya prāptam aprāpya tāṃ priyām
GE09ram_03_u:065.029c: tvāṃ ca māṃ ca naravyāghra vyasanaiḥ paśya mohitau
GE09ram_03_u:065.030a: śūrāś ca balavantaś ca kṛtāstrāś ca raṇājire
GE09ram_03_u:065.031a: iti bruvāṇo dṛḍhasatyavikramo; mahāyaśā dāśarathiḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_03_u:065.031c: avekṣya saumitrim udagravikramaṃ; sthirāṃ tadā svāṃ matim ātmanākarot
GE09ram_03_u:066.001a: tau tu tatra sthitau dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_03_u:066.002a: tiṣṭhataḥ kiṃ nu māṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣudhārtaṃ kṣatriyarṣabhau
GE09ram_03_u:066.003a: tac chrutvā lakṣmaṇo vākyaṃ prāptakālaṃ hitaṃ tadā
GE09ram_03_u:066.004a: tvāṃ ca māṃ ca purā tūrṇam ādatte rākṣasādhamaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:066.004c: tasmād asibhyām asyāśu bāhū chindāvahe gurū
GE09ram_03_u:066.005a: tatas tau deśakālajñau khaḍgābhyām eva rāghavau
GE09ram_03_u:066.006a: dakṣiṇo dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum asaktam asinā tataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:066.006c: ciccheda rāmo vegena savyaṃ vīras tu lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:066.007c: khaṃ ca gāṃ ca diśaś caiva nādayañ jalado yathā
GE09ram_03_u:066.008c: dīnaḥ papraccha tau vīrau kau yuvām iti dānavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:066.010a: ayam ikṣvākudāyādo rāmo nāma janaiḥ śrutaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:066.010c: asyaivāvarajaṃ viddhi bhrātaraṃ māṃ ca lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:066.012a: tvaṃ tu ko vā kimarthaṃ vā kabandha sadṛśo vane
GE09ram_03_u:066.013a: evam uktaḥ kabandhas tu lakṣmaṇenottaraṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:066.014a: svāgataṃ vāṃ naravyāghrau diṣṭyā paśyāmi cāpy aham
GE09ram_03_u:066.014c: diṣṭyā cemau nikṛttau me yuvābhyāṃ bāhubandhanau
GE09ram_03_u:066.015a: virūpaṃ yac ca me rūpaṃ prāptaṃ hy avinayād yathā
GE09ram_03_u:066.015c: tan me śṛṇu naravyāghra tattvataḥ śaṃsatas tava
GE09ram_03_u:067.001c: rūpam āsīn mamācintyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam
GE09ram_03_u:067.001e: yathā somasya śakrasya sūryasya ca yathā vapuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:067.002a: so 'haṃ rūpam idaṃ kṛtvā lokavitrāsanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_03_u:067.002c: ṛṣīn vanagatān rāma trāsayāmi tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:067.003a: tataḥ sthūlaśirā nāma maharṣiḥ kopito mayā
GE09ram_03_u:067.004c: etad eva nṛśaṃsaṃ te rūpam astu vigarhitam
GE09ram_03_u:067.005a: sa mayā yācitaḥ kruddhaḥ śāpasyānto bhaved iti
GE09ram_03_u:067.006a: yadā chittvā bhujau rāmas tvāṃ dahed vijane vane
GE09ram_03_u:067.006c: tadā tvaṃ prāpsyase rūpaṃ svam eva vipulaṃ śubham
GE09ram_03_u:067.007a: śriyā virājitaṃ putraṃ danos tvaṃ viddhi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:067.007c: indrakopād idaṃ rūpaṃ prāptam evaṃ raṇājire
GE09ram_03_u:067.008c: dīrgham āyuḥ sa me prādāt tato māṃ vibhramo 'spṛśat
GE09ram_03_u:067.009a: dīrgham āyur mayā prāptaṃ kiṃ me śakraḥ kariṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:067.009c: ity evaṃ buddhim āsthāya raṇe śakram adharṣayam
GE09ram_03_u:067.010c: sakthinī ca śiraś caiva śarīre saṃpraveśitam
GE09ram_03_u:067.011a: sa mayā yācyamānaḥ sann ānayad yamasādanam
GE09ram_03_u:067.011c: pitāmahavacaḥ satyaṃ tad astv iti mamābravīt
GE09ram_03_u:067.013a: evam uktas tu me śakro bāhū yojanam āyatau
GE09ram_03_u:067.013c: prādād āsyaṃ ca me kukṣau tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭram akalpayat
GE09ram_03_u:067.015a: sa tu mām abravīd indro yadā rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:067.015c: chetsyate samare bāhū tadā svargaṃ gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:067.016a: sa tvaṃ rāmo 'si bhadraṃ te nāham anyena rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:067.016c: śakyo hantuṃ yathātattvam evam uktaṃ maharṣiṇā
GE09ram_03_u:067.018a: evam uktas tu dharmātmā danunā tena rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:067.019a: rāvaṇena hṛtā sītā mama bhāryā yaśasvinī
GE09ram_03_u:067.020a: nāmamātraṃ tu jānāmi na rūpaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:067.020c: nivāsaṃ vā prabhāvaṃ vā vayaṃ tasya na vidmahe
GE09ram_03_u:067.021c: kāruṇyaṃ sadṛśaṃ kartum upakāre ca vartatām
GE09ram_03_u:067.022a: kāṣṭhāny ānīya śuṣkāṇi kāle bhagnāni kuñjaraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:067.022c: bhakṣyāmas tvāṃ vayaṃ vīra śvabhre mahati kalpite
GE09ram_03_u:067.023a: sa tvaṃ sītāṃ samācakṣva yena vā yatra vā hṛtā
GE09ram_03_u:067.023c: kuru kalyāṇam atyarthaṃ yadi jānāsi tattvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:067.024a: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa vākyaṃ danur anuttamam
GE09ram_03_u:067.024c: provāca kuśalo vaktuṃ vaktāram api rāghavam
GE09ram_03_u:067.025a: divyam asti na me jñānaṃ nābhijānāmi maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:067.025c: yas tāṃ jñāsyati taṃ vakṣye dagdhaḥ svaṃ rūpam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:067.026a: adagdhasya hi vijñātuṃ śaktir asti na me prabho
GE09ram_03_u:067.026c: rākṣasaṃ taṃ mahāvīryaṃ sītā yena hṛtā tava
GE09ram_03_u:067.027a: vijñānaṃ hi mahad bhraṣṭaṃ śāpadoṣeṇa rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:067.028a: kiṃ tu yāvan na yāty astaṃ savitā śrāntavāhanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:067.028c: tāvan mām avaṭe kṣiptvā daha rāma yathāvidhi
GE09ram_03_u:067.029c: vakṣyāmi tam ahaṃ vīra yas taṃ jñāsyati rākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_03_u:067.030a: tena sakhyaṃ ca kartavyaṃ nyāyyavṛttena rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:067.031a: na hi tasyāsty avijñātaṃ triṣu lokeṣu rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:067.031c: sarvān parisṛto lokān purā vai kāraṇāntare
GE09ram_03_u:068.001a: evam uktau tu tau vīrau kabandhena nareśvarau
GE09ram_03_u:068.002c: citām ādīpayām āsa sā prajajvāla sarvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:068.004a: sa vidhūya citām āśu vidhūmo 'gnir ivotthitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:068.004c: araje vāsasī vibhran mālāṃ divyāṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:068.006c: prabhayā ca mahātejā diśo daśa virājayan
GE09ram_03_u:068.007c: śṛṇu rāghava tattvena yathā sīmām avāpsyasi
GE09ram_03_u:068.008a: rāma ṣaḍ yuktayo loke yābhiḥ sarvaṃ vimṛśyate
GE09ram_03_u:068.009c: yat kṛte vyasanaṃ prāptaṃ tvayā dārapradharṣaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:068.010a: tad avaśyaṃ tvayā kāryaḥ sa suhṛt suhṛdāṃ vara
GE09ram_03_u:068.010c: akṛtvā na hi te siddhim ahaṃ paśyāmi cintayan
GE09ram_03_u:068.011a: śrūyatāṃ rāma vakṣyāmi sugrīvo nāma vānaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:068.012c: nivasaty ātmavān vīraś caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:068.013a: vayasyaṃ taṃ kuru kṣipram ito gatvādya rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:068.014a: na ca te so 'vamantavyaḥ sugrīvo vānarādhipaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:068.014c: kṛtajñaḥ kāmarūpī ca sahāyārthī ca vīryavān
GE09ram_03_u:068.015a: śaktau hy adya yuvāṃ kartuṃ kāryaṃ tasya cikīrṣitam
GE09ram_03_u:068.015c: kṛtārtho vākṛtārtho vā kṛtyaṃ tava kariṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:068.016a: sa ṛkṣarajasaḥ putraḥ pampām aṭati śaṅkitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:068.018a: sa hi sthānāni sarvāṇi kārtsnyena kapikuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:068.019a: na tasyāviditaṃ loke kiṃ cid asti hi rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:068.020a: sa nadīr vipulāñ śailān giridurgāṇi kandarān
GE09ram_03_u:068.021c: diśo vicetuṃ tāṃ sītāṃ tvadviyogena śocatīm
GE09ram_03_u:068.022a: sa meruśṛṅgāgragatām aninditāṃ; praviśya pātālatale 'pi vāśritām
GE09ram_03_u:068.022c: plavaṃgamānāṃ pravaras tava priyāṃ; nihatya rakṣāṃsi punaḥ pradāsyati
GE09ram_03_u:069.001c: vākyam anvartham arthajñaḥ kabandhaḥ punar abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:069.002a: eṣa rāma śivaḥ panthā yatraite puṣpitā drumāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:069.003c: aśvatthāḥ karṇikārāś ca cūtāś cānye ca pādapāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:069.004a: tān āruhyāthavā bhūmau pātayitvā ca tān balāt
GE09ram_03_u:069.005a: caṅkramantau varān deśāñ śailāc chailaṃ vanād vanam
GE09ram_03_u:069.005c: tataḥ puṣkariṇīṃ vīrau pampāṃ nāma gamiṣyathaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:069.007a: tatra haṃsāḥ plavāḥ krauñcāḥ kurarāś caiva rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:069.009a: rohitān vakratuṇḍāṃś ca nalamīnāṃś ca rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:069.009c: pampāyām iṣubhir matsyāṃs tatra rāma varān hatān
GE09ram_03_u:069.011a: bhṛśaṃ te khādato matsyān pampāyāḥ puṣpasaṃcaye
GE09ram_03_u:069.013c: apāṃ lobhād upāvṛttān vṛṣabhān iva nardataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:069.013e: rūpānvitāṃś ca pampāyāṃ drakṣyasi tvaṃ narottama
GE09ram_03_u:069.014c: śītodakaṃ ca pampāyāṃ dṛṣṭvā śokaṃ vihāsyasi
GE09ram_03_u:069.015c: utpalāni ca phullāni paṅkajāni ca rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:069.016a: na tāni kaś cin mālyāni tatrāropayitā naraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:069.017c: ye prapetur mahīṃ tūrṇaṃ śarīrāt svedabindavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:069.018a: tāni mālyāni jātāni munīnāṃ tapasā tadā
GE09ram_03_u:069.020a: tvāṃ tu dharme sthitā nityaṃ sarvabhūtanamaskṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:069.021a: tatas tad rāma pampāyās tīram āśritya paścimam
GE09ram_03_u:069.022a: na tatrākramituṃ nāgāḥ śaknuvanti tam āśramam
GE09ram_03_u:069.022c: ṛṣes tasya mataṅgasya vidhānāt tac ca kānanam
GE09ram_03_u:069.025a: śayānaḥ puruṣo rāma tasya śailasya mūrdhani
GE09ram_03_u:069.025c: yat svapne labhate vittaṃ tat prabuddho 'dhigacchati
GE09ram_03_u:069.026c: tatraiva praharanty enaṃ suptam ādāya rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:069.029a: te tatra pītvā pānīyaṃ vimalaṃ śītam avyayam
GE09ram_03_u:069.030a: rāma tasya tu śailasya mahatī śobhate guhā
GE09ram_03_u:069.031a: tasyā guhāyāḥ prāgdvāre mahāñ śītodako hradaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:069.032a: tasyāṃ vasati sugrīvaś caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:069.033a: kabandhas tv anuśāsyaivaṃ tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_03_u:069.034a: taṃ tu khasthaṃ mahābhāgaṃ kabandhaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_03_u:069.034c: prasthitau tvaṃ vrajasveti vākyam ūcatur antikāt
GE09ram_03_u:069.035a: gamyatāṃ kāryasiddhyartham iti tāv abravīc ca saḥ
GE09ram_03_u:069.035c: suprītau tāv anujñāpya kabandhaḥ prasthitas tadā
GE09ram_03_u:069.036a: sa tat kabandhaḥ pratipadya rūpaṃ; vṛtaḥ śriyā bhāskaratulyadehaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:069.036c: nidarśayan rāmam avekṣya khasthaḥ; sakhyaṃ kuruṣveti tadābhyuvāca
GE09ram_03_u:070.001a: tau kabandhena taṃ mārgaṃ pampāyā darśitaṃ vane
GE09ram_03_u:070.003a: kṛtvā ca śailapṛṣṭhe tu tau vāsaṃ raghunandanau
GE09ram_03_u:070.004a: tau puṣkariṇyāḥ pampāyās tīram āsādya paścimam
GE09ram_03_u:070.004c: apaśyatāṃ tatas tatra śabaryā ramyam āśramam
GE09ram_03_u:070.005a: tau tam āśramam āsādya drumair bahubhir āvṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:070.006a: tau tu dṛṣṭvā tadā siddhā samutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_03_u:070.006c: pādau jagrāha rāmasya lakṣmaṇasya ca dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:070.007a: tām uvāca tato rāmaḥ śramaṇīṃ saṃśitavratām
GE09ram_03_u:070.007c: kaccit te nirjitā vighnāḥ kaccit te vardhate tapaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:070.008a: kaccit te niyataḥ kopa āhāraś ca tapodhane
GE09ram_03_u:070.008c: kaccit te niyamāḥ prāptāḥ kaccit te manasaḥ sukham
GE09ram_03_u:070.009a: rāmeṇa tāpasī pṛṣṭhā sā siddhā siddhasaṃmatā
GE09ram_03_u:070.010c: itas te divam ārūḍhā yān ahaṃ paryacāriṣam
GE09ram_03_u:070.011a: taiś cāham uktā dharmajñair mahābhāgair maharṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:070.011c: āgamiṣyati te rāmaḥ supuṇyam imam āśramam
GE09ram_03_u:070.012c: taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā varāṃl lokān akṣayāṃs tvaṃ gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:070.013a: mayā tu vividhaṃ vanyaṃ saṃcitaṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_03_u:070.014a: evam uktaḥ sa dharmātmā śabaryā śabarīm idam
GE09ram_03_u:070.014c: rāghavaḥ prāha vijñāne tāṃ nityam abahiṣkṛtām
GE09ram_03_u:070.015a: danoḥ sakāśāt tattvena prabhāvaṃ te mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:070.015c: śrutaṃ pratyakṣam icchāmi saṃdraṣṭuṃ yadi manyase
GE09ram_03_u:070.016a: etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā rāmavaktrād viniḥsṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:070.016c: śabarī darśayām āsa tāv ubhau tad vanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_03_u:070.018a: iha te bhāvitātmāno guravo me mahādyute
GE09ram_03_u:070.019a: iyaṃ pratyak sthalī vedī yatra te me susatkṛtāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:070.022a: kṛtābhiṣekais tair nyastā valkalāḥ pādapeṣv iha
GE09ram_03_u:070.023a: kṛtsnaṃ vanam idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śrotavyaṃ ca śrutaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_03_u:070.023c: tad icchāmy abhyanujñātā tyaktum etat kalevaram
GE09ram_03_u:070.024a: teṣām icchāmy ahaṃ gantuṃ samīpaṃ bhāvitātmanām
GE09ram_03_u:070.024c: munīnām āśraṃmo yeṣām ahaṃ ca paricāriṇī
GE09ram_03_u:070.025a: dharmiṣṭhaṃ tu vacaḥ śrutvā rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:071.001a: divaṃ tu tasyāṃ yātāyāṃ śabaryāṃ svena karmaṇā
GE09ram_03_u:071.001c: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā cintayām āsa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:071.002a: cintayitvā tu dharmātmā prabhāvaṃ taṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_03_u:071.004a: saptānāṃ ca samudrāṇām eṣu tīrtheṣu lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:071.004c: upaspṛṣṭaṃ ca vidhivat pitaraś cāpi tarpitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:071.005a: pranaṣṭam aśubhaṃ yat tat kalyāṇaṃ samupasthitam
GE09ram_03_u:071.005c: tena tv etat prahṛṣṭaṃ me mano lakṣmaṇa saṃprati
GE09ram_03_u:071.006c: tad āgaccha gamiṣyāvaḥ pampāṃ tāṃ priyadarśanām
GE09ram_03_u:071.007e: nityaṃ vālibhayāt trastaś caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:071.008a: abhitvare ca taṃ draṣṭuṃ sugrīvaṃ vānararṣabham
GE09ram_03_u:071.008c: tadadhīnaṃ hi me saumya sītāyāḥ parimārgaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:071.009a: iti bruvāṇaṃ taṃ rāmaṃ saumitrir idam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:071.009c: gacchāvas tvaritaṃ tatra mamāpi tvarate manaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:071.010a: āśramāt tu tatas tasmān niṣkramya sa viśāṃ patiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:071.011e: etaiś cānyaiś ca vividhair nāditaṃ tad vanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_03_u:071.012a: sa rāmo vidhivān vṛkṣān sarāṃsi vividhāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:071.013a: sa tām āsādya vai rāmo dūrād udakavāhinīm
GE09ram_03_u:071.014c: viveśa nalinīṃ pampāṃ paṅkajaiś ca samāvṛtām
GE09ram_03_u:071.020a: sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā tataḥ pampāṃ rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_03_u:071.021a: tilakair bījapūraiś ca vaṭaiḥ śukladrumais tathā
GE09ram_03_u:071.021c: puṣpitaiḥ karavīraiś ca puṃnāgaiś ca supuṣpitaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:071.023a: asyās tīre tu pūrvoktaḥ parvato dhātumaṇḍitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:071.024a: harir ṛkṣarajo nāmnaḥ putras tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:071.024c: adhyāste taṃ mahāvīryaḥ sugrīva iti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:071.025c: ity uvāca punar vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ satyavikramam
GE09ram_03_u:071.026a: tato mahad vartma ca dūrasaṃkramaṃ; krameṇa gatvā pravilokayan vanam
